$map:02000100$, $map:02000076$, and $map:02000023$. They were targeted for a reason.

Even with the situation at the Door of Light, I never thought things would escalate this far. We need to capture the ragged wraith if we're to get to the bottom of this. I never should have let him slip through my fingers...
Who do you think he is? What is he planning?
There's no way to know for certain. What we do know is that he's connected to all of the recent attacks.
$MyPCName$, do you recall the woman who attacked the caravan from $map:02000062$? I suspect she's working with our wraith.
As if one super powerful bad guy wasn't enough.
One thing that is certain is that darkness has returned to Maple World. First we lost $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$, then $npcName:29000250[gender:0]$, and now $npcName:11001573[gender:0]$...
This can't be a coincidence, can it? Are they targeting the Seven Heroes?
It could be. $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$ was the first of the Seven Heroes, and the first to fall. This could give us some insight into their plans...
Of the heroes who remain, we know the whereabouts of $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$.
If they really are after the Seven Heroes, then that's where we should focus our attention.
But I can't risk spreading my forces out only to have the ragged wraith slip past us. We barely have enough men to handle the crisis here...
Without the numbers for a thorough sweep, we should instead gather a small, elite team to spearhead the investigation and keep the remaining heroes safe.
I can handle one of the heroes.
Are you sure you're up to the task?
Positive.
All right, then. I'll leave $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$'s protection in your hands. I will go to $map:02000001$ and see to $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$'s safety personally.
The warriors of $map:02000051$ are slow to trust those who haven't proven their courage... But I'm sure you'll be fine, since you have my referral.
This won't be easy, but we're all counting on you.
Please, $MyPCName$.
If you've got a message for the war chief, tell me and I'll pass it along.
I need to meet with $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ in person.
And what makes you think the war chief wants to see you, Greenhorn? You're talking to the toughest warrior in $map:02000051$. Why shouldn't I boot you out right now?
(Show him the letter $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ gave you.)
And what do I care about some soft captain from the capital? He's no better than you! Now, beat it.
$npcName:11003421[gender:0]$! $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s always been a friend to us. You sure it's a good idea to turn $male:him,female:her$ away?
Shush! I'm the ranking warrior in $map:02000051$ right now, and I don't give a rat's behind about fancy letters or shiny titles. There's no place for weaklings here!
I thought I told you to scram.
How can I prove myself to you?
You could try taking the warrior's test, but it'd be a waste of time. Never met an outsider who could cut it!
Give me the test.

Fine. Maybe it'll teach you a lesson about knowing your place. The monsters at $map:02000010$ have been giving our hunters some trouble lately. If you're a real warrior, then you can take them, right?
You can just give up if you're too—
I'll be right back.
Ha! I bet you're all talk. This'll be funny to watch, at least.
What's the matter? Shaking in your boots?
Good job with the test.
Hey, sorry you had to waste your time with that stupid test. I guess it's good you made the town safer, at least...
Not that $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ cares. He just wanted to throw his weight around... Anyway, thanks.
Where is $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$, anyway?
He went to pick a fight with $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ about getting left behind. He's not a bad guy, really. He just wants to stomp everyone else into the dirt and show off how great he is.
He's ticked that you saved those villagers without him, so he's taking it out on everyone else. But he's good deep, deep, deep down.
You said something about getting left behind?
Yeah, he was mad he didn't get picked for the war party. You said you were here to see $npc:11000134[gender:0]$?
He's also off with the war party. You see, the town was attacked by this weird guy...
How weird are we talking here?
Uh... Well, he floated around like a ghost, and he was dressed in these old black rags. Anyway, a lot of people were hurt 'cause of him.
The ragged wraith! He must be after $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$.
Then he's a real idiot. The war chief is one of the Seven Heroes. There's no warrior stronger than him in all of $map:02000051$!
Funny. Didn't $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ say that he was the strongest?

Don't listen to anything $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ says. He's a real great guy, but he lies all the time. If he spent as much time training as he spent lying, then I bet he would be the best fighter.
Anyway, if you're that worried, why don't you talk to $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$? She should be at $map:02000032$, treating all the wounded. I can take you there.
Please do.
Follow me.
I'll take you to $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11003421[gender:0]$, that big dummy. I know he's mad about getting left behind, but that doesn't mean he can stomp around like that...
Um... Hello there!
Oh! I didn't see you there! What do you want?
Is $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ in?
I'm sorry, but you just missed her.
Well, do you know who I can talk to about $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$? If I don't warn him—
Yeah, the attack! That's why $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ stepped out. She needed to get medicine for all the people who got hurt.
I understand, but $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ is—
She went all the way to $map:02000023$ because the medicine she wants doesn't grow in $map:02000051$. But look at all these hurt people. I don't think they can wait that long.
I'm sure you're doing everything you can to help, but—
If only there was something more I could do. But all I can do is watch them and try to ease their suffering...
Okay, I get it! How can I help?
Gosh, you'd do that for little old me? No, I couldn't ask you that. You're probably tired from your long trip...
These people are in a lot of pain, but I'm sure some of them will pull through okay. Thank you for offering, though...
Just tell me what you need!
Well! It would be rude of me to say no, wouldn't it? If you insist...
If you insist...
I do have one teeny, tiny request!
$npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ went off to get medicine, but we'll need some more special ingredients if we want everyone to get better.
I need $npcName:21000267$ shells. They tend to live in $map:02000010$ and the $map:02000045$, but they're wild beasties...
You might get hurt or even die, but please get the shells for me!
You're pretty chipper about all this...
I believe in you!
I need $npcName:21000267$ shells. They tend to live in $map:02000010$ and the $map:02000045$. Good luck!
Phew! I made up a bed for you, but I'm glad to see you're back with the shells—and not as a patient.
Your concern is... touching.
Once I mash up these shells and feed it to the hurt people, $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ will have to believe me!
I'll just crush this shell into a paste... and...
Wait a second. What was that about $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ believing you?
$npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ doesn't think I know anything about medicine. Well, I'll show her!
I'm not a fighter, but I know how to heal people. With the right ingredients, I can cure anything. So help me prove that I can be a doctor, too!
This seems like a fantastic idea.
Anyway, the medicine's ready. Give this to the injured and they'll perk up, just like that!
Whoa, now. Don't rope me into this!
Are you saying you don't believe in my ability as a physician?
I... I'd never say that...
That's a relief! Okay, let's do this. Since you went through the trouble of getting the shells for me, you should have the honor of giving the medicine to our patients!
<font color="#909090">(If the medicine is poison, would that make you responsible in a court of law?)</font>
It's only fair that you give the patients their medicine. Think of it as my way of thanking you!
$npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ have told me much about your recent exploits. I hope they were exaggerating...
I'm curious... Why are you so interested in the Seven Heroes?
It's a long story... <font color="#909090">(You tell her about the ragged wraith and the attacks on the other heroes.)</font>
$npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ and I will have a long talk about his priorities... I apologize on his behalf.
The war chief and his party were headed for $map:02000267$. Please pick up his trail there and bring him back safely.
I shall leave you to it.
Ugh...
<font color="#909090">(She's still conscious! The medicine $npcName:11003448[gender:1]$ made should be effective.)</font>
(Use $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$'s medicine.)
Ugh... You are...?
$npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ sent me. I'm looking for the war party.
We... were attacked...
The scouting party went ahead... but when the rest of us got here... we were ambushed...
They caught us completely off guard... and we scattered... Have to find...
Don't get up! You need to rest.
N-no... My team is... in danger...
<font color="#909090">(She's unconscious, but she'll live. Look for the rest of her party.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(She's unconscious, but she'll live. Look for the rest of her party.)</font>
Ugh...
<font color="#909090">(She doesn't look good. Maybe there's an herb nearby that you can use to cure her.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(She doesn't look good. Maybe there's an herb nearby that you can use to cure her.)</font>
How do you feel?
Ugh... Hurry... Ambush at... $map:02000048$...
$map:02000048$? Is that where the war party is?
<font color="#909090">(Her wounds were too deep. There was nothing you could do to help her.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You can't let any more of the war party fall. Hurry to the $map:02000048$ before it's too late.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Hurry over to the $map:02000048$!)</font>
I'm looking for the war party from $map:02000051$. Have you seen them?
Don't you talk to me about the war party! After they came through here, all those nasty creatures showed up. But did the war party do anything to help? No, they did not!
The war chief's supposed to be a hero. Well, if he were a hero, he'd be smashing the monsters here instead of running off to smash monsters somewhere else!
Did you see where he went?
Aren't you listening to me? These monsters smashed my home and left me to die! I've got problems of my own to worry about, $male:buddy,female:lady$!
<font color="#909090">(She's losing it. Maybe you'll get more out of her if you take care of the monsters.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Get rid of the monsters near hear to calm $npcName:11000541[gender:1]$ down.)</font>
Okay. I feel much better now. I couldn't handle all those Inakimo-wannabes stomping around, kicking me out of my own home...
<font color="#909090">(Inakimo-wannabes...? No, better to just get the answers you need and move on.)</font>
You wanted to know about the war party, right?
I'll tell you where the war party was headed, but I need something from you in return. Don't tell anyone else about how I lost my cool here, okay? I've got a reputation to keep up.
I promise I won't tell anyone.
Then we've got a deal. The war party was headed to the nearby mountain, $map:02000046$. I'm certain that's where they were going.
<font color="#909090">(You should hurry over to $map:02000046$.)</font>
I'm sure you'll find the war party at $map:02000046$. Just remember your promise, okay?
<font color="#909090">(The war party's tracks end here. There must be some clue nearby.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(There's a tiny gap in the center of the altar. Is it a secret entrance? But how do you open it?)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It looks like the nearby torches were lit recently. You should see what happens if you light them again.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Light the nearby torches.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(As expected, there was a secret entrance here! It's likely that $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ are inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(There's no telling how far down this goes, but this is no time to hesitate. Jump inside!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(There's no time to lose. You should jump down.)</font>
I can't believe this has happened to the war chief... $MyPCName$, it is just as you feared...
Tell me what you witnessed when you found them. Spare no detail.
(Tell her what you witnessed.)
Unbelievable. The war chief would never do such a thing. There must be something else to this story...
Did you notice anything strange about $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$?
The place stank of dark magic, so there's that. And... Oh, that's right!
Was it... Inakimo? He kept saying that name. Come to think of it, I also heard the name when I was in $map:52010027$ earlier.
Impossible! $npc:11003389[gender:1]$, $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ and I will look into this at once.
Uh... Is Inakimo what I think it is?
There's no point in speculating. It will just make the people panic.
For now, we focus on figuring out what happened to the war chief.
$npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ might remember something.
Possibly. He's been taken to $map:02000032$. $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$ is seeing to him while I keep an eye on the war chief.
$npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ has been taken to $map:02000032$. $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$ is seeing to him while I keep an eye on the war chief.
Sorry, but I don't have time to talk. I need to get out of here.
$npcName:11000009[gender:0]$! $MyPCName$ is the one who brought you back here in one piece. You should be grateful!
Oh... It was you. You saved the war chief and me. I'm in your debt.
It's what I do. I was actually wondering if you saw what happened to $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$.
Well... I don't really understand it, either.
Fath—I mean, the war chief and I formed a war party after the town was attacked. We tracked down the attackers, too.
One was a freak in ragged black robes. The other was a woman... Such beauty...
<font color="#909090">(You sense a sudden, violently powerful fighting spirit!)</font>
<font size='40'>I-I mean, such wickedness!</font> Y-yes, so wicked. So very wicked. But the war chief was stunned, like he was seeing a ghost, and took off after them. Alone.
I could barely keep up, but the rest of the war party was left in our dust. When I finally caught him at $map:02000046$... something was different.
What was different?
It's hard to explain. It's like... someone else was controlling him. I'm certain he wasn't acting under his own power.
But what about the war chief? Is he okay?
He's still out cold.
How could this happen to him... No. I have to do something. I have to—Argh!
Settle down! You're in no condition to be running around yet. What do you think you're going to accomplish in that state?
Don't you worry about me. I'm good as new! And if you don't believe me, you can—Urgh...
See! What if you get beat again, and there's no one to help you? W-we care about you here, you know...
Fine. If you're that worried, I'll stay here until you give me a clean bill of health.
I'm holding you to that!
You have my word. Anyway, $MyPCName$, I owe you. Please tell $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ everything I told you.
As for the war chief... I leave my father in your hands.
Don't worry. Just focus on getting better.
Thanks!
The war chief, my father... I leave him in your hands.
What did $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ have to say?
(Tell her everything you heard from $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$.)
I have a bad feeling about this...
I think we'd better speak privately. Please meet me in $map:52010034$. The entrance is in the center of $map:02000051$, not far from $map:02000032$.
Please meet me in $map:52010034$. The entrance is in the center of $map:02000051$, not far from $map:02000032$.
I apologize for inconveniencing you, but I couldn't risk our conversation being overheard. What I'm about to tell you could cause a panic if word got out...
What's wrong?
The war chief mentioned the Inakimo at $map:02000046$, right? That is the name of an old tribe of $map:02000051$. But... they no longer exist in this world.
For as long as it has existed, $map:02000051$ has been a place where all the peoples of the highlands could live in harmony. But the Inakimo wanted more. They wanted to rule.

They weren't corrupt in the beginning. But when $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$ rose to become their wise woman, she led them down a dark path. Soon they began to ritualistically sacrifice the other tribes to gain more power.
Things got so bad that the survivors had to join the Murpagoth tribe under the war chief's leadership. With the help of the other Seven Heroes, they started to fight back.

It took many sacrifices, but we were able to save $map:02000051$. After a crushing defeat, $npcName:11003431$ and the Inakimo tribe fled to the Land of Darkness. We thought they were gone forever when the gates between our worlds were closed...
If the Inakimo are behind these incidents...
$npcName:11003393$ and $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ are looking into the matter. We'll know for certain soon enough.
The woman $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ saw... She may have been $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$.
The dark magic that infects the war chief is similar to the sorcery used by $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$.
But how were they able to return to our world?
I don't know, but if this is all true... Then we are facing grave danger... <font color="#909090">(She has a pained, distant look in her eyes.)</font>
Our first order of business is stabilizing the war chief so he doesn't get any worse. Can I count on your help?
I'll do whatever it takes.
Thank you! For now, I just need some reagents for his medicine.
For a base, I need $item:30000864$ taken from the spring at $map:02000095$.

I know it's not particularly exciting work, but I can't risk letting anyone else know exactly what is wrong with the war chief. If the others find out that the Inakimo were involved, it could cause a mass panic.
I will begin my preparations at $map:52010032$. Meet me there when you have the ingredients.
For a base, I need $item:30000864$ taken from the spring at $map:02000095$.
It can't have been easy to gather all this. But thank you—these ingredients will buy us time while we look for a proper cure.
There. The war chief will live, at least. But I don't have the knowledge to truly cleanse him of this dark magic.
There's a witch in the forests to the south, $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$. They say she knows rituals to purify the darkness.
I hate to rely on an outsider—a witch, no less—but her methods may be our only hope. Please seek $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$ out at the $map:02000103$.
Please seek $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$ out at the $map:02000103$. If she understands how dire our situation is, she may help us...
Why yes, hello the... Zzz...
Did... did you just fall asleep?
<font size='40'>Schnkk! I'm awake!</font>
Ah, yes. I've been expecting you. You're here about $map:02000051$'s war chief, are you not?
How did you know that?
I am a witch, little one. Our entire beings are awake to the world... when we aren't getting our beauty sleep, of course. Now, how is he?
Not good. He's been infected by dark magic.
Yes... I can sense the corruption of $npcName:11003470[gender:1]$ and her Inakimo. $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ must be desperate if she's sent you to me for help.
I know a ritual that will save his life, of course. But it's not something I can do for you.
You mean you won't help us?
Is there too much wax in your ears, $male:boy,female:girl$? I said I can't help, not that I won't!

The only thing that can cure $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ is the pure, holy light of a divine creature. Unfortunately for you, that isn't exactly the sort of power I dabble in as a witch... But if you had a unicorn, well...
Where can I find a unicorn?
Be patient, now. I'll tell you everything you need to know. There's a place called $map:02000053$ not far from here. Look there, and I'm sure some unicorn will trot out to meet you in short order.
Thank you for the information.

I'm not helping you from the goodness of my heart, $male:boy,female:girl$. Someday I will need a favor in return. I expect you to deliver when that time comes. Now, if our business is complete... Zzz....
<font color="#909090">(How can she sleep at a time like this? And while standing up...? Anyway, look for a unicorn at $map:02000053$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Go to $map:02000053$ and look for a unicorn.)</font>
Excuse me, unicorn friend. Do you know—
My friends. My friends! Help meeeee!
Whoa, there! What's the matter?
There's dark magic in the forest. My friends! They were transformed! Why is this happening?!
<font color="#909090">(As usual, nothing is ever simple.)</font>
Oh-oh, won't someone save my poor friends?!
What must be done?
I-I need to bathe them in my great and holy light, but they've turned into vicious, savage, mean monsters! I can't save them alone...
Does your great and holy light work on non-unicorns?
Huh? I-I guess. My great and holy light should work on anything from Maple World. Why?
I need you to save Perion's war chief...
I can do it, but I need my friends' help! Which means I need help saving them!
Here, I've given you the blessing of my light. Pour it on my friends for me. Their fate is in your hands!
Don't worry. I'll purify the heck out of them!
The fate of my fellow unicorns is in your hands!
Thank you. Thank you so much! They could have been corrupted forever if you hadn't come along!
Dark sorcery is spreading quickly. If we miss this chance... there will be no turning back...
Ahem! I, magical fantastical unicorn of this enchanted realm, hereby grant you an aura of light! That should do the trick. You had better return to $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ right away.
Thank you for everything.
No, it is I who should thank you! But this isn't the time for that. Hurry back to $map:02000051$!
Hurry back to $map:02000051$!
You were longer than I'd hoped. Did $npcName:11000746[gender:1]$ agree to help us?
(Share everything that's happened.)
You went above and beyond my wildest expectations. The blessing of a unicorn... I'm sure this will cure the war chief!
Let us begin the ritual.
Let us begin the ritual.
I don't understand. The ritual worked... The curse was lifted! So why is he still crawling with dark magic?
Is it possible someone cast a fresh curse on him after we cured him?
No, no, the target of the curse has to be in close contact with the witch. They couldn't curse him remotely. Unless...!
Could it be... $npcName:11003392$...?
Oh?
I sent $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ to the $map:52010029$. He may be in grave danger!

The $npcName:11003392$ and its fellow golems didn't come to the town's defense when we were attacked. They are oathbound to protect $map:02000051$, so their absence was... disconcerting. That's why I sent $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ to find out what happened.
Throughout the generations, our war chiefs have had a mystical bond with the $npcName:11003392$. In times of trouble, they join forces to battle the enemies of $map:02000051$.
You think that bond is how $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ was cursed again?
Correct. I suspect the Inakimo have captured the $npcName:11003392$, and are somehow passing the curse to the war chief through their bond. $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$'s life is in danger...
We don't have time to wait for $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ to return on their own. I'll check it out.
I'll leave it to you, then. The path to the $map:52010029$ is hidden in $map:02000077$.
$npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ is an upstanding member of the community. If he's in danger, please help him.
There's a path to $map:52010029$ hidden in $map:02000077$. If $npcName:11003421[gender:0]$ is in danger, please help him.
The $npcName:11003392$ fell into the hands of $npcName:11003431$ and the Inakimo.

I feared this would happen. Fortunately, I took the precaution of sealing the war chief's mind while you were away. Even if they have the $npcName:11003392$, they won't be able to control him like before.
Their bond must go both ways, then. $npcName:11003431$ couldn't control the $npcName:11003392$'s mind. Not completely.
We can't rest on our laurels yet. This countermeasure is only temporary. Were you able to find $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$?
Uh... Well...
Did something happen to $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$?
<font color="#909090">(If you tell $npcName:11000039[gender:0]$ the truth, then $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ really could lose his place in the tribe.)</font>
$npcName:11003391[gender:0]$... faced the Inakimo by himself. He's getting some rest after the battle.
I see. $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ is such a nice young man. I'm glad to hear that he's all right.
(...Young man? Young man?!)
<font color="#909090">(Anyway, you were a little hard on him. You should apologize.)</font>
Uh... I may have offended him. By mistake. I'd like to give him a gift to make up—do you know what sort of things $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ likes?
You are too kind. There's an incense that I used to burn when I would sing him to sleep as a baby. I've noticed that he still burns it in his home from time to time.
I happen to have some on me. I'm sure he'll appreciate it if you give him some.
I happen to have some on me. I'm sure he'll appreciate it if you give him some.
Thank you, $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$!
$npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ lives in $map:52010027$. $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ just returned from a mission. I'm sure he'll be happy to show you the way.
$npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ lives in $map:52010027$. $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ just returned from a mission. I'm sure he'll be happy to show you the way.
Hey! $MyPCName$!
How did the mission go?
Don't spread this around, but the Inakimo are involved, just like we feared. $npcName:11000078$ recognized them from years ago.
Anyway, $npcName:11000039[gender:1]$ said you went to the $map:52010029$ alone. You should have waited for us!
I couldn't let $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ face them by himself.
Is that why $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ looks so downcast? Now there's a man who will spit in your eye for helping him out. Still, I guess he's a pretty good guy.
Have you seen him?
He was headed home. You aren't worried about him, are you? He's just sulking, as usual.
<font color="#909090">(You really got to him. You'd better hurry up with your apology.)</font>
I heard $npc:11003391[gender:0]$'s house is in $map:52010027$. Would you mind showing me the way?
You're that worried about him? Well, if you insist, sure. I can get you there.
I just need to make sure there's no beef between us.
You really don't need to think about his feelings. No one else does. But I see I won't change your mind, so let's just go to $map:52010027$ and get this over with.
I'll take you to $map:52010027$. Do what you're going to do.
Is this $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$'s house?
Yeah, but he isn't home.
He did drop by, but...
You just missed him. He left again almost as soon as he got here. I'd have asked where he was headed, but he didn't seem to be in a talking mood.
Why are you looking for $npcName:11003391[gender:0]$, anyway?
I have to apologize to him. I brought a gift.
$npcName:11003391[gender:0]$ isn't very good with apologies. Giving or receiving them. But, since you brought a gift, I guess you can just leave it here for him.
<font color="#909090">(That's not a bad idea. Leave the gift and a note inside his house.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(That's not a bad idea. Leave the gift and a note inside his house.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You did a really good thing here, breaking into his house and leaving a gift in his stuff. He's lucky to know you.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You hear a sudden commotion outside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You hear a sudden commotion outside.)</font>
It's over. Accept your defeat.
It's over. Accept your defeat.
You're here right on time. The Inakimo are attacking!
How could they be here already? I just defeated $npcName:11003431$!
You fought $npcName:11003431$? What in the world is going on?!

Bah! We can sort out the details later. Right now, I need to get the villagers to safety. $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ are waiting in $map:52010031$. Join them and put an end to these invaders!
$npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ are waiting in $map:52010031$. Join them and put an end to these invaders!
I had a feeling you'd be showing up soon.
The Inakimo are using the passages from $map:52010031$ to attack $map:02000051$. The warriors we've managed to assemble can hold them off... barely.
But if the Inakimo manage to get the $npcName:11003392$ under their control, we'll have no hope of victory. We need you to stop that from happening.
I'll see to it.
We just might survive this, after all! $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ and I will lead the warriors of $map:02000051$ in a direct assault against the Inakimo.
Take the ladder up and find the secret passage. It should take you to $map:02000313$. I'm certain that they're holding the $npcName:11003392$ there.
We'll keep the Inakimo good and distracted for you. Hurry to $map:02000313$ and rescue the $npcName:11003392$.
If you rescue the $npcName:11003392$ from their clutches, the Inakimo will have no choice but to fall back. We'll join you as soon as we're through with their main force.
The fate of $map:02000051$ is in our hands. Good luck!
Take the ladder up and find the secret passage. It should take you to $map:02000313$. I'm certain that they're holding the $npcName:11003392$ there.
<font color="#909090">(This must be the passage to $map:02000313$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Take this passage to $map:02000313$. It's up to you to save $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and the $npcName:11003392$!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Take this passage to $map:02000313$. It's up to you to save $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003392$!)</font>
I'm relieved to see you made it through the battle. Thank you...
But $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000078$...
I know. The war chief awoke while you were out. When he learned of everything that had happened, he decided to take matters into his own hands.
He knew what it would cost... But I failed to convince him to stay...
The war chief... $npcName:11000078$... Even the $npcName:11003392$... Their lives were too heavy a price for this temporary peace. If only I'd done more...
Don't beat yourself up over this. It was the Inakimo and their dark allies that did this. You did everything you could.
$MyPCName$ is right. Father and $npcName:11000078$ knew what they were doing. $map:02000051$ is still standing because of them.
I'm sure... they had no regrets...
And neither should you. You helped protect $map:02000051$, too.
You did your best. Save your punishments for the forces of darkness.
Yes... Thank you. I hope you're right.
$map:02000051$ must now rise under the leadership of its new war chief, $npc:11000009[gender:0]$. What will you do, $MyPCName$?
I need to report to $npc:11000076[gender:0]$. We failed here, but my battle isn't over yet.
The forces of darkness are after the Seven Heroes for a reason. I need to make sure that their sacrifices aren't in vain.
I believe you just might be able to do it, too. I'm counting on you to protect Maple World, just as you protected $map:02000051$.
It's what I do.
I'm counting on you to protect Maple World, just as you protected $map:02000051$.
You're heading back?
I have more work to do. If I don't stop the spread of darkness, there's only going to be more heartache for everyone.
We were only able to hold $map:02000051$ with your help. I owe you a great debt... I'm sure father would have said the same.
I just did what I had to do.
You did more than that. Everyone here has learned from your courage and sacrifice. I have decided to join you in your fight against the shadows.
I appreciate it, but don't push yourself. The people of $map:02000051$ need their war chief.

Ha! I wouldn't be much of a war chief if I let a little skirmish like this take me out of the fight, would I? But you're right—my people need me now. As soon as $map:02000051$ is secure again, I will lend you my sword arm.
Sure... If $npcName:11003420[gender:1]$ doesn't mind, of course.
I-I don't need her permission!
$npcName:11000009[gender:0]$! What are you whispering about?!
N-nothing! Everything's fine! Just... just doing my new duties as war chief. Haha...
<font color="#909090">(She heard the whole conversation from that far away...?)</font>
Don't you worry about it. I'll take good care of you!
Ha... haha... ha...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000009[gender:0]$... He has quite the road ahead of him.)</font>
아이고… 작업을 더 이상 진행할 수가 없게 돼 버렸네…
무슨 일인지 물어본다.
내 앞에 있는 <font color="#ffd200">구멍</font> 보이지? 석유 공사를 확장해야 해서 새로 뚫었던 구멍이야.
그런데 도중에 실수로 <font color="#ffd200">코브라 둥지</font>를 건드렸지 뭔가! <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000038$</font>들이 나타나길래 허겁지겁 구멍을 막아버렸지.
자네가 좀 도와주지 않겠나? <font color="#ffd200">구멍 앞에 레버를 당기고</font> 그 안의 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000038$</font>들을 잡아주기만 하면 되네.
으… 난 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000038$</font>들이 너무 싫다네. 뱀은 인간과 가장 닮지 않은 동물 중에 하나잖아. 놀라서 철판으로 덮어버렸지.
이 주변에 레버들이 있을거야. 그 <font color="#ffd200">레버</font>들을 당기고 그 안의 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:99000038$</font>들을 잡아주게나.
고맙네! 이젠 공사를 계속할 수 있겠어!
마델…이곳에 오니 당신과의 추억이 새록새록 떠올라. 근데 어이구… <font color="#ffd200">도무지</font> 그걸 못 찾겠어!
무엇을 찾고 있는지 물어본다.
음? 자네 같은 젊은이가 나 같은 노인에게 말도 걸어주고 참 고맙구먼 그래!
마델은 이젠 이 세상을 떠난 내 부인의 이름이네… 이곳 벚꽃 공원에서 많은 추억이 있었지!
여기를 다시 와보고 싶어 왔는데 아니 글쎄, 그녀와 묻어둔 <font color="#ffd200">타임캡슐이 아무리 찾아봐도 안 보이네.</font>
분명히 저 <font color="#ffd200">벚꽃 공원에 있는 꽃 아래</font>에 묻어두었네! 자네가 다시 한번 가서 확인해주지 않겠나?
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000147$</font>에 커다란 벚꽃 나무가 있네. 분명히 그 주변 어딘가에 <font color="#ffd200">타임캡슐</font>을 묻었단 말이지! 부탁하네… 그 <font color="#ffd200">타임캡슐</font>은 나에게 정말 소중하다네.
아니! 여기서 지금 뭐하는 거에요!
여긴 제가 관리하는 공원이에요! 안 그래도 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000055$</font>들 때문에 스트레스 받는데, 꽃을 훼손하시면 안 되죠!
스트레스의 원인을 물어본다.
것참… 요즘 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000055$</font>들이 자꾸 공원을 파헤치고 있어요. 그 녀석들은 <font color="#ffd200">나무 위로 도망쳐 버려서</font> 잡기도 쉽지 않아요!
공원 훼손하다 딱 걸리셨으니! 돌아가시기 전에 <font color="#ffd200">나무 위에 있는 $npc:21000055$</font>$pp:나,이나$ 좀 처리해 주시죠!
제 뒤에 있는 커다란 벚꽃나무 위로 올라가봐요! 아마 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000055$</font>$pp:가,이$ 그 위에 있을 거에요!
오오! 이걸 다시 보니 마델이 내 품에 돌아온 기분이네! 정말 고마워. 이건 이제 내 집에 고이 모셔다 두겠네.
Ugh! I never should've brought $npcName:11000367$ to this stupid place!
What's wrong, little girl?
I was gonna surprise daddy by showing up at his work, and I brought my kitty, $npcName:11000367$, with me.
But when I was looking at all the big, pretty boxes, $npcName:11000367$ climbed up the crane behind me!
Poor, poor $npcName:11000367$. He must be so scared, all alone up there!
That lever over there calls down a ladder to climb the crane. Please save my kitty!
Hurry! That lever will put up a ladder so you can climb the crane. Poor $npcName:11000367$ is up there all alone!
What is it meow?
$npcName:11000366[gender:1]$ sent you, didn't she?
Yep!
Meow is me! I don't want to hurt her, but... I can't go back to her.
You see this fine feline beside me? We're getting married!
We're going to start a new life for ourselves far, far away. $npcName:11000366[gender:1]$ wouldn't understand... Please, just tell her that you couldn't find me.
Just tell $npcName:11000366[gender:1]$ you couldn't find me. I have a wedding to plan! Mew!
$MyPCName$! You're back! But... where's $npcName:11000367$?
Sorry, kid. I couldn't find him.
He's run off with his lady love.
I never should've brought him here. It's all my fault...
He's in love? As long as he's happy... I just hope I can see him again someday...
어이구… 장사 못해 먹겠네…
무슨 일인지 물어본다.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000116$</font>$pp:로,으로$ 향하는 포털 위에 자라난 큰 나무 보이나? 갑자기 강한 바람이 불더니 내가 팔던 <font color="#ffd200">풍선들</font>이 저 위로 휙! 날아가 버렸지 뭔가!
나이가 들어서 그런지 도무지 가지러 올라갈 엄두가 안 나서 이렇게 발만 동동 구르고 있다네…
자네가 내 풍선들 좀 가져다주지 않겠나? <font color="#ffd200">$skill:20000011$</font> 스킬을 활용하는 걸 추천하네!
<font color="#ffd200">$skill:20000011$</font> 스킬을 활용하여 내 뒤에 있는 나무 위로 올라가주게!
나무 위로 올라가면 내 <font color="#ffd200">풍선</font>들이 보일걸세. 부탁하네!
고맙네! 일단 가장 큰 문제는 해결됐네!
저기 $MyPCName$, 너 혹시 $map:02000116$$pp2:로,으로$ 가는 길이야? 그럼 가는 길에 우리 삼촌한테 이 도시락 좀 전해줄래?
무슨 일인지 물어본다.
우리 삼촌이 왕실 짐꾼이라 알현식 물품을 가지고 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000116$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 들어갔는데, 그만 도시락을 놓고 갔지 뭐야.
지진 이후로 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 가려면 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000116$</font>$pp:를,을$ 통해서 가야 하는데… 난 무서워서 따라가지 못했어…
길도 험한데 배까지 고프면 더 힘들텐데 말이야. 부탁할게!
왜 돌아왔어? 혹시 $MyPCName$도 겁이 난 거야?
$item:30000129$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 한다.
아무것도 아니라고 한다
아니 잃어버릴게 따로 있지… 여기 내가 먹으려고 만든게 또 있어!
가지고 있네? 설마… 너도 하나 먹으려고 거짓말하는거야?
가방이 가득 찼네. 좀 비우고 와.
어휴… 정말 $map:02000116$$pp:는,은$ 도저히 못 가겠어.
아, 조카 녀석이 도시락을…?
그렇다고 한다.
녀석… 고요한 숲에 들어오는 게 무섭다고 내빼더니 신경이 쓰였나보군.
I don't have time for you, your problems, or this horrible smell.
I don't smell that bad!
No, I suppose you don't. The smell is coming from the sewage plant in lower $map:02000100$!
A big city like this produces a lot of waste, and that waste pools in the lower districts. And you know what that means. Rivers of sewage!
I thought I could ignore it, but even city hall is starting to stink...
You seem like a cheap alternative to hiring a contractor. Why don't you perform your civic duty and set up some water purifiers in lower $map:02000100$? I'd do it myself, but I have donors to meet.
Did I mention that the sewage is poisonous? I'm sure I did. At any rate, $map:02000100$ is counting on you!
The mayor thanks you for your service!
You're so lucky. The mayor must be really impressed!
I am pretty impressive.
To thank you for taking care of the city's little sewage problem, $npc:11000065[gender:0]$ has recommended you for a job at Goldus Group.
I'm jealous. The benefits at Goldus Group are to die for. Did you know employees get free frozen yogurt? You'd better get to $map:02000189$ and interview right away!
I'm not exactly the "steady employment" type...
Maybe not, but would it kill you to at least try it?
Most people never even get to the interview at Goldus Group. This is the opportunity of a lifetime!
An interview at Goldus Group... Some things really are wasted on you, $MyPCName$.
Ah, yes, you're the one the mayor told us about. Welcome!
You must be here for the interview.
I must be.
Everyone has to go through an interview before they work here, of course. But, since you have a friend in city hall, this is all just a formality for you.
Lucky me.
First question. Who is the chairman of Goldus Group and the idol of our fair city's citizens?
Chairman Goldus.
Mayor Marco.
Lennon.
Correct! That wasn't just the first question... it was the only question. You're hired!
Oh, you have jokes! We like a $male:man,female:woman$ with a sense of humor around here. The correct answer is Chairman Goldus, of course.
You may have gotten the question wrong, but I'm satisfied. You're hired!
Welcome to the company, $MyPCName$.
It's an honor. I think.
As our newest employee, the first thing you need to do is introduce yourself to $npc:11000252[gender:0]$!
The chairman is a traditional man. You should memorize the company song, "Praise Goldus," before you meet him.
How does that one go again?
Repeat after me!
The Goldus way!
Put your back into it!
Pinch a penny, make a penny!
Catchy, isn't it? Do you want to hear it again?
Yes, please.
I think I've got it memorized.
You've got a good head on your shoulders. Take the elevator and meet with the chairman!
$MyPCName$, good luck!
Remember: "The Goldus way! Put your back into it! Pinch a penny, make a penny!"
Hmph. You must be $MyPCName$.
That's me!
Your reputation proceeds you. The Goldus Group could use a go-getter like you. I'll be watching your progress closely...
We'll take you far, but you must prove your devotion to us. I assume you've learned the company song?
If you mean "Praise Goldus," I sure have!
Then... sing!
All praise Goldus!
The Goldus way!
I love gold!
It came from the abyss!
No, no, no. You've got it all wrong! Start again from the top.
Uh, okay. Here goes...
Good! Continue!
Put your back into it!
Seven stories tall!
In the name of love!
Don't even worry about it!
Good! Continue!
These tears won't stop flowing!
We'll beat all the rest!
Our dream will never die!
Pinch a penny, make a penny!
That will do. What you lack in pitch, you make up for with vigor! You remind me of myself when I was young!
저… $MyPCName$님! 제가 부탁 한 가지 더 해도 되겠습니까?
이번엔 또 무엇이냐고 물어본다.
그림자 병술서에 말입니다… $npc:23100025[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ $item:30000190$$pp:를,을$ 잃게 되면 혼돈의 그림자가 옅어질 거라는 기록… 말입니다.
그게 사실이라면… 만약에 말입니다… 만약에 제가 $item:30000190$$pp:를,을$ $npcTitle:11000119[gender:0]$님께 가지고 간다면… 무기고를 지키지 못했던 실수를 완벽하게… 만회할 수 있을 것 같은데…
$MyPCName$님께서 사람 한번 살리는 셈 치고… $map:02000315$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:23100025[gender:0]$에게서 $item:30000190$$pp:를,을$ 빼앗아 와 주시면 안 되겠습니까?
$map:02000315$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:23100025[gender:0]$에게서 $item:30000190$$pp:를,을$ 빼앗아 제게 가져다 주신다면… 정말 이 은혜는 평생 잊지 않겠습니다!
$MyPCName$님! 돌아오셨군요. 제가 부탁드린 건… 어떻게…
$item:30000190$$pp:를,을$ 건네준다.
아아… 정말 감사합니다. 무기고가 털렸을 때부터 지금까지… 늘 $MyPCName$님의 도움만 받고 있으니… 염치가 없습니다. 언젠가는 제가 이 빚을 꼭 갚겠습니다.
이제 빨리 $item:30000190$$pp:를,을$ 근위대장님께… 아!!! 저 혹시 $map:02000315$에서 붉은 망토의 흔적이라도… 찾은 것이 있습니까?
없다고 말한다.
아… 그렇군요… 분명 $map:02000315$$pp2:로,으로$ 갔다고 했는데… 그 사이에 어디로 사라진 걸까요…
Keep up the rhythm. One, two! One, two! C'mon you guys. Dance already!
Who are you talking to?
Who do you think? My baby $npcPlural:21000069$, of course!
I grew and raised them myself. $npcPlural:21000069$ love to dance...
But, no matter how hard I try, $npcPlural:21000069$ won't dance at all! Not even a little booty shake!
Is it my fault? Am I a bad dad? Just looking at them makes me feel like giving up...
$MyPCName$! You're a big-shot hunter. If you hunt some wild $npcPlural:21000069$, maybe you can learn their secret. Then you can teach me the secret, and I can get my babies to dance!
There are plenty of $npcPlural:21000069$ dancing around the $map:02000049$. There must be a clue on one of them...
I've never seen anything like this before. But... Is there music coming from this?
Just holding this $item:30000029$ makes me want to dance. More than usual, I mean.
Why don't you give it to your... babies?
That's a great idea!
This is what my $npcPlural:21000069$ have been missing this whole time. The $item:30000029$!
I'm counting on you. Please give this $item:30000029$ to my $npcPlural:21000069$.
I'll watch. From a safe distance.
What are you waiting for? Hurry up and make them dance!
I lost the $item:30000029$...
Never mind.
I understand. You got so caught up in the dance that you dropped it. Well, here's a new one!
It's in your bag. I guess all the dancing distracted you...
How can you dance with such a full bag? Come back to me after you've emptied it.
If you're not happy with your life, you should dance. When your body's happy, your mind will be too!
Even though they're $npcPlural:21000069$, they don't always want to dance. I thought they'd want to party with me...
Anyway, thanks for all the help. I think I'll spend some time checking out this $item:30000029$...
이곳 페리온은 언제쯤 가뭄이 멈출런지…
무슨 일인지 물어본다.
이곳 페리온 일대는 항상 물이 부족합니다. 비가 조금밖에 내리지 않아 농작물을 기르기 굉장히 힘들지요…
더 이상 보고만 있을 수는 없어, 이곳 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000049$</font> 곳곳에 토템을 설치했습니다.
다만 요즘 토템들 주변에서 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000333$</font> 무리가 나타나 주민들의 기우제를 방해하고 있습니다.
$MyPCName$님, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000049$</font> 주변에서 <font color="#ffd200">토템</font>을 발견한다면 그냥 지나치지 마시고 꼭 한번 기우제를 치러 주세요.
$MyPCName$님이라면 방해하는 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000333$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000332$</font>$pp:를,을$ 손쉽게 처치하실 수 있을 겁니다.
비가 아직 안내린걸 보니, 아무도 토템 앞에서 기도를 하지 않았군요. $MyPCName$님, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000049$</font>의 푸른 지역에 있는 토템 앞에서 꼭 기도를 해주세요.
감사합니다. 이렇게라도 이 일대에서 농사가 가능해졌으면 합니다.
<font color="#ffd200">코드명: S-NX1390</font> 그림자 세포 바이러스를 파괴하라!
내용을 자세히 살펴본다.
<font color="#ffd200">사건 파일</font> 다크셀 바이러스 센터 Dr. 로켈 주관 그림자 세포 배양을 통한 바이러스 생산 중.

눈이 부시고 심장이 두근거려서 근처에 가지 못하는 그 두근거림… 내 사랑 너의 사랑! <font color="#ffd200">수제 스포츠카</font>를 보고 오신 거 맞죠?! 하하하~

실은 좀… 흐리멍텅 해 보이시길래 못 미더웠는데… 생각보다 일 처리가 깔끔하시군요. 좋습니다. 맘에 드는군요.
윽… 시… 심장이 무너지는 기분입니다.
어디가 아프냐고 물어본다.
저기, 저기를 보십시오. 나의 사랑스러운 애마들이 무참히 몬스터들한테 짓밟히고 있는 이 참혹한 모습을…
차라리 나를 짓밟아라… 나를 밟는 건 참을 수 있어도 내 소중한 애마들은 털 끝만큼도 건드리면 안 된다… 으윽…

지금 당장은 제가 이상해 보이실 수 있지만… 저에게는 자동차가 하늘이고, 사랑하는 사람이고, 소중한 자식이고 그렇다능… 아니, 아니 그… 그렇습니다.

언제 들이닥칠지 모르는 몬스터들 때문에 불안합니다. 전시장에 있는 자동차들을 단단한 컨테이너 박스 안으로 넣어주세요.

저는 그저 사랑스러운 제 애마들의 안전이 최고라고 생각합니다. 역시 자동차는 사랑입니다.
이, 이봐요! 잠깐 저 좀 도와주시겠습니까!
무슨 일인지 물어본다.
제가 좀 전에 경기를 막 끝내고 부상 때문에 머리가 너무 아파서 쉬고 있었는데요. 그… 뭐지…? 으… 단어들이 생각이 안 나네…
천천히 말해보라고 한다.

보시다시피 제가 지금 정신이 없어서 놈들을 상대할 수가 없으니, 저를 대신해서 제 <font color="#ffd200">글러브</font>를 좀 찾아다 주세요.

그런데 제가 어떻게 조종할 수 있었죠? 라고 말한다.
어쩌면 자네는 특별한 힘을 가지고 있는지도 모르겠군. 나 역시 그런 자네를 보고 무의식 중에 마크52를 타 보라고 권했던 걸지도…후후.
It's not too late. We have just enough time to prepare a defense... but...
We don't have enough forces.
You're right. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ will get reinforcements from the $map:02000146$, but I don't know if we can hold out that long.
That sounds like a challenge.
...I can't shake off what $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ told $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$.
He's working with the $npcName:11001811[gender:0]$... but he's trying to save the world? Nothing makes sense...
This isn't the time to second guess each other.
You're right. We can worry about that after we survive this fight. Ready to go?
Good. Let's begin!
Empress... That power...
Are you all right, Your Majesty?
Th-this... This is what Cerian meant... Destruction from light...
Empress...
He said... that this is how the world would end...
Your Imperial Highness, you swore never to speak of this in public! We must be... cautious... in these trying times.
Karl, if this continues, then I might really...
Ahem! $npcName:11001971[gender:1]$! The empress needs her rest.
Please escort her to safety. Immediately!
Minister, why don't you tell us all about this destructive light?
After everything they've been through, surely they have a right to know.
Nobody has a right to know anything. I will say, however, that I've heard some disturbing things about you and our enemies.
I would much rather know how you knew of this invasion when even my most elite scouts were caught unawares.
Surely the daughter of the great Winn Stilton isn't colluding with the enemy? He would be turning in his grave.
Captain, arrest this woman. We cannot allow her to walk free until we're certain of her loyalties.
Maybe you forgot, but without $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s warning, this city wouldn't be standing!
Captain, while you're at it, arrest $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$, as well. I'd like to find out exactly what he was up to—and what alliances he formed—while he was busy hiding from the law.
You just got Dark Wind back on your side. You really want to make an enemy of us so quick?
Enough!
Huh?
Look outside! While you're in here bickering, our guards lie in the street, injured from the battle for their homeland.
Is this really the time for your petty infighting?
$npcName:11001966[gender:0]$ is right. Our city needs us.
Dark Wind, with me!
Let's hurry, $npcName:11001966[gender:0]$.
Oh jeez... This doesn't look good, does it?
$npcName:11003344[gender:0]$! Hang in there!
Let me see.
This... this wound...
I'm... I'm fine, you guys. Help the other guards...
I just need to... be still for a bit...
$MyPCName$, did we... did we save Tria?
Yes. Everyone's safe, thanks to you.
Heh... I finally did it...
Shh. Save your strength.
I'm finally a hero...
...just like you.
You're the best hero I know.
Th-thank you... I'll... I hope we meet again...
Someday...
He... he's not breathing!
$npcName:11003344[gender:0]$!
$npcName:11003344[gender:0]$...
Rest in peace.
I was just looking for you. Please, go inside... and good luck!
I don't think I ever introduced myself. I'm Sir Rowen of the Secret Knights. I heard you had quite an adventure up north recently.
Ah, maybe this isn't the best time. Please head into the command center. Everyone is waiting for you.
What's going on?
We're finally making some progress!
The master wizard, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, says that she knows how to track lumarigon magic—and, along with it, Madria's stronghold.
How? With the Lumenstone?
That's right. The very Lumenstone that you recovered.
Captain Allon says that you'll play a central role in the next mission, too.
You'd better not keep the others waiting. Good luck!
We've been waiting for you, $MyPCName$.
You've arrived just in time.
Shall we begin?
As I'm sure you're all aware, we've been working to gather information on the enemy from many different angles.
We have worked tirelessly to this end. We've been so busy that we haven't even had time to introduce you all to each other.

However, for all this, we still haven't had the opportunity to launch a counterattack. We've had some minor skirmishes here and there, but we don't even know where or how the shadows are keeping their forces.
In other words, we're completely and utterly clueless.
But I think that's all about to change, thanks to the esteemed wizard, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.
Ah... So her spell is complete?
Yes. After grueling hours of studying the Lumenstone we retrieved from Karkar Island, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ has developed a spell to trace lumarigon.
We've had reason to believe that Madria's dragon is somehow related to the lumarigon. With this spell, we now have the key to tracking her down.
We need our best if we're going to track Madria's dragon... and her fortress. That means you, $MyPCName$.
This won't be easy, but you're our best hope. I'm afraid the alliance doesn't have the soldiers to spare to back you up.
I'll find a way to get this done.
That's what I like about you. Never even an ounce of hesitation. You'll be accompanied by $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, as she's the only one who knows how to use her spell.
Speaking of $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, she should be here by now...
It must have been a long journey, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.
Yes, very! Teleporting over long distances is exhausting. But it seems like I missed all the important stuff.
I've only just brought the others up to speed on your brilliant research.
So you haven't gotten to the important stuff! If you'll just allow me, I'd love to bring everyone up to speed on the unlimited potential of lumarigon-derived mana matrices.
Ah, no, that's ok—

Imagine if you will a series of parallel mana constructs arrayed into a series of ever-winding strings that cascade into each other resulting in geometrically increasing magical output that is reflected not only in their advanced spellwork but also their culture which may I say far eclipses those of humans by—

E-enough! I mean... This is all written down in your report, master wizard. I'll see to it that the others are informed of your discoveries so that you don't have to... ahem... waste your valuable time explaining it to us.
You have my word as a knight.
That would be efficient, yes. To put it bluntly, my own magic is like that of a child compared to the lumarigon.
But, if my meager spell is of use to the alliance, then it makes me one very happy dragon fan.
Dragon...
Fan...
Let's go over the plan, shall we! $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ and $MyPCName$ will go on a scouting mission to track down Madria's dragon.
Remember, your focus is on information gathering. If you find Madria's stronghold, fall back until the rest of the alliance can join you.
Excuse me. I must have misheard. You're sending me on this mission?
You created the spell, did you not? Besides, according to your report, the magic you're tracing is very faint. I don't think we can risk a lesser mage losing the trail.
No, no no no. This is certainly the job for one of the alliance's mages, don't you think? I am not trained for battle!
I won't do it. I simply won't do it!
This is a difficult situation. This spell is too complex for any of our own mages. Without $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$'s help...
Empress, there's no other choice. We have to resort to... that strategy.
I trust your judgment in this, but are you sure we can even obtain it...?
With the right combination of prayer and divine intervention... perhaps.
Very well. Then...
$npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, I would like to offer you a gift upon completion of this mission.
It's a 10th anniversary limited edition from Nerman Toys. Mint condition. "Afrien the Onyx Dragon."
Now, it isn't much, but—
<font size='40'>Mission accepted!!</font>
She wasn't lying. She really is a fan...
There's no time to waste, $MyPCName$! Maple World is counting on us!
My spell found a concentration of lumarigon magic at $map:52000088$. Meet me there!
My spell found a concentration of lumarigon magic at $map:52000088$. Meet me there!
It's about time you got here. I came as fast as I could. You have no idea how much I need that figur—I mean, world peace!
Anyway, look over there. See the hot springs that formed in the middle of the ice?
Most people aren't used to seeing such extremes right next to each other. Dragons, on the other hand, love places like this.
But that's all basic stuff. Any dragon could have come here. We need to prove that it was the right dragon.
Look at those rocks. There's lumarigon magic coming from their runes.
Rune stones are used to cast powerful spells while only using a little bit of spirit. Since they draw mana from the earth, they're great tools for efficient spellcasting.
This is probably a good lead. I can determine the size of the dragon, along with other details, from the placement of the rune stones alone.
I'm going to analyze the mana that's lingering over here. Would you mind taking a look at the rune stones for me?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ is concentrating.)</font>
Go on. How were they arranged?
(Tell her what you saw.)
I see. Based on what you're telling me, the dragon should be the right size for Madria's pet.
I sense that a spell of spatial distortion was cast here recently. If I had to guess, some sort of cloaking magic...

If the dragon had used lumarigon mana to power such a spell, it would have been like sending out a signal flare to magic users like me. It must have used rune magic so that it could have a dip in the hot springs without any interruptions...
That lucky lizard. I wish I had time to laze around in hot water all day!
Anyway, our prey was careless to just leave these rune stones here. It probably didn't expect to be hunted by a wizard of my caliber.
I can use what we found here to focus my tracking spell a little more. Hopefully we can get a more precise location this time...
Now, the real magic begins...
Success! The spell is more accurate than before, thanks to my brilliant deductions.
There's a lava floe deep in Magma Gorge. The lumarigon was there recently.
That's as far as my spell was able to trace. With any luck, we'll find some more clues that will help me refine the spell even more.
Okay. Let's teleport straight there!
Um, excuse me? Why do I have to teleport you anywhere?
Wh-why not?
Do you have any idea how exhausting teleportation magic is? The drain on my spirit more than doubles with each extra person I take with me!
If you're ever dating a mage and you want to break up with them, all you have to do is say "Teleport me over to my place." They'll dump you before you can blink!
...Fine. I'll walk.
Magma Gorge isn't too far. Think of this as a chance to see the sights. I need to save my own energies for tracking magic, after all.
Magma Gorge isn't too far. Think of this as a chance to see the sights. I need to save my own energies for tracking magic, after all.
Phew. So glad I didn't walk here. Who knew magma was so hot?
Anyway, this place is full of interesting clues.
See the dragon scales scattered all over? They tell an interesting story.
Dragon skin is like steel. When it's injured, the dragon will go into hot fire or lava to burn its wounds cut. It's like how a blacksmith melts a dull blade in the forge in order to fix it.
Old scales will fall off the dragon's body in the process. Of course, examining these scales will tell us lots about the dragon.
I need you to get up close and personal with those scales. Tell me everything you can about them. No detail is unimportant, no matter how small!
I'd love to take a look at the scales myself, but I'm allergic to scalding hot lava.
Too hot... Oh, are you done?
I felt dark magic on the scales.
Really? Quick, show me your hand.
(Hold out your hand.)
Yes, yes. Traces of shadow magic still cling to you. These definitely came from the scales...
Incredible. Traditionally, dark magic and dragons don't exactly mix.
There's no doubt about it. The dragon we're tracking is Madria's dragon.
It's amazing enough that we found a living lumarigon—or something like a lumarigon. But for that same creature to be tainted by dark magic? It's all a little too much.
Anyway, I need to refocus my spell.
Give me a minute. With any luck, I'll be able to find out where the dragon was heading...
Hmm... I think I'm picking up the source of this dark energy.
A unique signature. Shadow magic mixed with lumarigon mana. It's coming from the Land of Darkness...
But I can't pinpoint the location from here. We need to go to the $map:02000146$. I should be able to do a more precise scan from there.
All right, $MyPCName$. I'll see you the—
You don't expect me to walk again, do you?
(Give her the puppy dog eyes.)
(Turn the puppy dog eyes up to 11.)
Okay, enough! Hold on tight. And if I collapse from exhaustion, this is your fault, got it?
Okay, enough! Hold on tight. And if I collapse from exhaustion, this is your fault, got it?
Ugh... Group teleportation is really hard! You cheated by looking so pitiful and sad!
Thank you very much.
Well... I've learned a lot by going out into the field with you. So I guess we can consider ourselves even.
Anyway, I can sense the lumarigon's magic clearly now, this close to the Land of Darkness.
I see Obsidian Mount... No, beyond... Is that a forest?
Tch... What a hassle. It seems Madria's dragon has some business in Blackmist Forest.
The dark energy of that forest erodes other magical signals. Madria's dragon was probably topping off its own energy reserves...
Dragons can gather mana from the air just by breathing, you know. It's just one of many quirks of the draconic respiratory system!
Wait, this isn't the time for dragon facts. The forest and its denizens are gluttons for magic.
We have to hurry, or there will be no traces of lumarigon magic left for us to analyze!
I'll go. The Land of Darkness is too dangerous for you.
Not so fast! I am a master wizard, you know!
Maybe, but you look exhausted.
Sure. You try maintaining all these spells for hours at a time and see how bright and chipper you are. Of course I'm tired!
Fine, you win. I'll rest here for a bit. When you've done in the forest, meet me back here.
Is there anything I should look for in particular?
For now? Just get rid of the monsters there. Their dark magic should glop onto you. It'll be simple for me to scoop off some samples when you're done.
I'm counting on you!
Blackmist Forest is somewhere beyond Obsidian Mount in the Land of Darkness. The path may be hard to find, so keep your eyes open.
All right. Let's take a look!
<font color="#909090">(Orde leans in and looks you all over.)</font>
Hmm... So much dark magic for such a short visit...
The royal court was right. Maple World can never be safe as long as the gate to the Land of Darkness is open.
Anyway, I can calibrate my spell a little more based on the samples you brought me. I can't help but feel that our goal is in reach...
What...? Right under our noses this whole time...?
What's the matter?
Thanks to the latest sample you brought me, I can pinpoint the location of the lumarigon magic perfectly now.
But I'm not sure if I can explain what I'm seeing. The magic... it's coming from here. Come on, I'll show you.
I'm going on ahead. I need to check on something first. See you there!
I'm going on ahead. I need to check on something first. See you there!
Here. It's right here.
Do you remember the cloaking spell at $map:52000088$? This is the same type of magic, but the scope... it's on a whole different level.
Look, you're floating! Space is so distorted here that not even the law of gravity is working properly.
This is really amazing... How hasn't the alliance noticed this place? It's right here!
We've been swimming in lumarigon magic lately.
Hmm... That's a good point. That energy could be the key that unlocked this place for us.
The time for investigation is over. Now we see what's beyond this phase distortion with our own eyes.
A spell this massive... Even if all the mages in the empire got together, they couldn't dispel it.
I guess that's obvious. Human magic doesn't hold a candle to dragon magic, after all.
I'm concerned by the shifts in the distortion that I'm picking up. By this time tomorrow, we may lose our ability to even see this much.
If we wait for the alliance to send reinforcements, it'll be too late. We have to break through this spell ourselves.
You said all the mages in the empire couldn't do that.
I was talking about them, not me! Anyway, we were the ones to find this place, right? I'm sure we can figure it out.
Instead of punching through the cloak directly, we're going to make the spell break down on its own. Mana overload.
When the mana flow reaches a pressure too high for the spell matrix to handle, the whole thing will overload. Then, poof, no more spell.
We just need to keep feeding it more phase magic.
First, let's seal up the spell's outflows. I can sense a stream of dark energy coming from the gorge to the right.
Gather materials from that place for the seal. I'll prepare things on my end while you're doing that.
Go to the gorge to our right. Collect anything that seems like a good source of dark energy.
This should be more than enough. Great!
Hm. This energy is in powder form, and the material is too dry. In a ritual chamber, it would be perfect, but it'll blow away out in the open like this.
I need a secondary source of dark energy that I can use as a mortar.
I saw some dark essences floating around the nearby fields.
You and your astute observations! I hadn't noticed that.
Dark energy that's practically alive... This place is sick with darkness. Fortunately for us, we actually need dark energy at the moment.
We're almost there. Help me out a little more!
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ is focused on her ritual. Gather dark essence from the field to the left.)</font>
Ugh... My eyes are starting to water. They know that what they're seeing isn't real...
At least our preparations are almost done. Just one step left!
Shall we put the finishing touches on this magic seal?
Please rune stones on each of the six seal points while I put the finishing touches on the spell.
Where can I get rune stones?
Did you see any stones carved with strange symbols?
They formed naturally when they were struck by the phase distortion spell.
Normally it'd take months to make stones like that in a magic lab. We got lucky this time!
Please rune stones on each of the six seal points while I put the finishing touches on the spell.
Finally... We're about ready to trigger the overload!
$MyPCName$, ready?
Are you?
Of course not! Who knows what's hiding behind this cloak? How could I possibly be ready?
I'm just going to do it. There's no one else here to do the job, after all.
Anyway... I hate the idea of tainted lumarigon wandering all over Maple World. They deserve better than that...
And don't forget the figurine the empress promised you.
Hey, I'm trying to be a hero over here! Don't I deserve a little more credit than that?
Though... the limited edition Afrien does sweeten the deal...
Enough small talk! Shall we see what's really right in front of us?
Enough small talk! Shall we see what's really right in front of us?
Uh... I was expecting something huge, but...
Is this Madria's castle?!
It has to be...! Hidden in a pocket dimension... It's no wonder nobody could find it!
Hold on! Do you see that?
It's Madria's army.
With all the damage we've done to the phase distortion, they'll be able to see us, too!
What do we do? The two of us can't stand against an army!
We can't let Madria's forces go unopposed.
Y-you're right... If they were to attack another town or city...
We can slow them down, at least.
All right. Okay. Let's get them nice and distracted. Then, when we get a chance, we can call for reinforcements from the alliance!
All right. Okay. Let's get them nice and distracted. Then, when we get a chance, we can call for reinforcements from the alliance!
Th-there's... no end to them...!
I thought bullies are supposed to back off if you put up a fight...! We're not going to make it back to headquarters at this rate.
I won't, but you can.
Are you joking?! You can't face that army alone!
I just have to hold my ground until you get reinforcements.
Don't be stupid! Even if they leave right away, it'll take half a day for them to get here. Unless...
(마법사 애인은 못 사귈 것 같은 생각이라고 말한다.)
You don't expect me to teleport them here, do you?!
I was kinda hoping you might!
We really don't have a choice, do we...?
All right. I'll do my best. Just hang on, $MyPCName$!
All right. I'll do my best. Just hang on, $MyPCName$!
I've never seen a mage teleport so many people at once. It seems $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ is more than some eccentric goofball, after all.
$npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ isn't the only impressive one here. Only $MyPCName$ would come up with a plan that involved fighting an entire army singlehandedly.
We have much to discuss... after the battle is through. Blackeye and his men are still fighting on the other side.
We'll handle things here. Make sure Dark Wind is holding its own.
We'll handle things here. Make sure Dark Wind is holding its own.
There won't be anything for you to do here, after all. Blackeye is showing off.
Enemy hostiles have been neutralized. Jin, casualty report.
No casualties, Boss!
It was the perfect surprise attack. I've never seen anything like it.
That $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ came through for us. I'd never thought of using mass teleportation to initiate an ambush. We should employ mages more often in the future.
That $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ came through for us. I'd never thought of using mass teleportation to initiate an ambush. We should employ mages more often in the future.
$MyPCName$, were you worried about us?
As you can see, we can hold our own. Of course, this victory would have been impossible without you and $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$.
If anyone needs help, it'll be the militia in the gorge. They're cutting off the enemy's retreat.
I'm glad to see you're still alive, by the way. It's because of you that we were able to round them up.
Let's hurry and join the others.
Let's hurry and join the others.
$MyPCName$! You're safe!
It's all thanks to Orde.
Don't be crazy! This would have been impossible without you.
I will say, though... that I think I've earned a nap.
Well, here we are. Madria's stronghold. I sort of can't believe it.
It's all thanks to you and $MyPCName$.
But the fight isn't over yet. Not while Madria's castle still stands.
This latest battle was only the beginning.
All right. I need to rally the troops. We have a fight ahead of us.
$npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, can you interpret the runes engraved on the gate? I don't want any surprises.
$npcName:11000042[gender:1]$, can you interpret the runes engraved on the gate? I don't want any surprises.
Piece of cake! Let's see...
"Rage's desire... blocks rage's future..."
"Madrakan... the Fortress of Fury."
She went to such lengths to hide this, and then wrote everything out on the front gate.
I guess she wanted to throw off. If Madria's attack had been successful, she probably would have brought any prisoners here as slaves, like at Katramus.
This message was probably meant for them.
Madrakan... the Fortress of Fury. She obviously named it after herself.
But that "rakan" part bothers me. I'm sure I've heard a word like that before...
Dakrakan... I didn't know it at the time, but maybe...
$npcName:11003135[gender:0]$, forward this information to headquarters. I want to know the significance of that word, "rakan."
We'd better finish getting the troops ready.
The alliance will focus on the assault on Madrakan.
$MyPCName$, your role will be pivotal to our success. I want you to lead our vanguard.
All right. Maple Alliance, it's time to attack!
The mission is simple. Attack Madrakan's rampart, central base, and spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.
The mission is simple. Attack Madrakan's rampart, central base, and spire. I'm counting on you to lead us to victory.
Well fought. Let's move on to the next stage of the assault.
There is one person who has been waiting for news of our success more than anyone else.
$MyPCName$, I think you should be the one to deliver this report. Please let the empress know that we have won!
I give you the honor of delivering the good news.
You bring news from the front, I presume?
Madrakan has fallen.
Truly...? I hadn't dared hope! Were there any casualties?
None of our own soldiers were seriously hurt.
I can't express how relieved I am to hear this news. Both you and $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ deserve the highest honors for your service to the empire!
But...
Is something wrong?
Madria escaped.
That is fine. Without her army, there's little she can do to trouble us.
Thank you once again.
You will forever be known as the hero of the alliance.
Hey, Kate. Are you late, too?
Me, late? Have you ever, in your life, seen me show up late for class?
And for your information, you aren't late. Class is over!
What?!
You didn't even realize it, did you? At this point, I wouldn't be surprised if they held you back a year.
That's... perfect! I didn't feel like sitting through a boring lecture, anyway. Want me to walk you home?
Ugh! That vacant grin... That blank expression... The infuriatingly good grades... You have no idea how much I detest you!
Oh... Oh no...
Oh, did you finally realize how much trouble you're in? I bet they'll expel you before the month is through!
You never do your homework. You skip class. You—
I have to get to a make-up class with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$! So much for playing hooky today. And now I'm bummed out...
You better run along, Kate. I'll walk you home some other time.
Are you even listening to me?!
W-wait! You have a private study session... with Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?!
Tell me, why did you skip class today?
I'm sure you have a good excuse.
O-of course I do. My... alarm clock... has become sentient and is plotting against me.
I'll get you next time, alarm clock!
It is not the fact that you lied that bothers me. It is the fact that you used such a transparent lie.
It seems you still require more discipline...
P-professor...?
I shall be lenient with you today. All you have to do is clean up this classroom...
...without magic.
P-please, oh wise and generous teacher! Anything but that!
A wizard, cleaning without magic?! I am a delicate flower! My hands are smooth and soft! Surely such a punishment is more suited to a warrior!
Oh, the anguish! The humiliation! At this rate, I ought to set down my staff and pick up a greatsword instead!
Come now, $MyPCName$. I doubt you could lift a greatsword.
You really are something else...
Enough horsing around. The classroom won't clean itself!
Hmph. It was worth a shot.
All you need to do is clean up the classroom...
...without magic.
How uncharacteristically thorough of you.
See? I'm not a total lost cause!
I have decided on your next punishment.
What do you mean, "next punishment?"
You didn't think this was over so quickly, did you? I take your education very seriously.
Do you have to?
Simply fetch that book and place it on a podium.
Without magic?
Without magic.
I want to cry...
Bring the book to a podium, if you will.
Of course, you have to do it by hand. No magic!
I hope you've learned to appreciate your magic.
No, but I've learned how heavy textbooks are!
A few more days of hard work like that and I'd be strong enough to clobber monsters with my bare hands.
Since you're still feeling chatty, you must have energy for your study session.
Let's catch up on what I covered in class today.
Open your textbook to page 46. We will begin with the section on dealing with cute monsters.
Ahem. "What should you do when a monster shows up and you just want to pinch its widdle chubby cheeks?"

"Most students struggle with this concept, but a cute monster is still a monster. No matter how much its widdle chubby cheeks call to you, do not pinch them. Instead, unleash arcane fire and eldritch frost on its adorable little facey-kins!"
Hmm... This is actually pretty interesting.
I'll summon some monsters for practice. Dispatch them however you see fit.
Use whatever spells you think are most appropriate.
How was that, Professor?
Not bad, $MyPCName$. You may be a terrible student, but you have a knack for spellcraft.
Let's move on to the next topic. Give me a moment...
