The old man was one of the Seven Heroes. If I beat him, that'll make me the strongest warrior in Maple World. Why would I leave when my goal is right in front of me?
<font size='30'>Stop being stubborn!</font>
I'm disappointed in you, $MyPCName$. I thought you were more mature than this. However, I see that you're still just a baby, after all.
Baby? Baby? Could a baby use a huge honkin' sword like this?!
Here $male:he,female:she$ goes again...
Hahaha! It seems I need to keep a closer eye on you two.
Hahaha! It seems I need to keep a closer eye on you two.
Lilin. $MyPCName$. Let's have a quick talk.
First, Lilin. Why are you training $MyPCName$?
Well, there is a god of rage sealed inside of $MyPCName$'s body. I thought it would be a good idea to help $male:him,female:her$ rein it in a little.
But $male:he,female:she$ doesn't seem to care at all! Sometimes, I think $male:he,female:she$ wants to let the rage take over.
Hey, I didn't ask to be this way! Why do I have to deal with your nonsense because of something some dusty old ancestors did?!
I was born this way, okay? I can't help it!
You don't have to shout! You'll burst your seal.
That is quite the plan you've come up with, Lilin.
And $MyPCName$, why do you want to beat me so badly?
I already said why! I want to be the strongest warrior in the world. I don't care about gods or seals or any of that other junk.
You're supposed to be the strongest man alive. So if I beat you, then I'll be the strongest.
Incredible logic. Really.
Stop looking down your nose at me! We're the same age, so you don't get to be all high and mighty!
If we're the same age, then why don't you act like it?
You little...!
All right, all right. That's enough, you two. I do believe you'll reach your goals much more quickly if you just work together.
Come with me, both of you. We'll meet at the red greatsword in front of the training yard.
I have much to tell you.
Come with me, both of you. We'll meet at the red greatsword in front of the training yard.
You've probably gotten so used to this greatsword that you don't even notice it anymore. But starting today, that's going to change.
Lilin, this greatsword is what $MyPCName$ needs if $male:he,female:she$ is going to seal away the god of rage for good.
This was that god's weapon. If you can control this blade, then you can control the god that wielded it.
$MyPCName$, that is why you need to trust Lilin. To master the weapon, you must master your own rage.
If you can't do that, then the day you take up this greatsword... is the day that disaster falls upon us all.
Just as it did long ago, when the demon god Maha awoke on Rien Island.
Soooo... if I can master this weapon, I won't just be stronger than you. I'll be stronger than a god?
That isn't a bad angle. And then I could claim to have trained the world's greatest fighter...
I hope you two are taking this seriously!
$MyPCName$, there's no need for you to leave the island. I'll train you personally. But, in exchange, you need to work with Lilin to get your rage under control.
We've got a deal, old man. Lilin, I look forward to training with you.
I've never heard you speak so politely before! It's creeping me out.
See? You're already influencing $male:him,female:her$ for the better.
Follow me, $MyPCName$. We'll begin your real training right away.
What are we doing in this old place? I'm sick of fighting bamboo dummies.
You think there's some secret recipe for real training?
Training is the constant practice of basic skills every day. That's all there is to it.
But some variety is good, so I thought you could start practicing against monsters.
Monsters!
These are the creatures I fought in the war. Some say they were cursed by—
Spare me the history lessons. Let's do this!
Ha! I can see Lilin's going to have her hands full with you.
Very well. I'm going to call the monsters now. Show me what you can do with that oversized blade of yours!
Very well. I'm going to call the monsters now. Show me what you can do with that oversized blade of yours!
You did well, for a novice.
So... this is what fighting monsters feels like...
It's... fun! I want to fight more!
More! Give me more monsters to beat up!
Now you've got a taste for battle. All right. Prepare yourself.
Show me what you can really do!
That was pretty tough... But it was fun!
<font color="#909090">(He turns away and mutters to himself.)</font> <font size='20'>A born warrior, in love with the rush of battle.</font>
<font size='20'>But... if you do not fear death, then you will not cherish life. You will be no better than the god of rage...</font>
<font size='20'>A fear of death... can be learned.</font>
What next, old man? I'm not done!
Now, you will face... me.
Wow! This is the first time you were the one to challenge me.
The battles you've fought until now have been safe, controlled. That isn't the case when you're out in the real world.
How a warrior fights in the training yard is different from how he fights on the battlefield. I think it's time that you learned this difference.
Big talk, old man. Now that I'm warmed up, I'll beat you for sure!
Come, then.
How a warrior fights in the training yard is different from how he fights on the battlefield. I think it's time that you learned this difference.
Are you okay, $MyPCName$? You look pale.
What was that...?
He used all his usual moves, but that aura...
He could've killed me...!
He's been taking it easy on me this whole time...
Well, that's it for the 999th match. You have a long way to go before you're ready for the 1,000th.
Remember what you've learned here. Without a reverence for death, you will be sloppy. A sword should not be swung lightly.
I-I'll keep that in mind...
Grandpa, a courier came from the mainland with a letter! It has the Tria royal seal on it.
I told them I didn't want to hear from them again... All right, let's see it.
The Door of Light... Could it be...?
I wonder how grandpa is doing. He hasn't sent us so much as a letter, and it's been days...
Hmph! I think it's awfully convenient that this happened right after he finally agreed to train me.
It's not that bad! Think of this as a chance to work on your emotional training.
I'm worried... Did you see the old man's face? For something to scare him, of all people...
He did seem awfully worried...
Well, I'm not going to stop training just because he's not here. I want to get my hands on the red sword as soon as I can!
Sure, sure. Start by hitting the training dummy 800 times.
Sorry to break it to you, but fighting dummies doesn't cut it anymore!
Hold on. Do you feel that?
This is no time to talk! We have to fight those... things!
Whew. Those shadow creatures were something else...
Hey, I looked pretty good just now, didn't I?
Hey! Lilin!
This is...
What's up with you? We survived, didn't we?
Take a look at this...
It came from one of those... things.
Take a look at this. It came from one of those... things.
What the...?
I know this cloth. It came from the old man's cape. What were those monsters doing with it?
Could this mean...?
N-no... Grandpa... He can't be...
D-don't be stupid! The old man could eat those chumps for breakfast!
You're supposed to be the smart one, remember? I kicked those shadows' butts. There's no way they could've handled the old man.
Ugh! Why are you even letting yourself think such stupid thoughts?
O-okay... You're right...
Thank you. I feel better now.
Uh... you feeling okay? I don't think I've ever heard you thank me for anything before.
Grandpa... He's the only family I have left.
My parents fell protecting Rien from the god of rage, and my brother left to find a way to defeat him...
Ten took me in and cared for me when I was all alone.
The idea that I might be alone again...
Hey! Aren't you forgetting someone?
Uh... What do you mean?
Am I not family?
We may not be related by blood, but I grew up with you on this stupid hunk of ice.
...I know.
Look, I don't really care either way. But if you do think of me as family, I have bad news for you.
I'm leaving this stinking island!
Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm abandoning you or anything.
I'm going to find the old man. I'm not done with him yet.
And I might learn a thing or two while I'm at it. You're the one who's always saying I should go out and see the world.
Remember, I'm the one who's going to beat the old man. So don't worry about us. Just keep Rien safe.
I'm not sure why, but that's... reassuring.
Thank you, $MyPCName$.
You thanked me! Again! Did one of those monsters knock you on the head?
I... Forget it!
Just try not to get hurt too badly. I'll be waiting for you and grandpa.
<font color="#909090">(The locals said the caravan to $map:02000001$ leaves from here. That's where the old man's letter came from, so it's a good place to start looking for him.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(As much as you hate getting involved in other people's messes, at least if you take the caravan to the capital, you won't have to worry about getting lost.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Why is everyone in such a big hurry to get to Tria, anyway?)</font>
Hello! You look like an adventurer. We happen to be looking to hire caravan guards, if you're interested.
Adventurer? Do I look like a mere adventurer to you?
I am the warrior destined to surpass both demons and gods!
$MyPCName$!
All right, then. Next!
<font color="#909090">(He didn't even bat an eyelash... Who is this man?!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You don't have time for this. You'll defeat him... after you return from Tria.)</font>
Now that things have finally settled down, I think it's about time I paid a visit to a good friend...
It's always so quiet here...
It's always so quiet here...
I like to think that's some comfort to you now. You always seemed to find yourself in the middle of some kind of crisis...
Things haven't been the same without you, Joddy.
A lot of things have happened since you've been gone. I don't even know where to start...
A lot of things have happened since you've been gone. I don't even know where to start...
A lot of things have happened since you've been gone. I don't even know where to start...
Well, I joined up with the crew of the Sky Fortress. It's this huge airship operated by the Maple Alliance. Together we roam around protecting the world from harm. You'd probably love it.
I also met the old captain of the Royal Guard, that Condor guy. Did you ever work with him? He's kind of a character, but he means well.
And then there was this immortal demon named Infernog who wanted to rule the world or something. Things were a little scary for a minute there, but we ended up blasting him into space.
There's been no shortage of threats to this world since then.
It hasn't been easy keeping everyone safe, but I like to think it would at least be a little more fun with you around.
I haven't had to do it alone though. A lot of people have stepped up. Brave people like you, unafraid to risk it all for what they believe in...
Sometimes I can't help but wonder... if I'd only been there, could I have saved you?
If I had only made it there a little sooner... If I had been a little stronger...
Maybe you wouldn't be here.
That's quite enough self-pity.
Huh?
Who are you?
Who are you?
Who are you?
You don't remember me?
I'm $npcName:11003897[gender:1]$, former captain of Tria's Royal Knights.
It was I who instructed $npcName:11003679[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003861[gender:0]$ as cadets...
Unless I'm mistaken, I was also your inspiration for joining the Knights.
My inspiration?
You really don't remember? I was the one who saved you from hoodlums as a child.
Oh! The knight who came to my rescue... That was you?
I suppose I can forgive your confusion... It has been a long time.
Ah! Where are my manners? $MyPCName$ of the Royal Knights, at your service. It's an honor to officially meet you.
Um... Right.
Well, it's good to see that you turned out all right. I hear you're quite famous, $MyPCName$. $npcName:11003679[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003861[gender:0]$ regaled me with tales of your heroism.
They also said that for all your heroism, your journey had taken a heavy toll on you...
Err...
It hasn't helped, has it? Sitting here conversing with the dead?
I'm... not sure... I just know that there's so much I want to say...
I'm... not sure... I just know that there's so much I want to say...
I'm... not sure... I just know that there's so much I want to say...
Reminiscing won't bring back the dead. Revisit those old fond memories all you like, but when you snap back to reality you'll be alone. Just you and the hole in your heart.
Your sentimentality is your greatest weakness.
As a knight, the best thing you can do for yourself, and the world, is to stop second-guessing the past and focus instead on the people who need you now.
Here, take this.
What is it?
A lapenshard. You've probably heard rumors about them by now.
That crystal shard is the talk of the town. A remnant of the world stones known as Lapentas, they're said to grant power to those who seek it. But that's just the musings of an active imagination.
That crystal shard is the talk of the town. A remnant of the world stones known as Lapentas, they're said to grant power to those who seek it. But that's just the musings of an active imagination.
That crystal shard is the talk of the town. A remnant of the world stones known as Lapentas, they're said to grant power to those who seek it. But that's just the musings of an active imagination.
What we do know about the lapenshards is that they began showing up throughout the world right after the attack on Tria.
I believe this lapenshard may be the physical manifestation of the resolve of those who gave their everything defending Tria to their final breaths.
That may sound superstitious, but willpower is a powerful force. One that turns the tides of battle.
Perhaps by holding this shard, you can call upon their courage, even when yours is lacking. A day like today.
The forces of darkness grow stronger by the moment, and the specter of war looms ever closer on horizon.
One day soon the enemy will come for us. When they do, will you still be here wallowing in sadness and self-pity, while more of your friends die?
Now is not the time for mourning. Now is the time to prepare for battle. It is a knight's duty to defend their land until there are no more battles left to fight!
I initially came here to offer some words of inspiration and set you back on the right path, but I see now that words won't be enough.
I initially came here to offer some words of inspiration and set you back on the right path, but I see now that words won't be enough.
I initially came here to offer some words of inspiration and set you back on the right path, but I see now that words won't be enough.
It's time someone reminded you of your vow to the knights. Very well. I will train you. Follow me!
Wait just a minute...
You can sit here crying over the dead forever, or you can let me teach you how to channel that pain and become a better knight. The choice is yours.
...Teach me.
Hah. That's more like it. Let's get started!
That was an excellent display of skill and focus. We haven't been at it long, yet you've made impressive progress.
That was an excellent display of skill and focus. We haven't been at it long, yet you've made impressive progress.
That was an excellent display of skill and focus. We haven't been at it long, yet you've made impressive progress.

$MyPCName$, I think you're ready to resume your duties. This job will never be without loss and sacrifice, but remember, dwelling in the past is a choice. Keep your eyes focused on the road ahead, and never take for granted the good that you've done.
I have to say, I'm impressed you managed to keep up with all of my lessons, despite the difficulty. Good work.
I have to say, I'm impressed you managed to keep up with all of my lessons, despite the difficulty. Good work.
I have to say, I'm impressed you managed to keep up with all of my lessons, despite the difficulty. Good work.
Thanks. But I've still got a ways to go if I'm going to live up to the determination of the heroes before me.
Err, I meant considering how physically demanding your training was...
Considering I added around a hundred pounds of weights to your training equipment.
Oh, I see... Wait what?!
That's insane! How is anyone supposed to train under those conditions?
Umm... Was that too much? That might explain why $npcName:11003679[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003861[gender:0]$ asked for a different instructor...
No wonder it felt so heavy! Do you have any idea how hard I worked, the whole time thinking I was weak?
Enough! Your temper is unbecoming of a knight.
Think on this: you completed your training, did you not? Whatever the difficulty, you made it through, and you'll be a better knight because of it.
Well, I guess you're right. By the end of our training the weights actually felt pretty light.
Fascinating. It seems the stories about the lapenshards are more than rumor.
Your determination to grow stronger caused the lapenshard to resonate, awakening a greater power within you.
If that's the case, then... the lapenshards are more than just a symbol.
If that's the case, then... the lapenshards are more than just a symbol.
If that's the case, then... the lapenshards are more than just a symbol.
That must be why the Frontier Foundation was created.
The what?
An relatively new organization that serves the royal family. Their goal is to control the supply of lapenshards.

The stories surrounding the lapenshards has power-hungry individuals throughout the world frantically snapping up the crystal shards. The Frontier Foundation must have been created in the hopes of keeping them from falling into the wrong hands.
I thought that it was nonsense, and a serious misappropriation of resources... But in light of your progress, I now see the danger posed by the lapenshards.
Undoubtedly, in the hands of someone like yourself, a lapenshard could be a wondrous thing. But...
The forces of darkness are probably after them too.
That's right. So if the Frontier Foundation is working to keep them in check, that's a very noble cause. Hmm...
$MyPCName$, I believe that aiding the Frontier Foundation will be an excellent test of your newfound strength.
Not to mention a way to honor the bravery of the knights who have fallen in battle. We can't allow the lapenshards to fall into enemy hands.
Go $MyPCName$. Your training is complete.
You're not coming with me?
No, I have things I need to take care of. Although your lesson has made me late.
Leaving so soon? We've only just reunited after all these years... Well, I'm glad I finally got to meet you. I'll never forget what you've done for me.
Don't be so sappy. Our business is concluded. You don't owe me anything.
Still, I suppose you turned out better than my other more pretentious students.
If fate wills it, we'll meet again. Until then, take care of yourself.
All right then! Until we meet again!
By the goddess, I've never seen such an injury... What kind of foe did they encounter?
I'm not sure. All I heard is that they encountered some manner of wraith...
I hope $MyPCName$ arrives soon.
I pray $male:he,female:she$ can save them...
Your Excellency, I've arrived!
Your Excellency, I've arrived!
Thank you for coming... I trust you read my message?
Yes! Several times. An incurable wound inflicted by an unidentified wraith...
But there is one thing I don't understand. If their wounds are beyond even your own healing abilities...
How could I possibly be of aid?
Don't say that, $MyPCName$. Your light shines brighter than anyone I have yet encountered.
And more importantly, we detected traces of magic very similar to your own in the soldiers wounds.
What?!
We're not saying we believe you're responsible, or that your power is tainted with darkness.
We're not saying we believe you're responsible, or that your power is tainted with darkness.
We're not saying we believe you're responsible, or that your power is tainted with darkness.
But rather, your light and this darkness are two sides of the same coin—in direct opposition. If anyone can save these poor souls, I believe it's you.
$npcName:11003901[gender:0]$...
Please do your utmost to heal these men. I believe you can do it.
We can't let these young guardsmen go so soon to their graves. Not like that poor child.
His name was $npcName:11003344[gender:0]$.
...I understand what's at stake. I'll do my best.
No, I will save them.
$MyPCName$, believe in yourself.
Their fate is in your hands, $MyPCName$.
Goddess of light, grant me the power to heal their affliction.
<font color="#909090">(A wave of warm, healing light flows through your body.)</font>
Did it work?
Did it work?
Did it work?
I can feel the lifeforce flowing into them, but...
But? What is it you're not saying, Luanna?
Miss Luanna, I don't feel so good... AGHHH!
Even as their lifeforce returns, it is becoming twisted... Whatever their affliction is, our attempts to save them has only made them worse...
Impossible!
...I can't save them. I don't know why I ever thought I might be able to.
I couldn't heal the others either.
So many guards lost their lives in the siege of Tria...
I'll never be strong enough to save the people I care about... <font color="#909090">(Hot tears begin to stream down your cheeks.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(He coughs violently.)</font> You're wrong, $MyPCName$!
<font color="#909090">(He coughs violently.)</font> You're wrong, $MyPCName$!
<font color="#909090">(He coughs violently.)</font> You're wrong, $MyPCName$!
You saved so many lives during the siege.
<font color="#909090">(The soldier wheezes, struggling for breath.)</font> If you hadn't been there... I would have lost so many more of my friends that day...
You're a hero... You dropped everything to come and help us... I'm so grateful... Even if... <font color="#909090">(His eyes grow wide.)</font>
Ugh...!
H-hey! Wake up!
You open your eyes, soldier, it's not your time!
...I'm not sensing any signs of life.
...I'm not sensing any signs of life.
...I'm not sensing any signs of life.
Was I mistaken?
No! I still feel it! The echo of life!
Huh? What are you saying?
I can't just give up... I'm not letting them go without a fight!
Wh-what just happened?!
Wh-what just happened?!
Wh-what just happened?!
What are these lights...?
Look, $npcName:11003901[gender:0]$. It's a miracle.
I... I don't understand it, my wounds are healed! I don't even feel any pain.
I... I don't understand it, my wounds are healed! I don't even feel any pain.
I... I don't understand it, my wounds are healed! I don't even feel any pain.
By the goddess, I've seen the other side...
I've never been so grateful to be alive!
Unbelievable. $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, have you ever seen anything like it?
No. I've only read of such occurrences in ancient literature. A brilliant, cleansing light capable of pulling the dying back from the edge of death.
But $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, no human has ever performed such a feat. That power has belonged only to the goddess of light herself!
Hehe... There's a first time for everything.
I was actually dead there for a minute... You brought me back. I don't know how I can repay you all for this second shot at life!
I'm afraid I can't take any credit here. This was all $MyPCName$'s doing.

If you'll all excuse me, I should go deliver the good news to our old friend $npcName:11003862[gender:0]$. It's been some time since I've seen the man cry, but if memory serves it should be quite the show.
$MyPCName$, thank you... thank so much! You're our savior!
$MyPCName$, thank you... thank so much! You're our savior!
$MyPCName$, thank you... thank so much! You're our savior!
Please, there must be something we can do to return the favor!
Hahaha. There's no need for that. It's enough just knowing you're all going to be fine.
What? No way! We've got to celebrate! Hey, I know! Let's crack open the Vanguard Captain's snack safe!
But what if you get caught?
Pfft. The old man won't notice. He spends most of his time on that airship.
Besides, if he does, $MyPCName$ can always revive you! Assuming there's something left to revive. Heheheh.
Erm... Hehe...
Heh... It seems their wounds are completely healed.
I knew you had it in you, $MyPCName$.
High Priestess $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, did you send for me?
High Priestess $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, did you send for me?
High Priestess $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$, did you send for me?
Hello $MyPCName$. How was the party? I can scarcely believe the captain truly kept a snack safe.

Indeed. And when he caught them in the act, I never would've imagined he'd crack the thing open himself. And after he finished handing out snacks, he goes to the kitchen and starts cooking for everybody. Of course, he was bawling the whole time. I don't believe I've ever seen a grown man cry like that.
I guess $npcName:11003862[gender:0]$ really cares about the guardsmen.
It seems he's not the only one.
Hehe... You're embarrassing me, High Priestess.
You have a big heart, $MyPCName$. The way you care so deeply for others is part of what makes you such a great hero.
But priestess... Heart and good intentions don't account for the power of the spell I conjured. I'm the same person today as I was during the siege of Tria.
Well, I might be able to shed some light on that matter.
Have you ever seen one of these before?
Is that one of those crystals that've been cropping up everywhere?
Indeed. This is a lapenshard. There are many rumors surrounding it, and for good reason.
They are believed to be shards of the lapentas. Great crystals with power over the fundamental forces that make up this world.
It is said that the lapenshards grant power to those that seek it. I believe the power you demonstrated today is connected to this.

I only just learned this but, before they were injured, the guardsmen you met today were tasked with locating a lapenshard. The entity they encountered was also after the crystal, and a fight broke out.
And we discovered fragments of the lapenshard inside the guardsmen's wounds... They were merely fragments, but I believe it was their power that reacted to your efforts.
$MyPCName$, what do you think about the idea of learning more about the lapenshards? If you can unlock the secrets of their power...
You could become the greatest healer in history.
The greatest healer in history...?
The greatest healer in history...?
The greatest healer in history...?
High Priestess, I've never given much thought to what awaits us in the distant future. I'm not concerned with legacy...
But... I never want to lose another person I care about because I wasn't strong enough to save them.
If I could learn to call upon the power of that brilliant light at will... I could do so much good for this world.
I believe you can.
That's actually part of why I called you here. I want to introduce you to a new organization that was recently established organization by the royal court.
What's this?
A recruitment flier from the Frontier Foundation, an organization created to regulate lapenshards and prevent them from falling into the wrong hands.

As the foremost authority in the study of lapenshards, there's a great deal you could learn there. It is my hope that you might harness the power of the lapenshards and use it to do great things for this world.
Thank you, $npcName:11003904[gender:1]$. I'll set out for the Foundation at once and see what I can learn.
Walk in the light of the goddess.
(You received a letter from your old assistant!) Dear Boss! Hiya. It's me, $npcName:11003929[gender:1]$.
So, uh, it's been a while, right? You didn't forget about me, did you?
Aaaaand I haven't checked in on her since we left home. Whoops.
Ever since you went off to work for the empire, I've been here in the lab, trying to build a new fusion core. It's hard work...
He's got a lab assistant doing the work of a real genius... like me!
To be honest, I'm not real good at writing letters. I'd have called you, but I think somebody might've listened in. Drop by the lab when you get a chance... I've got something to show you.
Not good at writing letters? She isn't kidding. Well, I'd better go see what kind of mess she's got herself in...
$npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, my loyal assistant! Did ya miss me?
$npcName:11003929[gender:0]$, my loyal assistant! Did ya miss me?
Boss! I didn't think you'd come so quick. I figured you'd have more important things to do...
Well, that's okay! I can make some time for you. Anyway, like my letter said, there's something you've gotta see...
Thanks. I feel so loved.
What's this all about, anyway? You think someone's listening to your phone calls?
Shh! Keep your voice down, Boss. There are ears everywhere.
<font size='5'>Whisper whisper whisper mumble mumble...</font>
<font size='5'>Whisper whisper whisper mumble mumble...</font>
<font color="#909090">(She motions for you to come close, and you lean in to listen to her.)</font> <font size='5'>Whisper whisper whisper mumble mumble...</font>
But that's...
<font size='5'>Psst psst whisper mumble whisper!</font>
Unbelievable...
<font size='5'>Whisper whisper whisper whisper whisper mumble whisper.</font>
I hate to admit it, $npcName:11003929$, but I can't understand a word you're saying!!

Take a look at this.

The reason the Runeblades split into sects was not merely a matter of specialization. But rather, it was due to the limitations of the human body.

To reach the pinnacle of bladecraft or the runic arts, one must unlock an immense power—one that cannot be reconciled with the power of the other art. You cannot master one and still seek the other; the body simply cannot withstand that much power.

Those strange crystals are said to grant power to those who desire it. Not long ago, they began appearing throughout the world. No one knows precisely how or why.
$MyPCName$, speaking of the lapenshards, the royal court has requested Terrun Calibre's aid.
$MyPCName$, speaking of the lapenshards, the royal court has requested Terrun Calibre's aid.

$map:63000020$ is awfully quiet when nobody's around. Makes you feel lonely.

$map:63000020$ is awfully quiet when nobody's around. Makes you feel lonely.
Well, I guess it's only appropriate for the solitary Gray Wolf.
Sigh... that persona is kind of pathetic when you think about it. Is that really all I am? A wild dog without a pack, knowing only the hunt and destined for solitude?
After all this time I'm back in my hometown, and there's no one to greet me. It's ironic... You spend your whole life fighting for others, and you end up alone...
What was it all for, anyway? Sure I managed to keep my neighborhood safe—but I couldn't protect the world beyond it. There have been so many people I couldn't save...
In the end, I was only as tough as the local bullies.
I was a big fish in a small pond, but I've moved outside the pond now.
I was a big fish in a small pond, but I've moved outside the pond now.
I was a big fish in a small pond, but I've moved outside the pond now.
And now I'm just another fish.
There is no simple training regimen that will make me stronger. Not as strong as I need to become. I need to make a leap, but I don't even have someone to show me the way.
There's got to be some path forward...
<font size='40'>Nothing puts things in perspective like a good fight.</font>
$npcName:11003948[gender:0]$? What are you doing here?
$npcName:11003948[gender:0]$? What are you doing here?
$npcName:11003948[gender:0]$? What are you doing here?
I should be asking you that. This is Blackstar's turf. I came because I heard the Wolf had returned to its den.
I guess Blackstar really does have eyes and ears in this place. Would you believe me if I told you I was here to take down your dear old dad and dissolve the organization?
Of course not. You'd have to beat me in order to do that.
Don't worry. I didn't come looking for a fight. I'm just here to think.
You, think? Is that a joke?
What, beating people with your fists wasn't enough? You've moved on to emotional abuse?
Hahaha. You're serious then, aren't you?
You've piqued my interest. Let's chat, you and I.
I didn't realize Blackstar had opened up a psychological counseling center... What is this world coming to?
Sigh... Sure. I'm not getting anywhere talking to myself. It'd be nice to have an outside perspective.
I want to become stronger. I took up the mantle of the Gray Wolf to protect the weak. But out there in the real world, I'm the one that's weak.
I want to become stronger. I took up the mantle of the Gray Wolf to protect the weak. But out there in the real world, I'm the one that's weak.
I want to become stronger. I took up the mantle of the Gray Wolf to protect the weak. But out there in the real world, I'm the one that's weak.
...That's it? That's what you're moping about? I thought you were going to say something more interesting.
...I thought you were going to at least try to be supportive.
What were you doing all this time, sitting around with friends and talking about feelings? I heard you were off fighting evil and saving the world. Was that just an exaggeration?
Hey!
Wolf, you've grown complacent listening to all those excuses in your head. You're starting to believe your own lies.
You say you want to protect the weak?

People like us don't fight out of some self-righteous sense of duty. We fight because there's nothing we love more in this world. The pumping adrenaline, the elation of crushing your foes with nothing more than your own raw power and skill. Ours is an endless quest to prove ourselves to the cosmos.
All these lofty ideals are just a justification to fight. What you truly want is to become stronger, to fight better. Tell me I'm wrong.
Hmph...
You've got a way with words for such a meathead.
You've got a way with words for such a meathead.
You've got a way with words for such a meathead.
Maybe you're right. If saving the world was really all I was after, I guess I would have joined the Royal Knights.

But if you have the capacity to do something that no one else can, something good—then you owe it to the world to do it. Protecting the world is my calling. There's nothing I want more than to get better at it.
So what you're saying is, your goal can only be reached by getting stronger? That sounds awfully like something I said just moments ago.
So you want to get tougher? Then let's talk about something else.
Forget Blackstar, forget saving the world. Let's talk purely about martial arts.
Hehe... If we're going to have a conversation about martial arts, a fist is worth a thousand words. Like you said, there's nothing greater than the thrill of the fight.
Hah. You haven't accepted any suspicious drinks, have you? I want a fair fight this time.
<font size='40'>Great! Then let's dance!</font>
I guess you really deserve your title as the champion of $map:63000020$. I was sure I'd crush you easily, but you turned out to be a formidable opponent.
I guess you really deserve your title as the champion of $map:63000020$. I was sure I'd crush you easily, but you turned out to be a formidable opponent.
I guess you really deserve your title as the champion of $map:63000020$. I was sure I'd crush you easily, but you turned out to be a formidable opponent.
I could say the same of you. You were better than I expected, $MyPCName$.
You were right. When I abandoned any pretenses, and gave in completely to the thrill of the fight, I was able to move and strike more swiftly and effortlessly than ever before.
You were right. When I abandoned any pretenses, and gave in completely to the thrill of the fight, I was able to move and strike more swiftly and effortlessly than ever before.
You were right. When I abandoned any pretenses, and gave in completely to the thrill of the fight, I was able to move and strike more swiftly and effortlessly than ever before.
I think... I think I finally see a way forward!
Heh... Perhaps I was too quick to judge. You were right too. A fist guided by purpose possesses tremendous power.
I've only ever thought of getting stronger for strength's sake. I've never considered what my power was for.
I think it's time I left this place and went on an adventure of my own. Perhaps I'll grow as you have if I discover my own sense of purpose.
I too had hit a wall with my training and the limits of my potential. It seems that this stone has shown us both the way forward.
Huh? What's that?
Huh? What's that?
Huh...? What's that?
This crystal is called a lapenshard—it's a mysterious object that's supposed to grant new powers to those who want to be strong.
I don't believe in miracles, but it's proven more effective than any supplement I've ever taken.
This lapenshard is the reason I've come to you. The boss ordered me to bring it to you when he learned you were back.
You see, he has a new mission for the Wolf. You are to join the Frontier Foundation, the organization regulating the use of the lapenshards, and serve as an informant for Blackstar.
Join the "Frontier Foundation?" Why would I want to do a thing like that?

I've already told you. By imperial decree, the Foundation is the organization in charge of regulating the use of these mysterious gems. And they've shown themselves to be very unhappy with Blackstar profiting from their sale.
So... you want me to be a mole in their organization?
That's right. The Foundation is openly recruiting adventurers. They would never suspect you for a member of Blackstar.
Anyways, that's what the boss said.
Now I'll give you my own opinion.
Now I'll give you my own opinion.
Now I'll give you my own opinion.
<font color="#909090">(He pulls a device from his pocket, drops it on the floor, and steps on it.)</font> <font size='40'>Crunch.</font>
What are you doing?! That looked expensive! Why'd you break it?
It's just one of Blackstar's many listening devices. We've got them all over the world.
The boss told me to place this on you. He intended to use you as a mole in the Frontier Foundation whether you agreed or not.
It's too bad it broke during our fight. <font color="#909090">(He grins.)</font>
Hey...
Go to the Frontier Foundation. Not because it's what my father wanted, but because there you can learn more about the lapenshards which have opened new paths for the both of us.
And because you'll grow stronger in the fight against those who want to misuse them.
And I will follow my own path, growing stronger in the search for my own purpose.
And the next time we meet, we'll finish this fight of ours.
Hm. I have to admit, you're an okay guy.
Get out of here. Blackstar suits will be here soon.
Thanks. I'll see you later, I guess!
As we anticipated, my brother has released the Wolf from its leash. We will proceed accordingly.
Hah. Everything went just like you said it would. I'm impressed $npcName:11003182[gender:0]$.
I was merely a pawn, ensuring the course of your own great designs.
Hehe... You know just what people want to hear, don't you?
I'm looking forward to our little Wolf friend's progress. That muscly brother of yours, too.
And I as well, Boss.
Are these all adventurers looking to join the foundation? There's so many of them.
Are these all adventurers looking to join the foundation? There's so many of them.
Are these all adventurers looking to join the foundation? There's so many of them.
I should have a look around...

Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
Before she begins, there is one matter I wish to clarify... If the young miss should say something unusual, please do not take offense. It is not her intent to be rude...
Pemberton, I don't remember deciding there would be any speeches at this event! This is not some common gala!
This is a solemn occasion. We are here to forge a pact between our family, these adventurers, and myself. We are here to issue a proclamation to the world!
...Ahem. Welcome, adventurers, my honored guests—you who go forth boldly to serve as the eyes, ears, hands, and feet of this great new endeavor.
I am Lady Beatrice, director of the Frontier Foundation.
I trust the tea and hors d'ouevres were to everyone's liking? They were prepared by a world-class chef, after all.
But I'm afraid we don't have time for such niceties. The matter at hand is most serious.
As you all know, an unprecedented phenomenon is occurring throughout this world. These so-called lapenshards, these mysterious crystals, are cropping up everywhere you look.

You've all no doubt heard the stories—a miraculous stone granting power to those in want. You might have guessed that these crystals are, as their name denotes, miniatures of the very same lapentas created by the sages in times past.
You might be thinking, "these mere fragments surely cannot match the power of an unblemished lapenta!" Yes, that much is true. But they are still powerful enough to throw this world into crisis.
These crystals' minute size makes them trivial to gather and transport, and so they make their way rapidly across the land, empowering dangerous villains and causing strange and dangerous phenomena.

Funded by the gracious contributions of Tria's aristocracy—including Prime Minister Vidrem, and some of my own allowance—this Frontier Foundation was established to prevent exactly such situations as these.
The mission of the Frontier Foundation is simple. We travel far and wide to collect the lapenshards and gather them here, where we can carefully regulate them and prevent their misuse.
It is for this duty you were recruited. We have invited experts on the lapentas from all over. Allow me to present Terrun Calibre and Guidance, both friends to the royal court.
Well met, adventurers. My name is $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$ and I am a Runeblade of Terrun Calibre. It's an honor to be working alongside you.
Uh... Hi. I'm, uh, $npcName:11004029[gender:0]$... of... Guidance...
Speak up, brother $npcName:11004029[gender:0]$. They can't hear you. Brother, are you shaking?
Oh, um, hi! I'm $npcName:11003977[gender:1]$. I'm also from Guidance. You might have noticed we're not humans. We don't bite. We're just a little different, like Balon of the Seven Heroes.
Aren't you going to say something Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$...? Um... Brother? You look pale. Remember your breathing! In through the nose, out through the mouth!
Well then... We have invited this assembly of experts to the foundation because we believe their knowledge of rune magic and animus will prove valuable toward locating the lapenshards.
Wait a moment... Pemberton, do my eyes deceive me? Is that...?
Ah! You are correct, miss. That is the young $male:man,female:lady$ you've been looking for...
$MyPCName$!
$MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!
$MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!
$MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!
Perhaps it's destiny...
Um... Have we met somewhere?
I could never forget the face of my savior! Oh brave warrior, guardian of my tender flesh...
I quite understand your confusion, $MyPCName$. The young miss was but one of the many people you saved on that day.
I speak of course of the attack on Tria.
The young lady receives regular treatment in Tria for a chronic illness. She was undergoing such a treatment the day Tria was besieged.
Who could have anticipated such an attack? The war against the dark host always seemed such a distant matter.
Seeing that great army beyond the city walls, I truly believed it was the end. Though we were prepared to evacuate, there was no route of escape.
And then I saw you, $MyPCName$, standing against that indomitable horde.
Of course everyone who fought for Tria that day was a hero. But without you there to defend the royal court, I shudder to think what might have happened.
Ever since that day the young miss has been looking for you, $MyPCName$. Oh, but I don't mean to imply she's obsessed...
I've been formulating a plan to acquire you for my own... Hehe...
That's not at all a creepy thing to say.
Oh! But I'm making a scene. Now, everyone, this concludes our commencement ceremony!
Adventurers, please join with your assigned groups and begin your missions. You will find all the pertinent details on your handouts.
$MyPCName$, oh arbiter of my fate—a moment of your time please.
As one of our most elite adventurers, you will serve under the direct control of the foundation director—that's me. In other words I will be entrusting you with the Foundation's most urgent mission.
I will come for you, after preparations are complete... Hehe.
$npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.
$npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.
$npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.

I have to say, your plan was pretty detailed. Pairing them up based on their traits and abilities was a smart move. I'm surprised you were able to size them up so quick... Were you trained as a tactician?
Something like that! I'm pretty quick-witted, but it was actually Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ who came up with the assignments. Err... $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$?
Oh my... that $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ is so timid. Come over here and make some friends!
I'm not here to make friends. Get ready to go, we have our own assignments.
Aw! This is the perfect opportunity for Guidance to make a good first impression, and this is how you're using it? Oh! Our elite adventurer is here!
Um... Hello.
Director, let's get started.
You may lead the briefing, oh Moonlight Blade. I am satisfied simply to have $MyPCName$ in my servitude. Hehehe...

Yeesh. This is hard to watch. Reminds me of when you were younger, eh Eupheria? Whenever we were supposed to be training, you'd be off in your own world staring at $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$. Ow! What was that for?!
Close your mouth or I will cut out your tongue.
...Right. $MyPCName$, barring any further outbursts, I will now explain your personal assignment for the foundation.
We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.
We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.
We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.
Since their appearance, there have been a number of incidents surrounding the lapenshards.
These incidents can largely be divided into two categories.
The first is the unauthorized distribution and misuse of the lapenshards.
Of special concern is the issue of evildoers and enemies of the common good who seek the lapenshards in the hopes of unleashing their power.
The adventurers we have just dispatched were tasked with preventing the acquisition and sale of lapenshards throughout the world.
The second class of incidents involve climate anomalies localized to specific regions.

At first glance, these incidents are nothing more than extreme weather phenomena. But they all began at about the same time the lapenshards appeared, and it is my belief that they have persisted far too long to be natural in cause.

Two such cases seem especially suspicious. To the south, the seas churn wildly, endangering any ships who sail them. To the northeast in the chilly mountains of El Nath, an unending blizzard rages cold enough to cause hypothermia in mere minutes.
It is my firm belief that these occurrences are connected to the lapenshards. Of course, we'll need to analyze each situation in order to determine the appropriate course of action.

Just bring a sample of any shards you find in the affected area, and I'll analyze it down to the microscopic level. Teehee. Oh, and there's something I want to talk to you about when we're done here...
<font color="#909090">(You give her a glib smile and a thumbs up.)</font>
$MyPCName$, it will be your personal assignment to investigate these strange phenomena, determine if they are indeed tied to the lapenshards, and, if possible, determine how best to end them.
Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ and I will go on ahead and investigate the blizzard in El Nath. Our fur and feathers offer us some protection from the extreme cold.
$MyPCName$, I'll leave the ocean disturbances to you. I imagine you won't have too much trouble with the intelligence we've already gathered.
Already? Outstanding. I see my allowance is not wasted.
Well then, I leave Maple World's safety in all of your capable hands. Especially yours, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry for not introducing myself sooner. I'm $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, a Psion called to provide my expertise to the foundation.
If the Foundation was looking for someone with experience in magical objects like the lapenshards, they've found an expert in me!
By the way, there's something else I want to discuss with you. Do you have a moment?
The Foundation charter stipulates that adventurers carrying out special assignments on behalf of the organization are given special dispensation to make use of the lapenshards.
That's only part of why I wanted to talk to you. Hehehehe...
<font color="#909090">(What's with the creepy look on her face?)</font>
You smell like lapenshard. Or rather, I sense the energy of a lapenta emanating from your body.
I don't know how or where you obtained such a power, but... That makes you a very interesting specimen, $MyPCName$.
I would be very interested to see what you are capable of with even more powerful lapenshards.
As you already know, the Frontier Foundation's primary purpose is acquiring and regulating the lapenshards. But what does regulation entail, anyway?
I'd say that conducting research on the possible weaponization of lapenshards through the creation of a super-powered army falls under that umbrella.

Hehehe... What do you say, $MyPCName$? Why don't you think of this as another special assignment for the Foundation's favorite adventurer! Collect the lapenshards, use them to your heart's content, and let me study their effects on you!
There's no better way to learn about what different lapenshards can do than through trial and error, right? Here, why don't you try this one on for size and see what happens?
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry for not introducing myself sooner. I'm $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, a Psion called to provide my expertise to the foundation.
Well, were you able to use the lapenshard I gave you? Tell the truth now!
Hehe. You didn't have any trouble did you?
Surely someone oozing with as much lapenta energy as you are can manage that little fragment.
Fine, don't tell me! However you decide to use the lapenshards, the Foundation is counting on you.
이봐, 이봐!!
두리번 거린다.
여기라고 여기!! 네가 보고 있는 책장 맞아! 나 이 안에 있다고!
가만히 듣는다.
어떤 자식이 나를 이리로 옮겨다 꽂아놔 버렸어. 이 안은 온통 거칠고 자극적인 녀석들 뿐이라고! 이런 놈들과 나란히 꽂혀 있어야 하다니, 견딜 수가 없다, 정말!
원하는 게 뭔지 묻는다.
빨리 날 여기서 꺼내서 내가 원래 꽂혀 있던 책장으로 옮겨줘. 참, 그 책장은 잠겨 있을 거야. 열쇠는 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000216$</font>$pp:가,이$ 가지고 있어.
어떻게 된 거야?
책이 무거워 잠시 내려놨었다고 말한다.
그냥 지나가는 길이라고 말한다.
내려놓긴…… 도서관 바닥에 날 팽개치고 가버렸잖아.
어떻게 책장에 다시 꽂혔는지 물어본다.
망할 놈의 몬스터가 다시 여기다 꽂아 놨어! 빨리 나 좀 데려가.
더 이상 엉뚱한 생각하지 말고, 날 원래 있던 책장으로 옮겨줘.
몬스터가 다시 여기다 꽂아 놨어! 으응? 가방 안이 꽉 찼잖아! 내가 들어갈 공간 좀 마련해 봐!
이 책장 근처에 있기도 싫으니 빨리 지나가자.
이야, 반갑다 친구들아! 하하하.
마음에 드는지 묻는다.
물론이지! 내 집에 돌아온 거잖아. 가슴이 두근두근! 하하하.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000118$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 갈 거면 부탁 하나 합시다!
근위대 기지에 비축된 식량이 부족하다며 음식 들고 와달라는 요청을 받았는데, 음식처럼 상할 수 있는 걸 봇짐에 잔뜩 넣고 다닐 리가 없잖수.
음식을 구하러 인근 마을에 들렀다 가야 하니, 시간 좀 걸릴 거 같다고 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000157[gender:0]$</font>에게 좀 전해 주시오.
참, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000118$</font>에 몬스터들이 많다고 하던데…… 나 가는 길 좀 편하게 몬스터들 좀 쫓아버려 주겠소?
원래 이렇게 굼뜬 편이요? 뭐 하고 있는 거요?
$npc:11000546[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ 늦는다고요? 아쉽지만, 어쩔 수 없는 거 아닙니까. 반대편 기지에서도 조치를 취하고 있으니 어떻게든 해결될 겁니다.
어서 오세요! 계산하실 물건은 없나요? 괜찮아요. 마트에 꼭 물건 사러 오나요? 구경도 하고, 이웃과 만나면 수다도 떠는 거죠.
그나저나 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000244$</font>의 재고 수량이 또 부족하네요. 사장님이 알기 전에 제 돈으로 메꿔야 할 판이에요.
부족한 이유를 아냐고 물어본다.
$npc:21000013$$pp:가,이$ 슬쩍 하는 걸 본 직원이 있어요. 그런데, 워낙 험상궂게 생겨서 제지도 못 하고, 못 본 척 했나봐요.
그런데 웃긴 건 그 얼굴에 어울리지 않게 엄청 긴장해서 손을 벌벌 떨고 있더래요. 하하하. 에휴, 누군가 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000013$</font>$pp:가,이$ 훔쳐 간 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000244$</font>$pp:를,을$ 찾아다 주면 좋으련만……
사장님에게 말해봤자 소용없어요. 되려 저희를 의심하실 거예요.
감사합니다. 잃어버린 수량 모두 되찾았네요!!
예전에는 공원을 지키다 보면 수고한다면서 음료수를 건네 주는 분들이 종종 있었는데 말입니다. 요즘은 세태가 각박해져서 그런지 그런 분들이 전혀 안 계십니다.
공원을 지켜야 해서 음료수 사러 갈 여유도 없는데 말입니다. 마침 목이 말라 드리는 말씀은 아닙니다! 공짜를 바라는 건 더더욱 아니고요.
원하는 게 뭔지 물어본다.
$MyPCName$님이 $map:2000209$에 가셔서 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000245$</font> 하나만 가져다 주셨으면 합니다. <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000795[gender:1]$</font>에게 제가 시킨 심부름이라고 말하면 그냥 줄 거예요.
햇살 아래 입이 바싹바싹 마르다 보니, $item:30000245$ 생각이 간절하네요.
어서 오세요. 계산 도와 드릴게요.
$item:30000245$$pp:를,을$ 찾는 분들이 많네요. 냉장고에 좀 더 채워놔야겠어요.
$npc:11000352[gender:0]$의 심부름으로 왔다고 말한다.
어머, 이걸 어쩌죠. 사장님께서 $npc:11000352[gender:0]$의 외상값이 너무 많으니 더 이상 외상으로 물건을 주지 말라고 하셔서요.

처음 보는 사람이 나한테 와서는 가방을 숨겨달라고 하더라고. 돈을 세어보지도 않고 내 손에 쥐어주는데, 얼핏 봐도 거절할 수 없는 금액인 거야!

몬스터들은 원래 나쁜 놈들이야. 이 일이 아니더라도 세상에 불필요한 놈들이라고!

어우, 온 몸이 다 쑤시네. 젠장, 불길한 예감은 틀린 법이 없다니까.

휴, 나도 막 발차기로 녀석들을 박살낼 참이었는데… 네 녀석이 나보다 반박자 빨랐다.
어쨌든 네 덕에 내 힘을 아낄 수 있었으니…고맙다.
관리인도 없고 완전히 버려진 창고에 왜 경비 시스템이 갖춰져 있는 거지? 젠장, 방심하다가 꼴만 우스워졌잖아.
야, 그런데 여기 구린내 나지 않냐? 먼지 쌓인 창고에 이런 경비 시스템이라니…수상한데? 좀 더 뒤져보자.
의심 가는 곳은 전부 뒤져 봐.
뭐 좀 찾은 거라도 있어?
쓸만한 정보는 못 찾았다고 말한다.
뭔가 열심히 하는 것 같더니, 별로 실속은 없구만! 더 찾아보자.
아까 우릴 공격한 놈들, 파괴된 잔해에서 전자 칩을 주웠는데… 여기 뭐라고 적혀 있냐면 말이지… 쳇! 거 무지하게 깨알같이 적어놨네.
가만…비욘드 링크 데이터베이스 허브 인프라 코어 어쩌고저쩌고… 뭘 이렇게 어렵게 잔뜩 써놨어. 젠장.
…어라? 이봐, 찾았다! 이거다 이거. <font color="#ffd200">$map:03000145$</font> 데이터 허브… 데이터 허브? 흠…뭔 소리야?
뭔 소린지 하나도 모르겠네.
아, 뭔 소리든 간에 $map:03000145$$pp:와,과$ 관계있단 얘기잖아. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$, 우린 $map:03000145$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.
잿빛의 이리! 너한테는 나중에 $npcName:11000610[gender:0]$$pp:를,을$ 통해 다시 연락할 테니 기다리고 있어.
$npcName:11001679[gender:0]$$pp:랑,이랑$ 다른 한 녀석…아, 이름이 또 생각 안 나네. 엘리? $npcName:11001687[gender:0]$? 아무튼 그 녀석들이 $map:03000145$에 있는 $map:52000039$$pp2:로,으로$ 갔어.
너도 합류하라는 지시가 내려왔으니, 얼른 녀석들에게 가 봐. 그 녀석들 위험에 처해 당황해하고 있을지 모른다고!
얼른 가 봐.
왜 이제 온 거야? 그래, 이제라도 왔으니 다행이야!!!
$npcName:11001679[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ 몬스터에게 끌려갔어. 서둘러 녀석을 찾아야 해.
이렇게 얘기할 시간이 없어. 빨리 날 따라와.
어서 $npcName:11001679[gender:0]$$pp:를,을$ 찾아야 해!
헉헉헉… 재…잿빛의 이리…난 괜찮아…괜찮아…
저기 저…$npcName:11001687[gender:0]$ 저 녀석 어떤지 살펴봐 줘.
나…나도 괜찮아! 고맙다, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>! <font color="#ffd200">잿빛의 이리</font>라는 별명이 괜히 붙은 건 아니군.
이러고 있을 때가 아니야. $npcName:11001679[gender:0]$$pp:를,을$ 구했으니, 빨리 이곳을 조사하자고!
서두르자!
이거 우리가 조사하기엔 너무 일이 큰 거 아냐? 비욘드 링크의 실체를 파악하려면 비욘드 링크 센터로 잠입을 하거나 쳐들어가야 할 거 같은데?
아무래도 여기까지만 조사하고, 보스에게 지금까지의 일에 대해 보고하는 게 좋겠어.
잿빛의 이리, 이곳 조사는 일단 마무리하자.
$npcName:11001674[gender:0]$$pp:나,이나$ $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$에게 연락 못 받았나요? 보스가 당신을 찾고 있어요. $map:02000156$$pp2:로,으로$ 가, 보스를 만나 보세요.
$map:03000145$에서 있었던 일에 대해서는 모두 들었다.
비욘드 링크 본사를 조사하겠다고 말한다.
비욘드 링크에서 로봇을 만들든 클론을 만들든 내 알 바 아니다. 얼마만큼의 수익을 내서 내 주머니를 채워주느냐가 중요한 거지.
비욘드 링크에는 수많은 기업과 개인들이 돈을 댔다. 다시 말해 이해관계가 그물망처럼 촘촘히 엮여있단 얘기지.
섣불리 건드렸다가는 불똥이 어디로 튈지 몰라. 자칫 나에게 피해가 될 수 있는 일을 너에게 허락할 거 같으냐?
애초에 비욘드 링크 조사를 시킨 건 당신이라고 말한다.
그래, 조사는 여기까지만 해라.
당신이 알고 싶었던 걸 알게 됐냐고 물어본다.
질문을 허락한 적은 없다!
흠… <font color="#909090">(생각에 잠긴 듯 하다.)</font>
붉은 망토라는 자가 비욘드 링크와 관련이 있는 것 같다고 들었다. 정보에 의하면 왕실 근위대에서 붉은 망토를 추격할 것이라고 하니, 우선은 왕실 근위대를 도와 그자를 잡아라.
표식이 있는 걸 보면 이곳이 맞는 것 같다. 서둘러 안에 들어가 보자.
서둘러 안에 들어가 보자.
휴우…용케 이곳을 찾아 오셨군요.
당신이 찾고 있는 사람들… $map:63000039$$pp2:로,으로$ 내려 가시면 찾을 수 있습니다.
어서 가세요.
서두르세요.
뒷골목 사람들 모두 무사히 돌아왔단 소식은 들었어요. 그 사람들을 구하기 위해 많은 소동을 겪었네요.
그들을 찾는 과정에서 보여준 당신의 집착은 여전히 이해할 수 없어요. 막연히 정의의 수호자 노릇을 하기 위해 그랬던 것 같진 않은데 말이죠.
당신이 알 바 아니라고 말한다.
예상했던 답이라 놀랍지도 않군요. 참, 당신이 도왔던 사람들이 나를 찾아왔었어요. 당신을 위한 너클을 구해 달라고 하더군요.
그들의 마음이 담긴 선물이니 사양하지 말고 받도록 해요.
표식에서 내뿜는 강력한 기운이 몸을 잡아당기는 것만 같다. 서둘러 안에 들어가 보자.
서둘러 안에 들어가 보자.
헉…헉…왜…하필 그때 이곳에 온 거냐. 네 녀석만 아니었어도 놈을 쓰러뜨릴 수 있었는데 말이다.
으…저 놈을 처치해야…
부상을 치료하기 위해 기를 불어넣겠다고 말한다.
으…
잠시 동안 가만히 있으면 상처가 아물거라고 말한다.
알겠어…내가 갈 때까지 잘 버티고 있으라고!
내가 갈 때까지 녀석에게 당하지 말라고!
음…
실패한 것 같다고 말한다.
녀석은 분명 살아있다. 신기를 다시 되찾지 못했지만, 신기가 빛을 내기 위해서는 고결한 애니마르가 필요한 법.
가이던스를 버리고 어둠에 굴복한 녀석에게 그런 능력이 있을 리 만무하니, 신기는 다시 빛을 잃었을 것이다.
네가 꼭 봐야할 것이 있다. 신기에 대한 걱정은 잠시 접어두고 나와 함께 이동하자.
어서 가자.
나도 이곳을 조사하다 우연히 알게됐다. 너 말고도 이곳에서 사라진 자가 한명 더 있었던 모양이더군.
<font color="#909090">(입술을 깨물며)</font> 알고 있었다고 말한다.
그자가 누군지도 알고 있었고?
매우 가까운 존재였던 것 같다고 말한다.
매우 가까운 존재라… 그자와 함께 있지 못 한 것을 계속 마음 아파하고 있었던 거야?
얼빠진 녀석! <font color="#909090">(말없이 바라본다.)</font>
이젠 혼자 괴로워하지 말고, 아픔을 나누도록 해라! 너에겐 가족과도 같은 가까운 이들이 곁에 있다.
의아한 눈길로 바라본다.
네 눈 앞에 있는 우리를 봐. 젠장, 내 입으로 말해야만 안단 말이냐?
너는…가이던스의 제자다. 피를 나누지 않았다 하더라도 우리는 가족이다.
The knight captain was looking for you. It seemed urgent!
Hurry!
You're finally here. Good.
We've been trying to plan our next steps, but not everyone in our camp sees eye-to-eye.
Some of us want to hunt $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ down, but others have pointed out that we barely have enough troops to hold the $map:02000146$.
Of course, then there's the fact that $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ wasn't acting alone. He still has his spies in Dark Wind and the guard. Getting rid of them has to be our first priority.
But I don't know who among my own people we can trust... so my only option is to place this operation in your hands.
I'll get those spies.
I'm glad to hear it. Now, the Royal Guard has taken an interest in the $map:02000146$...
Speak with $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ and see if he has any guidance on where to start.
There's little time to waste!
What is it?
I'm here to find $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.
That's great. I can't think of anyone better for the job.
Between $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s betrayal and the caravan attack, someone must have left behind some sort of evidence.
I'd start with either of those leads.
Have you searched $map:52000073$?
My $npcName:11001912[gender:0]$ is out at $map:52000073$ as we speak.
I'll join up with him, then.
If you leave now, you should be able to catch him.
There's little time to waste!
Ah, the great $MyPCName$! How may I help you?
I'm looking into $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s people.
Yes, yes, of course. I was just about to begin my examination of the room.
How shall we proceed?
Why don't we split the room into sections?
Very good. I shall begin my search near the door.
I'll look near the door.
Have you found something?
I found this $item:30000599$.
May I see?
This is a blueprint of the building. But look here! There's a gap in the floor plan... A hidden room, perhaps?
There's a gap in the floor plan... A hidden room, perhaps?
Just as expected. What did you find?
I found this $item:30000600$.
The ashes on this file are still fresh. Someone was here recently...
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s minions are trying to get rid of the evidence. It seems we came here too late...
Let's see who else has been here.
$npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ is in charge of security. We might try asking him.
I suspect $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ would know who else has been here.
You need something?
Has anyone else been here recently?
Just you and the $npcName:11001912[gender:0]$.
What do you know about the secret room upstairs?
Secret what now? Never heard of it!
I-I swear I knew nothing! If I knew about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s plot, I'd have reported it!
I hardly ever got to set foot in $map:52000073$. Of course I didn't know about any secret hidey holes...
I-I'm just a common member of Dark Wind. Working hard to keep the city safe. That's all!
I've got nothing to do with this.
What did $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ say?
He says he's innocent.
I see...
<font color="#909090">(He's piecing together the $item:30000600$.)</font> Most interesting... If I've got these bits in the right order, it's a hit list. You and $npcName:11000064$ are on here...
Here it says something about... the $map:02000310$? But the bits after this have been burnt away.
The $map:02000310$... That's where $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ is being held!
That's right! And it's $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ who provided the evidence we needed to go after $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
I need to get to the $map:02000310$.
Quite right!
You must hurry.
You... you saved my life...
They got $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. The winged one... and minions...
I overheard them talking. They were heading to $map:02000134$.
If you hurry, you might still catch them.
Hurry!
<font color="#909090">(It seems that you were too late.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ may also be in danger.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ may also be in danger.)</font>
How goes the hunt for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies?
(Tell him about the hunt thus far.)
I see...
But why are you here?
Do you know where $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is?
$npc:11000064[gender:0]$ is in the $map:52000074$ with $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. Did you need him for something?
He may be $npcName:11000044$'s next target.
You may be right.
But $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ isn't the only target, is he?
Don't worry. We won't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s goons get near $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
But you're sure that $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ still has spies in Dark Wind? What a pain.
We need to talk.
This is serious.
I was hoping it was just a rumor. Our agents don't know who they can trust anymore.
For all I know, the spies themselves could be spreading the rumor to demoralize us.
$npc:11000076$ thinks Dark Wind needs a new captain to give us direction. He suggested $npc:11000064[gender:0]$.
True, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is Captain $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s rightful successor... but we've been hunting him for a long time. It's hard to view him as a friend, even now.
It's a tough situation.
We've got to learn how to trust each other again. It would be good for Dark Wind to have a captain we can put our faith in.
I think $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is a fine choice. Of course, we should find out if he actually wants the job first.
That's a good idea.
I'm glad you think so. Why don't you go ask $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ for me?
Talk to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
I wish $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would accept the reality of the situation... Sorry, what's the matter?
Dark Wind needs a new captain.
And you want to know if I'm up for the job. Great. If you ask me, $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ would make a much better captain.
Sure, he left Dark Wind to form Humblis, but he's spent plenty of time working with the members of both groups.
If you're serious about this, then go speak with $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.
I'll go see what he thinks.
Thanks. To be honest, I'm not ready to do anything like lead Dark Wind. Not until I've finished with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
I know where my focus belongs.
Good timing. There's something we need to—Hold on. You look too eager. What's up?
How would you feel about leading Dark Wind?
I left Dark Wind because $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ was framed and $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ was a tyrant. Now that that's done with, I wouldn't mind going back...
But I never thought about becoming the boss. If the others want me in charge, then I'll think about it.
Now, on to other business. You aren't the only one who's been looking for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies. And Humblis, I'm pleased to say, has delivered.
Some of the traitors have vanished into the woodwork, but there's a group of them still in Dark Wind. As it turns out, you're the next target on their list.
I thought that might be the case.
So, how do you feel about being used for bait?
What's the plan?
$npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ can fill you in.
$npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ can fill you in.
You know the guy they've got working security at Dark Wind headquarters? $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$? It turns out he's an incurable blabbermouth.
We can use that mouth of his to our advantage! We'll let slip that you're investigating their secret hideout—alone—and we'll simply wait for word to reach $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.
They know you're no pushover, so they'll come to the $map:52000070$ in force. Of course, Humblis will be lying in wait...
It's your time to shine. Why don't you have a little "chat" with $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$?
Go meet with $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$.
How did your chat go?
He bought it.
Good! I bet he's told half of Dark Wind by now.
We've waited long enough. They're probably waiting to ambush you in the $map:52000070$. Don't worry, Humblis has your back.
I'm not worried.
Yeah, me neither! You better get to the $map:52000070$.
This plan better work...
So, in the secret room... that was hidden behind a secret entrance... there was a second secret door?
Anyway, it all worked out in the end. A lesser $male:man,female:woman$ wouldn't have survived that.
I'll make sure $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies get a nice, cozy jail cell to share. It's a shame Dark Wind couldn't take care of this themselves...
We need to help Dark Wind regroup.
I'll give this whole "captain" business some thought. In the meantime, there's no need for Humblis anymore, so me and mine will be rejoining Dark Wind.
I'll talk to $npc:11000119[gender:0]$. You let your friends know that their spy troubles are over.
Don't keep them waiting.
How's the investigation going?
Humblis captured $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.
That's good news!
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ will want to hear about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies. Why don't you deliver the news yourself?
It's about time we had some good news.
You have something to report?
(Tell him what happened so far.)
If I know $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$, he's already decided to do it.
And I'm glad that his spies are gone, but $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is still out there.
The forces of darkness have infiltrated every corner of Maple World. Dark Wind only represented a fraction of their power.
$MyPCName$, we have an emergency!
This is bad.
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ has disappeared. A witness says that she wasn't alone...
And the person who was with her... The witnesses described the same man who took $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.

If $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ really has been kidnapped, then it's surely a trap to lure out $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. I tried to tell him as much, but he wouldn't listen. He's already taken off to save her.
I don't have time to muster my forces. Go ahead of my knights and give $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ some backup.
One of the witnesses say a new passageway to the Land of Darkness opened up. That's where $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ was headed.
Hurry. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ needs all the help he can get.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. That... that demon was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. And $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ was with him!
What happened to him? And why is $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ just going along with him?
I was ready to fight $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ stopped me.
She told me not to follow her, then disappeared into the Land of Darkness. $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... He must have tricked her somehow!
Wait...

You have to promise not to tell anyone about this. The others will think that $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ defected, but I know that can't be true. And if they see her with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$...
We can't let anyone send a search party, either. If anyone asks, tell them... I don't know! Tell them she went on a vacation!
I'm asking a lot, but I need you to trust me.
Well?
$npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ went on a... vacation.
A vacation.
So there's no need to send any search parties!
Hm. If you say she's safe, I suppose that's good enough for me.
Hey, where's $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
We split up. He isn't back yet?
No. I kinda need to talk with him and $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ about picking a new leader for Dark Wind.
I'll go find him for you.
That'd be great. The sooner we can get Dark Wind on its feet, the better.
We gotta pick a new leader soon...

In any case, because it's power is tied to mastery of time, I was hoping it might help you in your quest to unlock your forgotten memories.
In any case, because it's power is tied to mastery of time, I was hoping it might help you in your quest to unlock your forgotten memories.

전에 만든 약이 어땠는진 모르겠지만, <font color="#ffd200">이번 약</font>은 부작용의 염려는 하지 않아도 될 것 같습니다. 사실 $map:02010005$에 있는 환자분들은 피부 색이 변하고 가려움을 느끼는 것 외에 다른 불편함은 없다고 하셨거든요.
그렇다면 마을 사람들이 환자들을 경계하는 이유가 뭐냐고 묻는다.

정말… 저도 모르겠습니다. 전염성도 전혀 없는 단순한 피부 질환이거든요. 사람들이 말하는 저주… 예전엔 없었던 이야기들이랍니다. 그런 <font color="#ffd200">근거 없는 흉흉한 소문</font> 때문에 <font color="#ffd200">사막을 떠나는</font> 사람들만 늘어갈 뿐이죠. 그래서 더욱, 의사로서 책임감을 느끼고 환자를 치료하고 싶지만…

예민한 몇몇 마을 주민들은 제가 움막 쪽으로 가는 걸 보고 굉장히 화를 내며 말리곤 합니다. 산 사람들이라도 살아야 한다면서요. 그래서 저도 참 어려운 상황이었는데… 이렇게 <font color="#ffd200">애써 주시는 분들</font>이 있다니 참 고마운 일이네요. 이 약을 $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$에게 써 보면 좋겠습니다.
다만… 부작용을 겪었던 어린이 환자와 그걸 지켜본 어린이 보호자는 <font color="#ffd200">약을 먹거나, 먹이려 하지 않을 겁니다.</font> 그 무서운 일이 다시 일어날까 봐 굉장히 두려워할 거예요. 체력도 떨어져서 힘들 거고….
약을 음식에 타서 먹게 하면 어떻겠냐고 제안한다.
괜찮은 생각이군요. 마침 이 약은 색도, 맛도 없고 냄새도 약하니 말입니다. 그렇다면 이 마을 제일 가는 요리사인 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨</font>와 상의해 보시겠어요? 정이 많은 분이라 $map:02010005$ 안의 환자들을 걱정하곤 하셨거든요.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨</font>가 어디 있는지 물어본다.
$map:02010036$$pp2:로,으로$ 나가는 출구 쪽의 파란 지붕 집이 $npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨의 집입니다. 아마 집 앞에서 만날 수 있을 거예요. 자, 이 약도 가지고 가십시오.
음…? 뭔가 문제라도 있나요?
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000520$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 말한다.
최근 마을의 분위기에 대해 물어본다.
뭔가 떨어뜨리는 것 같더니만, 역시 그랬군요. 자, 여기 있습니다. 조심히 가져가세요.
생각보다 꼼꼼하지 못하군요. 가방 안에 잘 들어 있는 것 같은데요. 자, 그러지 말고 어서 우리 마을 제일의 요리사 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨</font>에게 상의하러 가 보시죠.
가방을 좀 정리해 주세요. 그렇게 꽉 차 있으면 약을 넣을 자리가 없을 거예요.
크게 달라진 건 없습니다. $map:02010005$에 격리된 사람들 말고는 그 병에 걸린 사람은 없어요. 적어도 마을 주민 중 증세가 있는 것 같다며 절 찾아온 사람은 없었답니다.
어머? 날 찾아온 건가요?
그간 있었던 일을 말하며 도움을 청한다.
아휴, 세상에나. 그런 일이 있었다니…! 그래요, 내가 할 수 있는 게 있다면 어떻게든 도와야겠군요.
기다렸죠? 자, 받아요. 가물치 수프랑 주먹밥 몇 개 담아 봤어요. 기운 떨어진 사람들이 회복할 때 먹는 음식 중 제일이 바로 가물치 수프라우. <font color="#ffd200">그 아이들</font>도 아마 이걸 먹으면 몸이 따뜻해지고, 기운도 날 거예요.
에휴, 참…. 생각할수록 너무 안타깝다, 싶네요. 원래 이 마을 사람들은 그렇게 야박한 사람들이 아니라우. 며칠 동안 밤이 없이 내내 낮만 이어지고, 갑자기 몬스터들이 늘어나면서 가뭄이 들더니… <font color="#ffd200">개발 소문</font>까지 들려오면서 인심도 메말라 버렸지요.
의사 양반에게도 그런 사연이 있었다니… 난 그런 줄도 모르고 배운 사람이 야박하다고 생각하고 있었지 뭐예요. 실은, $map:02010005$에 환자들이 격리됐다고 들어서 몇 번 가본 적이 있었어요. 애들끼리 둘이 있길래 무슨 사연일까, 궁금도 하고 안됐기도 했지요…
그 애들에게 전해줘요, 나도 조만간 다시 한 번 찾아가 보겠다고. 외롭고 힘들 그 애들에게 나라도 가족이 되어 주고 싶네요. 피가 이어져야만 가족이 아니야. 마음이 이어지면 가족인 거니까 말이우.
그래도 $MyPCName$, 댁 같은 좋은 사람들이 있어서 참 다행이에요. 그 마음이 전해져서 <font color="#ffd200">아이들이 꼭 나았으면</font> 좋겠군요. 그럼 잘 부탁해요.
왜, 무슨 문제라도 있어요?
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000521$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 말한다.
참 좋은 사람 같다며 감사 인사를 전한다.
으이구! 사람 참, 칠칠치 못하긴. 여기 두고 갔잖아요. 자, 여기 있수. 이번엔 잘 챙겨야 해요?
호호호, 사람 참 실없긴. 가방 봐요. <font color="#ffd200">갖고 있잖아!</font> 그 정도면 충분하니 어서 애들에게 가 봐요.
그렇게 한 짐 짊어지고 다니면 도시락을 가져갈 수가 없잖우. 가방부터 정리하고 다시 와요.
아이구, 무슨 소리. 이렇게 발 벗고 나서서 도와주는 $MyPCName$, 그쪽만 하려고요. 그 애들이 부디 잘 챙겨 먹고 아픈 몸도, 마음도 나았으면 좋겠군요. 잘 부탁해요.
추워… 배고파… $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$… 오빠가 미안해… 지켜주지 못했어….
반쯤 눈을 감고 중얼거리고 있는 $npcName:11001391[gender:0]$$pp:를,을$ 부른다.
앗, 당신은… 이번엔 또 뭘 가져온 거예요? 우리 $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$에게 무슨 짓을 하려고?
$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨가 만든 거라며 $item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ 건네준다.
$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨…라면… 아. 그 아주머니…가 싸 주신 거라고요?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001391[gender:0]$의 얼굴에 가득하던 분노가 누그러진 것 같다.)</font>
확실하죠? $npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 아주머니가 만든 게…. 그럼… 먼저 먹어 보고… $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$에게도 줘야지… 먹어도 괜찮을지 확인해 봐야 하니까…
<font color="#909090">($item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ 먹어 보는 $npcName:11001391[gender:0]$의 눈에 눈물이 맺힌다.)</font>
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$… 이건 괜찮은 것 같아. 어서 먹자. $npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 아주머니가 만든 게 맞나 봐… 맛있어.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001391[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$에게 $item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ 먹이고 있다.)</font>
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$, 맛있지? 기운이 좀 나니? <font color="#909090">(고개를 끄덕이던 $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$이 살짝 기침을 한다. 몸을 살짝 떠는 것 같다.)</font>
$npcName:11001391[gender:0]$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$의 몸을 주물러 준다.
어…? 몸이 따뜻해진 것 같은데… $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$… 괜찮니?
"오빠…" 라고 말하는 소리가 들린다. $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$의 목소리다.
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$! 다시 목소리가 나와! 말할 수 있구나! 아…! 정말 다행이야…!
$MyPCName$님…!
목소리를 되찾은 것 같아 다행이라고 말한다.
고마워요, $MyPCName$님. 도시락… 정말 맛있었어요.
$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 씨가 만든 거라고 말해 준다.
네, 그 아줌마… 기억나요. 정말 고마운… 분이에요. 신기해요… 점점 기운이 나는 것 같아요. 몸도 좀 덜 간지러운 것 같고요. 목욕하러 가고 싶어요. 헤헤…
또 아픈 곳은 없는지 물어본다.
네, 오히려 좀 더 가뿐해진 것 같은데요. 꼭 약이라도 먹은 것처럼 말이에요…!
실은 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$</font>$pp:가,이$ 준 약이 음식에 들어 있었다고 말해준다.
정말이에요…? $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ 언니가…! 역시 언니가 <font color="#ffd200">약속을 지켜 준</font> 거로군요… 나… 언니를 믿었어요. 언니가 도와줄 거라고 믿고 있었어요…!
목소리를 잃었던 게 $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$$pp:가,이$ 처음 준 약 때문인데 괜찮냐고 묻는다.
그럼요. 괜찮아요…! 지금은 이렇게 다시 말할 수 있는걸요. 모두들 걱정해 주고 도와주려고 한 덕분이죠…! 빨리 나아서 보답하고 싶어요. $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ 언니에게도, $npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 아줌마에게도…
$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$$pp:가,이$ 많이 괴로워했다고 알려준다.
$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ 언니는 똑똑하고 멋있어 보이지만 마음이 약하죠. 그치만… 이제 언니, 괴로워할 필요 없다고 꼭 좀 전해 주세요. 저는 언니를 계속 믿고 있었고, 이젠 정말 괜찮다고 말이에요…!
이건 언니가 비밀이랬는데… 사람 없는 곳에서 혼자 연구하는 건 사실 다른 사람들한테 약한 모습 보이기 싫어서랬어요. 언니한테 전해 주세요, 전 정말 괜찮다고 말이에요…!
$MyPCName$님…! 어떻게 되었나요? $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$$pp:는,은$… $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$$pp:는,은$ 좀 나아졌나요?
말도 할 수 있고, 몸도 좀 나아지는 것 같았다고 알려준다.
오, 신이시여. 감사합니다…! 정말… 정말 다행이에요.
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$$pp:가,이$ 전해 달라던 이야기를 해 준다.
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$…. 정말… 고맙고… 미안하고… 부끄러워요. 그 어린 아이가 저보다 훨씬 성숙하네요. 절 믿고 있었다니…
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001396[gender:1]$의 눈가가 촉촉해진 것 같다.)</font>
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001391[gender:0]$$pp:는,은$ 물론… 사람들이 더 이상 아프지 않도록 계속 연구해야겠어요. 그리고, 앞으로는 절대 자만하거나 서두르지 않을 거예요. 신중하게 접근하고… 꼼꼼하게 확인하겠어요.
힘내라고 응원해 준다.
네. 힘내서 연구하고, 환자들을 잘 돌볼 수 있게 마을 사람들을 설득할 수 있도록 $npc:11001443[gender:0]$$pp:나,이나$ <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001388[gender:1]$ 아주머니께도 부탁</font>해 볼 거예요. 정말 고맙습니다, $MyPCName$님.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$!</font> 어느새 $MyPCLevel$레벨이 되었군. $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ 여제님께서 찾고 계시니 <font color="#ffd200">$map:52000033$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 가 봐.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:52000033$</font> 입구는 여기, $map:02000025$ 입구보다 <font color="#ffd200">한 층 높은 곳</font>에 있다네. $map:52000033$$pp:는,은$ 여제님께서 중요한 사람을 만날 때 이용하시는 곳이지. 출세했군, 자네.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:52000033$</font> 입구는 여기, $map:02000025$ 입구보다 <font color="#ffd200">한 층 높은 곳</font>에 있다네. $map:52000033$$pp:는,은$ 여제님께서 중요한 사람을 만날 때 이용하시는 곳이지. 출세했군, 자네.
왔군요, $MyPCName$.
어느새 $MyPCLevel$레벨까지 성장했군요…! $MyPCName$, 고생 많았습니다. 그동안 메이플 월드를 위해 노력해 준 것 역시 잊지 않고 있어요.
최근 이 빅토리아 아일랜드 서쪽에서 수상한 땅울림이 감지되었습니다. 그리고, 느낄 수 있어요. 어둠이 보다 가깝게 다가오고 있다는 것을… 강해지는 어둠의 위협에 맞서기 위해서라도, 새로운 힘을 깨워 이제까지와는 다른 <font color="#ffd200">성장</font>의 발판을 마련해야 할 때입니다.

$MyPCName$, 나는 그대에게 <font color="#ffd200">특성</font>이라는 힘을 열어 주고자 합니다. 고결한 빛의 용사들은 <font color="#ffd200">자신의 선택</font>에 따라 성장의 길을 만들어나갈 수 있지요. 레벨이 오를수록 선택할 수 있는 길도 많아질 것이고, 당신의 선택에 따라 꿈꿔왔던 강함에 보다 가까워질 수 있게 될 겁니다.
준비가 되면 다시 내게 말을 걸어요. 나, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000075[gender:1]$</font>$pp:는,은$ 그대를 위해 빛의 길을 열어 <font color="#ffd200">새로운 힘</font>을 드리겠습니다.
준비가 되면 다시 내게 말을 걸어요. 나, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000075[gender:1]$</font>$pp:는,은$ 그대를 위해 빛의 길을 열어 <font color="#ffd200">새로운 힘</font>을 드리겠습니다.
자신만의 강함을 스스로 그릴 자격이 있는 빛의 용사, $MyPCName$$pp:를,을$ 위해 <font color="#ffd200">특성</font>의 힘을 개방하노니 그대 앞에 축복 있으라!
<font color="#ffd200">특성</font>의 힘이 개방되었으니, 이제 자신을 단련하며 성장함에 있어 보다 <font color="#ffd200">다양한 선택</font>을 할 수 있게 될 거야. 그리고, 스스로가 원하는 길이 무엇인지 알고 잘 선택하려면 무엇보다도 다양한 경험이 중요할 테지.
그러니 최대한 많은 경험을 해 보도록 하게. 무엇을 해야 할지 잘 모르겠다면, <font color="#ffd200">메이플 길라잡이</font>를 이용해 봐. 지금의 레벨에서 해볼 만한 것들을 알려주고 있지.
스킬을 업그레이드하면 보다 뛰어난 효율로 전투를 할 수 있으니 잊지 말고. 아, 그리고 수련을 하러 떠나기 전 다시 한번 내게 말을 걸어 줘.
스킬을 업그레이드하면 보다 뛰어난 효율로 전투를 할 수 있으니 잊지 말고. 아, 그리고 수련을 하러 떠나기 전 다시 한번 내게 말을 걸어 줘.
자, 챙겨 가. 높은 단계로 스킬을 업그레이드하려면 <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100022$</font>$pp:가,이$ 필수지. 이곳으로 오는 길에 주운 거니까, 너무 고마워하지 말고 수련에 힘쓰도록.
$MyPCName$님, 어느새 $MyPCLevel$레벨까지 성장했군요. 수련하는 동안 어려움은 없었나요?
<font color="#ffd200">50레벨 이후의 수련</font>은 이전과는 다르게 어려움이 따르죠. 그래서 성장에 도움이 되는 정보를 한 가지 알려 드리려고 해요. 다만 <font color="#ffd200">약간 먼 길</font>을 떠나야 하니까… 준비가 되면 말해주세요.
<font color="#ffd200">50레벨 이후의 수련</font>은 이전과는 다르게 어려움이 따르죠. 그래서 성장에 도움이 되는 정보를 한 가지 알려 드리려고 해요. 다만 <font color="#ffd200">약간 먼 길</font>을 떠나야 하니까… 준비가 되면 말해주세요.

특히, <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000447$</font>$pp:는,은$ 카르카르 아일랜드의 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02010063$</font> 근처 던전에서 발견되는 경우가 많다고 해요. 마침 $map:02010063$에서 별조각을 모으고 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$npcFunction:11001271[gender:1]$ $npc:11001271[gender:1]$</font>$pp:가,이$ 자세한 정보를 알려줄 수 있다고 하니 괜찮다면 한번 가 보는 게 어떨까요?

이 근처에 있는 <font color="#ffd200">던전</font>들에서 아주 쉽게 발견할 수 있다고 하더군요. $map:02010023$의 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02010070$</font>$pp:나,이나$ $map:02010026$에 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02010052$</font> 같은 곳요. 참, 메이플 길라잡이에서 내 주는 오늘의 미션을 하면 얻을 수도 있다고도 하죠.
$item:30000447$$pp2:로,으로$ 뭘 할 수 있는지 물어본다.
