자, 그럼 내가 취급하는 물건들 중에 원하는 게 있는지 한번 살펴봐요. <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000447$</font>$pp:를,을$ 좀 드릴 테니, 필요한 게 있다면 교환해 가요. 부담은 갖지 말아요, 앞으로 자주 만나자는 의미로 주는 거니까!
The empress is looking for you. Please see her straight away.
The empress is looking for you. Please see her straight away.
It is good to see you again, my loyal subject.
I've finally received news from one of our scouting parties. My agents have discovered the source of my earlier foreboding deep within the Land of Darkness.
Followers of the ancient and powerful Demon King have lifted the earth and bent space itself, revealing deep pockets of darkness that we didn't even know existed.
New enemies are coming from this darkness. The average adventurer stands no chance against such monsters...
But we can't afford to ignore the darkness. Not anymore. Someone needs to face the enemy head on and uncover their plot.
Who is this new Penumbran Host? What are they after? $MyPCName$, only a hero of your caliber could hope at succeeding in such a task.
Please venture into the Land of Darkness beyond the $map:02000146$. Learn what, exactly, is happening in that evil place. Should you accept this mission, I would like to offer you a gift.
Please venture into the Land of Darkness beyond the $map:02000146$. Learn what, exactly, is happening in that evil place. Should you accept this mission, I would like to offer you a gift.
What do you say? Will you walk the Land of Darkness in the name of your empress?
The Land of Darkness won't know what hit it.
Thank you for taking this seriously, as always. I want you to have this. You will need it to overcome the darkness.
It's been too long. How have you been?
I've heard some interesting rumors that might interest you. Something that could increase your power significantly. Do you want to learn more?
I've heard some interesting rumors that might interest you. Something that could increase your power significantly. Do you want to learn more?

It seems there are gemstones that you can place in your equipment to make it more powerful. These gemstones vary in color and shape, which will tell you what kind of bonuses the gemstone will give you.
Some gemstones can be upgraded to grant exceptional power. You'll need gemstone motes to do so, which you can get by dismantling your unneeded gemstones.
But you can't use gemstones on every piece of equipment! Only gear with sockets have room for gemstones. It may be challenging to find such equipment...
There's still so much we don't know about gemstones. If you happen to find any, please try them out and let me know what you find!
Oh, here is an item with a gemstone slot and a spare gemstone. Try it for yourself. It's sure to be a good experience!
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$님!</font> $npc:11000119[gender:0]$님께서 전할 말씀이 있다며 찾고 계십니다. 어서 가보십시오.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$님!</font> $npc:11000119[gender:0]$님께서 전할 말씀이 있다며 찾고 계십니다. 어서 가보십시오.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$!</font> 왔군. 기다리고 있었다.
$MyPCName$, 혹시 $map:02000118$$pp:를,을$ 지나오는 길에 끊어진 땅에 <font color="#ffd200">수상한 문</font>이 솟아올라온 것을 보았나? 내가 자네를 부른 건 바로 그곳에 대한 조사를 부탁하기 위해서다.
어느날 갑자기 솟아난 그 문을 처음 발견한 것은 우리 근위대의 한 병사였다. 수상한 그 문의 정체는 <font color="#ffd200">어느 곳으로 통할지 알 수 없는 비틀린 어둠의 통로</font>로, 그 안에는 깊은 그림자의 어둠에 중독된 강력한 몬스터들이 있었다고 해.
이에 우리 근위대에서는 그곳에 경비병들을 파견해 일반인들을 보호하고 있다. 그나마 아무나 접근하기 쉽지 않은 곳이라 다행이긴 하다만, $map:02000001$ 바로 앞에 그런 존재가 나타났다는 것은 분명 큰 위협이지.
아직 우리가 그곳에 대해 아는 것은 너무나도 적기에, 그 짙은 그림자를 헤쳐 나갈 수 있는 <font color="#ffd200">능력있는 모험가</font>들이 그곳에 도전하여 보다 자세히 조사하고, 넘쳐흐르는 어둠의 힘을 약화시켜주길 부탁하고 있다. <font color="#ffd200">그림자 원정대</font>라는 이름 아래 말이야.
새로운 도전을 두려워하지 않을 거라 믿네만, 분명 어려운 일이 될 터…. 잠시 생각해 보고, 그곳으로 떠날 결심이 선다면 다시 내게 말을 걸어 주길 바란다.
새로운 도전을 두려워하지 않을 거라 믿네만, 분명 어려운 일이 될 터…. 잠시 생각해 보고, 그곳으로 떠나 도전해볼 결심이 선다면 다시 내게 말을 걸어 주길 바란다.
여태까지 내가 지켜본 $MyPCName$, 자네의 모습은 훌륭했다. 그 자격이 충분하다 여기기에, <font color="#ffd200">그림자 원정대에 합류</font>해 주기를 요청하고자 한다. 자네의 힘을 보태어줄 수 있겠는가?
물론 가능하다고 답한다.
좋아. 그 말을 기다리고 있었다. 용감한 $MyPCName$, 그대에게 <font color="#ffd200">그림자 원정대</font>의 사명을 부여하겠다.
그럼 이제 현장으로 떠나, <font color="#ffd200">그림자 원정대</font>로서 활약해 주겠나. $map:02000118$ 끊어진 땅으로 가, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001700[gender:0]$</font>에게 설명을 듣도록. 내 뒤에 열린 길을 이용하면 그곳으로 바로 떠날 수 있다.
그럼 이제 현장으로 떠나, <font color="#ffd200">그림자 원정대</font>로서 활약해 주겠나. $map:02000118$ 끊어진 땅으로 가, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001700[gender:0]$</font>에게 설명을 듣도록. 내 뒤에 열린 길을 이용하면 그곳으로 바로 떠날 수 있다.

어서오십시오. $npc:11000119[gender:0]$님께 소식 들었습니다. <font color="#ffd200">그림자 원정대에 합류</font>해 주시기로 했다고요. 부족하지만, 여태까지 <font color="#ffd200">이곳에 대해 알아낸 사실들</font>을 $MyPCName$님께 알려달라는 $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$님의 명령이 있었습니다.
이 문은 비틀린 공간. 들어가면 어느 곳이 나올지 알 수 없습니다. 다만, 특이한 것이 있다면 이곳은 마치 도전을 기다리는 수련장과 같아 얼마나 <font color="#ffd200">깊은 단계의 어둠</font>으로, <font color="#ffd200">몇 명이 들어갈지</font>를 선택해야만 한답니다.

이 통로의 주인이 정한 규칙 같은 것인지, 이곳에서는 자신이 선택한 <font color="#ffd200">단계</font>와 <font color="#ffd200">도전 인원</font>에 따라 등장하는 적들의 수준이 달라집니다. 다만, 보다 깊은 단계의 어둠에 도전하려면 반드시 <font color="#ffd200">그 직전 단계의 어둠에 혼자 도전하기</font>를 선택한 후 그곳에 들어가 도전에 <font color="#ffd200">성공</font>한 적이 있어야 해요.

이 어둠 속을 탐험하다 보면 <font color="#ffd200">$item:90000018$</font>$pp:를,을$ 얻을 수 있는데, 온전히 이곳에서만 사용할 수 있는 <font color="#ffd200">원정대 전용 특성</font>을 키우는 데 쓰입니다. <font color="#ffd200">원정대 전용 특성</font>은 이 통로와 이어진 어둠의 공간 안에서만 활용할 수 있는 신비한 힘입니다. 보다 많이, 깊이 어둠에 도전한 이들만이 누릴 수 있는 특별한 능력이죠.

$item:90000018$$pp:를,을$ 모아서 원정대 전용 특성을 배운 뒤, 입장할 때 <font color="#ffd200">활성화</font>시키면 그 능력을 발휘할 수 있게 됩니다. 또한, $item:90000018$$pp2:로,으로$ 원정대 전용 특성을 <font color="#ffd200">업그레이드</font>하면 그 힘을 더욱 키울 수도 있습니다.
그럼 이제 실전만이 남았군요, $MyPCName$님. 그림자 원정대의 이름 아래, <font color="#ffd200">당신의 능력</font>을 보여주십시오!
<font color="#ffd200">독수리 수인</font>과 <font color="#ffd200">순록 수인</font>은 저 길을 따라 오른쪽으로 쭉 올라가면 있는 <font color="#ffd200">귀여운 나무집</font>으로 들어가셨습니다. 그분들을 찾는다면 제 오른편의 길을 따라 쭉 올라가 보십시오.
<font color="#ffd200">독수리 수인</font>과 <font color="#ffd200">순록 수인</font>은 저 길을 따라 오른쪽으로 쭉 올라가면 있는 <font color="#ffd200">귀여운 나무집</font>으로 들어가셨습니다. 그분들을 찾는다면 제 오른편의 길을 따라 쭉 올라가 보십시오.
아…! $MyPCName$, 왔구나! 몸은 괜찮고?
$npc:11001716[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ 쓰러진 거냐고 묻는다.
응. 보다시피 상태가 꽤 안 좋은 것 같아. 아무리 기운을 많이 뺐다고 해도 그렇지 이게 뭐야. 대제자 주제에 이러면 돼? 빨리 정신 차려야지….
무슨 일이 있었던 거냐고 묻는다.
네가 탄 구름을 쫓아가는 무리들이 꽤 많아서, 시선이 분산된 틈에 $npcName:11001716[gender:0]$ 사형이 날 매달고 날아왔어. 물론 나도 은신술을 유지하느라 힘들었고. 그나저나 용케 잘 찾아왔네! 만나기 어려울 줄 알았는데.
$npc:11001677[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ 알려주었다고 대답한다.
그래. 이곳 $map:02000001$엔 근위대가 있으니 갑작스런 침입이나 소란이 일어나도 비교적 안전한 편이라고 해. 게다가 워낙 다양한 사람들이 모이니까 우리같은 수인들을 보아도 신기해하거나 놀라지 않지.
그리고… 그만큼 <font color="#ffd200">다양하고 많은 정보</font>가 모이는 곳이기도 하지. 자, 그럼 이제 할 일을 해 볼까.
할 일…?
기껏 다 설명해 줬는데… 잊었어? 떨어지면서 머리 부딪혔어? 너울빛 산을 습격한 그 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:23000082[gender:0]$</font>$pp:라는,이라는$ 자가 우리 가이던스의 신기를 가져가려 했잖아. 그렇게 하지 못하도록 막아야지.
일단 이곳에 기거하면서 조용히 <font color="#ffd200">탐문 조사</font>를 시작해야 해. 물론, 이 바보 사형의 회복이 먼저겠지만….
우선 이곳에서 정보를 최대한 모아 조사해볼 필요가 있어. 너울빛 산의 오래된 유물이 이곳에 보관되었던 흔적이 있는지부터 시작해 보면 좋을 것 같아. <font color="#ffd200">정보 수집</font>은 네가 좀 맡아줄래?
$npc:11001707[gender:1]$$pp:는,은$ 뭘 할거냐고 묻는다.

난 이곳에서 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001716[gender:0]$ 사형</font>을 <font color="#ffd200">간호</font>하고 있을 거야. 뭐, $npcName:11001716[gender:0]$ 사형이랑 사이좋게 눈도 맞추고 이마에 손도 얹고 깃털 빗질도 해 주고 싶으면 네가 사형 간호를 맡아도 되고.
…간호는 $npcName:11001707[gender:1]$에게 맡기겠다고 한다.
그래그래. 잘 생각했어. 그리고, 인간들의 부탁을 들어주거나 그들의 사건을 조사하는 것도 꺼리지 마. 일단 알아두면 다 우리의 정보가 될 테니까 말이야. 물론 $npcName:11001716[gender:0]$ 사형은 썩 달가워하지 않겠지만.
오는 길에 보니 왕궁 쪽에 <font color="#ffd200">안내원</font> 같은 복장을 한 사람이 있었어. 그녀에게 물어보는 걸로 시작하는 게 좋을 것 같아. 그럼, 부탁해!
오는 길에 보니 왕궁 쪽에 <font color="#ffd200">안내원</font> 같은 복장을 한 사람이 있었어. 그녀에게 물어보는 걸로 시작하는 게 좋을 것 같아. 그럼, 부탁해!
안녕하세요. 궁금한 게 있으신가요?
물어볼 게 몇 가지 있다고 대답한다.
제가 아는 거라면 뭐든지 알려드릴게요. 말씀하세요.

오옹…? 이게 뭐냐미…? 이리 줘보라미….
저 안에서 눈에 띄는 게 이것 뿐이었냐미…? 애니마르에 반응하는 물건 같은 건 없었냐미?
그런 건 없었다고 말한다.
히잉… 그럼 이건 인간이 다시 가져가라미… 난 이 대륙의 글자를 읽을 수 없어서 여기 뭐라고 써있는지 하나도 알 수가 없다미… 미유흐흑흥…!
읽어줄 테니 같이 내용을 확인해 보자고 말한다.
오호라~ 인간, 머리 좋다미? 그럼 소리내서 읽어달라미. 내가 잘 듣고, 아는 내용들을 바로 말해주겠다미!
써있는 내용을 소리내어 읽어 준다.

유훙… 역시 예상대로 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000354[gender:0]$</font>이 최고 큰 고객이었다미~ 종류를 가리지 않고 많이도 샀다미. <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000244[gender:1]$</font>…는 물건을 보기만 하고 안 사기로 유명하다는 거지융? 미히히히~ 그럴 줄 알았다미. 은근 구두쇠로 유명하다미~
마지막 장에 써있는 이름이… <font color="#ffd200">비욘드 링크</font>라고 했냐미? 흠… 비욘드 링크는 <font color="#ffd200">휴머노이드 공학 연구 기관</font>이다미. <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000270$</font> 인근에 기반을 두고 있다고 하지융.
<font color="#909090">(비욘드… 링크…)</font>
다양한 곳에서 투자도 많이 받는다는데… 유물 수집은 왜 하는지 알 수 없다미. 그것도 순 잡동사니들만 사다니, 이상하다미…!
<font color="#909090">(낯설지 않은 느낌… 왜인지는 모르지만 불안한 기분이 든다.)</font>
이건 가져가서 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001707[gender:1]$$pp:와,과$ 함께</font> 자세히 보는 게 좋겠다미. 수고했다융, 인간!
무슨 일이냐미?
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000562$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 말한다.
친구들이 보고 싶지 않냐고 묻는다.
인간, 똑똑한 줄 알았는데 실망이다미. 여기 흘리고 갔다융! 자, 여기 있으니 잘 챙겨라미~
으이그, $MyPCName$! 가방을 보라미, <font color="#ffd200">갖고 있다미!</font> 하나면 충분하니까 어서 가라미~
가방을 꽉 채워놓고 있으면 아무것도 가져갈 수 없다미. 이렇게~ 인간의 욕심은 끝이 없고 같은 실수를 반복하는 거다미! 미어캣들은 이럴 때면 <font color="#ffd200">가방을 비운다융</font>. 인간도 그렇게 하라융.
꽤 멀리 출장나와 있어서 향수병이라도 걸릴 것 같냐융? 미어캣들은 모두 <font color="#ffd200">프로 정신</font>을 가지고 있어서 그런 거 없다미! 우리 미어캣 정찰대를 우습게 보지 말라미!
$MyPCName$. 어디에 다녀온 거지?
$npc:11001707[gender:1]$$pp:가,이$ 이야기한 곳을 조사하고 왔다고 한다.
그렇군. 뭔가 <font color="#ffd200">발견</font>한 게 있었나?
$item:30000562$$pp:를,을$ 건네준다.
$item:30000562$… 음. $map:02000216$에서 유물을 많이 사들인 자들을 아주 자세히 기록해 두었군. <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001707[gender:1]$</font>에게 이곳에 대해 들은 적이 있지. 혹시 이걸 모두 읽어봤느냐? 이 중 눈에 띄는 자가 있었나?
잘 모르겠다고 말한다.
이곳의 사건들을 조사하는 것이 네 일인데, 소문에 밝지는 못하구나. 음… 이 페이지는 최근에 추가된 것이군. <font color="#ffd200">비욘드 링크</font>라…
<font color="#909090">(이상하게 낯설지 않은 기분이 드는 이름이다…)</font>
혹시 이곳에 대해 들어본 적이 있나? 네가 만난 정보원은 이곳에 대해 뭐라고 얘기했지? <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001716[gender:0]$의 눈빛이 매섭다. 길게 이야기하고 싶지 않다.)</font>
들은 바가 없다고 말한다.
…그래? <font color="#909090">(좀더 조사해 보고 생각을 정리한 뒤 사형들과 이야기하는 게 좋겠다.)</font>
잘 모르겠다고 말한다.
…알겠다. 수고 많았다, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$님! $npc:11001707[gender:1]$님이라는 분께서 보내신 연락입니다. 할 말이 있으니 $map:52000041$에서 보자고 하시네요.
$MyPCName$님! $npc:11001707[gender:1]$님이라는 분께서 보내신 연락입니다. 할 말이 있으니 $map:52000041$에서 보자고 하시네요.
$MyPCName$! 어서와, 기다리고 있었어.
$npcName:11001716[gender:0]$ 사형에게 받았어, 네가 찾아온 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000562$</font> 말야. 거기 적혀 있던 내용과 요즘 물류의 흐름을 확인하다 보니 <font color="#ffd200">수상한 점</font>을 두 가지 발견했어.
첫째, 가장 많은 물건을 사간 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000252[gender:0]$</font>이 자기가 사간 유물들을 어딘가로 빼돌리고 있다는 거야. 구입 직후엔 항상 $map:02000189$나 사람이 많은 곳에 전시해 놓고 자랑을 하면서, 얼마 지나지 않아 아무에게도 공개하지 않겠다며 꽁꽁 숨기는 게 수상해.

둘째, <font color="#ffd200">비욘드 링크</font>라는 기관이 흑성회뿐 아니라 다른 경로로도 다수의 유물을 모으고 있다는 거야. <font color="#ffd200">공학 기술을 연구하는 기관</font>이라는데 사 모으는 것들은 그들의 분야와는 거리가 멀고, 너무 대규모야. 투자 유치도 계속 받는다면서… 이런 움직임은 수상해. 앞뒤가 안 맞아.
나는 $npc:11000252[gender:0]$ 쪽을 예의주시하고 있어. 양이 워낙 많기도 하고. 그래서 <font color="#ffd200">비욘드 링크</font> 쪽의 조사는 $MyPCName$$pp:가,이$ 맡아 줬음 해. 가능하겠어?
문제없다고 대답한다.
평소보다 대답이 빠른데? 좋아, 그럼 잘 부탁해.
<font color="#909090">(비욘드 링크… 나 역시 알고 싶은 것이 많다.)</font>
그럼, $map:03000145$에서 $npc:11001731[gender:0]$을 만나봐. $npc:11001731[gender:0]$은 까칠한 녀석이지만 이 빵을 주면 기분이 좋아질거야.
왜, 무슨 문제라도 있어?
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000563$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 말한다.
지금 무슨 생각 하냐고 묻는다.
으이구! 정신을 어디다 빼고 다니는지. 여기 두고 갔잖아. 자, 여기 있어. 이번엔 잘 챙겨야 해~
으이그, $MyPCName$! 가방을 봐, <font color="#ffd200">갖고 있잖아!</font> 그 정도면 충분하니까 어서 가 봐~
가방을 꽉 채워 다니면 아무것도 가져갈 수가 없잖아. 그나마 나니까 망정이지 준타 사형한테 걸리면 혼구멍이 날걸. 가방부터 정리하고 다시 와~
오늘 저녁은 뭐 먹을지 생각한다, 왜~ 나도 할 일이 있으니까, 너도 어서 다녀와라~
…… <font color="#909090">(어둠 속에 은신하면서 사람 말을 못 하는 척 하는 것 같다.)</font>
$item:30000563$$pp:를,을$ 건네준다.
킁킁… 킁. $item:30000563$을 가져온 인간이라면… 기다리고 있었다. <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$.</font>
$npc:11001707[gender:1]$에게 연락 받았다. <font color="#ffd200">비욘드 링크</font> 조사를 하러 왔지? 내가 관찰하고 있던 건물 입구는 저 위야. 아쉽게도 아직 들어가보지 못했다.
나는 보호색을 이용해 어느 곳이든 들어갈 수 있지. 그래서 <font color="#ffd200">비욘드 링크</font>와 관련된 곳을 모두 조사했지만, 저곳만큼은 도저히 들어갈 방법이 없었다. 경호 인력도 없고, 비어있는 것처럼 보이지만 정말 강력한 <font color="#ffd200">무인 경비 시스템</font>이 걸려 있기 때문이다.
권한이 있는 사람이 출입할 때 짧은 틈을 타 들어가보려 했는데, 보기좋게 <font color="#ffd200">실패</font>했어. 주변에 흐르고 있는 <font color="#ffd200">강력한 전자파</font> 때문에 하마터면 노릇노릇하게 구워질 뻔했지.
하지만, 넌 좀 특별하다고 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001707[gender:1]$</font>$pp:가,이$ 말하더군. 강력한 <font color="#ffd200">애니마르</font>를 이어받았으니 다를 거라던데… 어디, 그 말이 진짜인지 증명해 보면 되겠네.
저 안에 들어가서 <font color="#ffd200">가장 끝까지 들어가 최대한 자세히 조사</font>해 보아라. 물론, <font color="#ffd200">들어가는 데 성공한다면</font> 말이다.
저 안에 들어가서 <font color="#ffd200">가장 끝까지 들어가 최대한 자세히 조사</font>해 보아라. 물론, <font color="#ffd200">들어가는 데 성공한다면</font> 말이다.

화산 아래 커다란 용암의 동공, 불꽃의 힘을 가진 동물이 사는 곳 인근 붉게 갈라진 화산 사이로 <font color="#ffd200">찬바람이 불어오는 틈</font>이 있다고 한다. 이곳에 가까이 다가가 들여다보면 뜨거운 증기에 의해 눈을 다치게 된다.
이곳에 대한 소문은 꼬리를 물고 커졌고, 많은 이들이 무모한 도전을 이어갔으나 그 누구도 이곳에 얽힌 비밀을 풀지는 못했다. 다만 이곳을 처음 발견한 개 바바는 여전히 이곳을 자신이 발견한 반짝거리는 것들을 묻어두는 보물창고로 쓰고 있다는 후문.
어떤 도구로도 부술 수 없던 암벽의 틈을 매일 파고듦에도 불구하고 바바의 콧잔등은 촉촉하고 부드러우며, 상처 하나 없었다고 한다.

이에 대해 왕실은 아무런 입장도 밝히지 않았으나, 전시회를 통해 주요 유물을 일부 공개해 이 소문을 일축하고자 했다. 물론 보관된 유물의 양이 매우 방대하기에, 진실은 알 수 없다.

…안돼. 더 이상은, 아무 것도… 알려고 하지 마. 멀리 가. 그리고… 모두 잊는 거야.

그런 거에 매달리지 말고, 혼자 떠나. 가장 중요한 건… 살아남는 거야.

Wake up, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. You're having a nightmare!
Ah! Oh... Oh, it was just a dream...
Thanks for waking me. Better to be awake and in pain then reliving those memories... So, what can I do for you?
Have you seen the forces of darkness in your journeys?
I've seen lots of strange and dark things. Can you be a little more specific?
(Tell him about $npcName:11001851[gender:1]$.)
I can't say I know the name. Sorry I couldn't be... Now, wait a minute. There is one thing, but it may not be helpful...
What is it?

There's a good friend of mine, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$. She's a lovely lady—well, siren, if I'm being specific—who lives on $map:02000391$. Last time I was out her way, she told me a great disaster was looming over Maple World.
I wanted to ask her more, but I had to set sail before low tide. I promised I'd be back soon... and the very next day, pirates sunk my ship. I've been holed up here licking my wounds ever since.
Sirens have a strange power. The ocean speaks to them. These forces of darkness you mentioned... Could be that they're the ones who cause the disaster in $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$'s prophecy.
I'd like to meet this $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$.
The sea route to $map:02000391$ isn't exactly straightforward. Even if you got there, the sirens don't exactly have a glowing opinion of humans. If only I could go with you...
There's got to be a way for me to meet her.

Well... Take this compass. Show it to $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ and tell her you're my friend. She'll help you get along with the others. As for actually getting to $map:02000391$, you'll need $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$'s help.
$npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ used to be $npc:23000015$'s navigator, but he gave up the pirating lifestyle. Now he's in hiding somewhere in $map:02000182$. Tell him I sent you.
Thanks for all of your help.
Don't mention it. To tell the truth, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$'s words have been weighing on me. If you can help stop this disaster, then I wish you all the luck in the world.
$npc:11003082[gender:0]$ is in hiding somewhere in $map:02000182$. Tell him I sent you. He'll get you to $map:02000391$.
<font color="#909090">(This log cabin looks suspicious. You hear something drop inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Go inside the cabin. $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ might be inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Go inside the cabin. $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ might be inside.)</font>
You... you saved me, stranger!
Are you $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$?
Yes, but whatever it is, I didn't do it! And I got no money, so don't bother robbing me, neither!
Relax! I'm $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s friend.
$npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ sent you! I heard he got sunk. Glad to hear he's still kicking around.

I know the pirate that scuttled $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. He thinks $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ is real pretty, but $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ only talks to $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. This made him real mad...
Who is he?
$npc:23000015$! Vicious, bad, mean! He sent his men to $map:02000391$ to drag $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ away!
We have to help her!
Don't be crazy! Pirates are strong. And plenty. $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ can take care of herself. And if not... she has a real mean sister!
Even if she doesn't need my help, I need hers.
What'd I just say about being crazy? I tried telling her what happened to $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$, I barely got out of $map:02000391$ alive. My ship's all tore up now...
If we go now, pirates attack us, and we sink. Glub glub glub.
Get ready to sail. In the meantime, I'll get rid of the pirates.
Fine! But you help, too. Get $itemPlural:30000725$ from $npcPlural:21000232[gender:0]$. Need to keep ship ship-shape! The things on the ship are not enough. I need more.
<font color="#909090">(Why can't anyone ever just say, "Sure, hop on my boat?")</font>
Beat up pirates in $map:02000182$. Get $itemPlural:30000725$. Do this, then we worry about surviving the trip...
Beat up pirates in $map:02000182$. Get $itemPlural:30000725$. Do this, then we worry about surviving the trip...
This is good. Enough to get us through if we sink again. While you were gone, I fixed up ship. Good to go!
We sail to $map:02000391$ when you're ready.
There'll be lots of pirates at $map:02000391$. Hope you get to $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ in one piece.
You aren't coming?
I steer the ship. That's plenty! The rest is up to you.
What's wrong? You get lost?
Where do I go to board the ship?
Outside cabin. There's the boat. Walk through the black door. Or I can push you through it!
You live!
$npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ showed up... She's real scary...
What did she say?
She wants you to come to $map:02000388$. Lots of pirates. Wants to steal their ship.
Why don't they use your ship?
Seas too rough there. My ship will sink. Needs a bigger ship. But this is too much! $npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ just wants to teach a lesson for flirting with $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$!
Well, it's not a bad plan.
You're scary, too! Do what you want. I'm not going.
Where is $map:02000388$?
$map:02000063$. In cave, behind waterfall. Good luck...
$map:02000388$ is in $map:02000063$. In cave, behind waterfall. Good luck...
And where is that?
$npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ said you'd get lost. Gave me a charm. It will make you dizzy, but you'll get there.
$npcName:24002931$... is agitated. But in time, he will grow calm again, thanks to you.
Clear away these mists and let us parley.
Let's go.
What is it we're doing here?
O great waves, lend us your strength! Sweep away these dark mists!
I shall use sea magic to cleanse this place of evil mists. Then it will be safe to speak with $npcName:24002931$. Shall we begin?
Let's go.
Clear away these mists and let us parley.
Let's go.
What is it we're doing here?
O great waves, lend us your strength! Sweep away these dark mists!
I shall use sea magic to cleanse this place of evil mists. Then it will be safe to speak with $npcName:24002931$. Shall we begin?
Let's go.
I can smell the sea on you. Did you find what you were after?
I... found $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s friend.
See, I knew he would help you!
<font color="#909090">(The vision $npcName:24002931$ showed you... The great disaster...)</font>
You don't mind if I go around telling everyone you're an honorary member of the Adventurer's Guild, do you? We could use the buzz!
<font color="#909090">(The other divine creatures... The Mage of Light...)</font>
Hold on, let me get my camera. I'm going to get your picture and post it on... Um, $MyPCName$? Are you listening?
<font color="#909090">(What does it mean? You need to contemplate this...)</font>
Helloooooo? Maple World to $MyPCName$!
Did you get hit in the head or something? You're totally spacing out.
I'm fine. How's $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ holding up?
Better, but still in no shape to get out of bed. He's still in the $map:52000095$ if you want to check in on him.
I think $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ is getting better, but he's still in no shape to get out of bed. He's still in the $map:52000095$ if you want to check in on him.

I've been counting the minutes 'til your return! Not much else to do in here, after all. Did $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ give you a lift? How is $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$? Did she tell you about the looming disaster?
Not so fast! One question at a time, please.
Right, right! I'm used to finding answers for myself. Feels strange, relying on someone else to tell me what's going on... Okay, tell me how it went.
$npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ introduced me to her friend $npcName:24002931$.
You met $npcName:24002931$? The $npcName:24002931$?! That's the guardian of the sea! Do you know what any sailor worth his salt would give to be in your shoes?!
What did you two talk about? Was it what you were looking for? They say there's nothing $npcName:24002931$ doesn't know.
It... wasn't what I was looking for.
Oh. Well, that's too bad. You should've asked for winning lottery numbers instead, I suppose...
Also, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ says you need to get better so you can visit again.
I'll do my best. $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ is a pal, a real pal. But how big was $npcName:24002931$, anyway? I wonder if she'll let me meet him someday...
A real pal, huh? $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ will be disappointed...
What was that? Sorry, I think I got overexcited. I better get some rest... Thanks for letting me live vicariously through you, even if just for a little bit.
I've had a lot of time to look back on my life. And... I feel sad. If I had a strong friend like you, just think of all the amazing new places I could have discovered.
We should go adventuring together when you're better.
Count on it! We do that, and I'll put your name in the next edition of $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s World Tour!
Well, I'd better be on my way.
Of course, of course. Official business and all that. Sorry you didn't find what you want, but I'm glad we got the chance to meet.
Of course, of course. Official business and all that. Sorry you didn't find what you want, but I'm glad we got the chance to meet.
I'm pleased to see you. Did you learn anything new about our enemies?
I didn't find anything about the forces of darkness.
That's unfortunate. My own people have been busy repairing the damage from the last battle...
<font color="#909090">(The empress was definitely in $npcName:24002931$'s vision...)</font>
All we can do is keep searching. I have faith that we'll find some new evidence soon.
<font color="#909090">(But it was just a vision. You must proceed carefully.)</font>
I'll contact you the moment we have new information, of course.
<font color="#909090">(You can't tell anyone for now. Certainly not the empress.)</font>
Thank you for always doing your best, $MyPCName$.
I have a new mission for you, $MyPCName$. In fact, you were requested by name.
$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ sent a report that the forces of darkness have been sighted in the tundra of northern Victoria Island. He would like your help in assessing the situation.
I'm inclined to agree with him. $MyPCName$, will you help $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ in hunting down the forces of darkness?
You know I will.
Are we sure it's really them this time?
Thank you. $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ has set up a $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$.
$npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ witnessed it with his own eyes. I'm sure his report is accurate—but he's not used to fighting in the snow.
I'll give him some backup, then.
$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ has set up a $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$. I'm counting on both of you to track down the forces of darkness.
I see you received my summons!
Your arm is hurt.
Ah... It's just a scratch. Anyway, thanks for coming.
My men are in sorry shape. We aren't trained for arctic combat, and we took a beating in our last battle. We need to regroup, but I don't want to risk losing the trail. That's why you're here.
What happened, exactly?
We were scouting out the $map:02000260$ after hearing some suspicious rumblings, and we encountered monsters in a hidden cave. We were about to pursue, but...
But?
He appeared from nowhere. I don't know who he is, but he attacked both the monsters and my soldiers, demanding that no one interfere in his fight. The way he wielded that sword...
I'm not sure where his allegiance lies. He didn't seriously injure any of my men, and it was clear that he was no friend to the forces of darkness...
Is that how your arm got hurt?
It is. Even the slightest wound can turn deadly in this cold, so I need to stay here and make sure my men are attended to. But while we're stuck here, our latest clue is getting away...
I'll check out this cave of yours.
I knew I could count on you. The ice cave is hidden behind some snowcapped trees on the mountainside of $map:02000260$. Be sure to search the place thoroughly.
I knew I could count on you. The ice cave is hidden behind some snowcapped trees on the mountainside of $map:02000260$. Be sure to search the place thoroughly.
<font color="#909090">(There's a cold wind coming from behind the trees. This must be the place $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ spoke of.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s ice cave should be just beyond this tree.)</font>
(Enter the ice cave.)
So, what did you discover?
I had a run-in with the forces of darkness.
Then there's something here that has their interest. Did anything else happen?
I met your swordsman.
And yet you're uninjured. Even against you, I doubt he could have been defeated so easily...
He saved me from an ambush.
Then he is an enemy of the forces of darkness, after all. He must know something that we don't...
This swordsman could be a valuable ally. Unfortunately, he doesn't seem interested in accepting our help...
Not everyone is a team player.
Well, there's little to be done about that. More to the point, were you able to explore the deep end of the ice cavern? We couldn't get very far.
There's a narrow valley at the end, but the cold is too bitter to go further.
Hmm... They say the cold of this place is legendary. Now we know why. It's said that only the citizens of the snow kingdom could... That's it!
The cold seems to have slowed my wits! The snow kingdom vanished a while ago, but some of its citizens still belong to the empire. That includes $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ over there!
Isn't that the weapon merchant from $map:02000001$...?
Correct. He's come to help keep us supplied. But before he came to the capital, he lived in the snow kingdom that used to be here. There's a chance he know a way to get past the bitter cold.
It wouldn't hurt to ask.
I think that would be for the best. I'll leave this to you.
$npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ may be our only hope for continuing the investigation.
Hey! I remember you from $map:02000001$!
I was hoping you could help me with something...
You're mistaken. We've never met.
Don't play games with me. I've seen you wandering around $map:02000001$ before! I never forget a potential customer.
I was hoping you could help me with something...
...That passage leads to the $map:52000083$, and the cold that stopped you is the magic of $npc:11003069[gender:1]$...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003060[gender:0]$'s expression darkens.)</font>

I volunteered to help the captain for a reason. I wanted a chance to see my queen again. But that snowstorm... I'm not strong enough to get through it. Each snowflake felt like the tears of $npc:11003069[gender:1]$, grieving the loss of her kingdom and $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...
Must you really go in there? If $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ is using this kind of magic, then she wants to be alone.
All the more reason for me to go.
What do you mean?
The forces of darkness are here, too. Your queen is in danger.
Then... then there's no other option. Do you promise you'll save her?
I will, but first I need to get through the blizzard.
$npcName:11003063[gender:0]$... He can help.
Normally, you'd need enough magic power to match $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ if you wanted to get through the blizzard. Luckily for us, I know of a special potion that should do the trick.

Yetis aren't usually good with potions. Our sense of smell is too weak to find herbs, you see. But $npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ is special. He can find herbs with his skinny little fingers and use them to make all kinds of medicine.
Where is he?
$map:02000263$. He's a little guy. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.
$map:02000263$. He's a little guy. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.
Too cold to talk. Shoo.
I need $item:20000451$.
Wh-what? Who're you? What do you want? Do you even know what you're asking?
I need to get through $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard and make sure she's okay.
$npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ sent you, didn't he? Always sniveling about queen this and royal duty that.
Is it wrong for him to be worried?
He's worrying over nothing! Stubborn oaf...

Sure, she was a fine queen, when times are good. But it all fell apart overnight! The kingdom vanished, and the king and queen with it. The cold wasn't the worst part... The worst part is how we all scattered.
So she wants to hole herself up and mope, when we're the ones who suffered because of her? Fine by me! I'll be happy if I never see her again!
I'm not asking you to see her. I just need your help.
Not interested! That potion is a pain in the tush to make. It's hard to get the ingredients.
The forces at work here are a threat to all of Maple World!
If they're such a big threat, why are they wasting their time in the remains of some has-been kingdom?
That's what I need to find out. Can you make the $item:20000451$?
Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. Grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.
Come back before I change my mind.
Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. Grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.
Another few minutes and I was going to wander off. Hand over the stuff.
(Give him the ingredients.)
Those'll do. Go stand over there. Need room to work.
The $item:20000451$ is complete. It will let you endure the blizzard. But remember, potions don't last forever. This one especially!
Drink it right before you enter $map:52000082$. If you use it too soon, it'll wear off and you'll wind up a popsicle.
What's the matter?
I lost the $item:20000451$...
How long does the potion last?
Good thing I made a big batch. Here's a refill. Remember, it won't last long, so hurry!
It's in your bag. I'm not a charity, you know! Only one potion at a time!
Your bag is crammed full of garbage. Make some room.
Not long. That's all I can say. If I were you, I'd drink it right before going into $map:52000082$.
You and that swordsman saved me. I'll never forget your kindness... But how did you make it through the blizzard?
I had help from some yetis.
The yetis look like big oafs, but they're actually very resourceful. $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ were fond of them. I was hoping to get help from one of them...
If he were here, $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ might have made a different choice. I tried sending for him, but I never got a response. $map:02000001$ must be terribly far away...
A yeti in $map:02000001$... Do you mean $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$?
Yes! He sells weapons there. Before the kingdom fell, he was the gatekeeper of $map:52000086$ for a very, very long time. I'm surprised you know him!
He's in $map:52000080$ at this very moment.
Then... he did come! We still have a chance to protect $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ from that specter. $npcName:11003060$ may be able to stop her from opening the $map:52000085$...!
I... sure. We could probably make that happen.
Thank heavens. No, thank you!
We need to get $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ and go to the $map:02000381$! But... I can hardly walk in this state...
Let me go in your place.
But... This is for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$... I can't ask an outsider...
I needed to go to $map:02000381$ with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ anyway.
But... What business could you have there...?
I need to investigate the specter for myself.
I understand. I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. It's the least I can do to thank you...
It's no problem. You should get some rest.
Thank you. Let me know when you're ready...
I'm ready.
Wait a minute.
O winds of the blizzard, open a path through the heavens...!
My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.
I'm ready.
I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. Let me know when you're ready.
I'm ready.
Wait a minute.
O winds of the blizzard, open a path through the heavens...!
My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.
I'm ready.
W-well? Is the queen all right?
I need you're help. We have to get to the $map:02000381$.
I-is that where the queen is? What is going on?
(Bring him up to date.)
Then we really do have to hurry. Something big is going on.

The $map:02000382$ is the only way to reach the $map:52000086$. The snow kingdom is lost, but its secret treasure is still there. Our wise ancestors locked it up so that its power couldn't be used against the world...
The Frozen Crystal... It's in a vault in the $map:02000383$, locked away by perfect yeti engineering. Only the queen can open up the path through the $map:02000382$ to get there.
The vault itself can only be opened by both the king and queen together. And they'd never do so willingly, since they know how dangerous the treasure is.
But now the kingdom is gone... and so is the king. And this specter promised the queen that he could somehow reunite her with $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...
If $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ is alive, then the vault can be opened?
Yes. That's why we have to stop $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ at the shrine. I don't think she'll like us thwarting her plan to meet $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ again...
That seems pretty selfish of her.

For as long as our kingdom was around, every queen had her king, and every king was made for his queen. They are two halves to the whole. To be separated from each other is unbearable... I'm sure $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ would do the same thing in her shoes.
That's why I have to protect her! She already lost too much. Even if it's her fault that we have no kingdom or king, she's suffered enough...
There's a path on the slope over $map:02000260$ that leads to the $map:02000381$. The $map:02000382$ is there... somewhere. I'll meet you in the mountains.
I'm not sure how to get there...
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
Are you lost?
How do I get there again?
Can't you just take me there?

There's a path on the slope over $map:02000260$ that leads to the $map:02000381$. Halfway up, you'll see a bunch of trees near the stairs. Search the snow wall and you'll see a small cave that shines with blue light. Go in there.
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
I can't say I wasn't expecting this... but I can't just give up.
We have no idea how much danger the Frozen Crystal is in or what dangers $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ will meet at the $map:02000383$.
$MyPCName$... I appreciate everything you've done for me... But are you sure you've got time to fix the problems of a kingdom that already fell?
I'm pretty sure the forces of darkness are here, so this is my business, too.
Then... will you go to the $map:02000383$ with me? I need to keep looking for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$.
Yes. We'll do this together.
Thank you. Let me know when you're ready to leave.
Let me know when you're ready to leave.
The $map:52000086$... It's hidden by a veil of frost beyond $map:02000263$. But the door should appear to us, now that $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ opened the way.
Give me a moment. I'll find the door...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ is chanting to himself.)</font>
(Wait a little bit.)
Found it. At the top of $map:02000263$. The door to the $map:52000086$ is there.
I'm not sure how to get there...
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
Are you lost?
How do I get there again?
Can't you just take me there?
Find the tallest, steepest part of $map:02000263$. The door to the $map:52000086$ is there.
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
It seems you've been busy. Good to have you back.
I've been buried in mission briefings and paperwork this entire time. I wish I could have been out there in the field, with you...
(Fill him in on everything that happened.)
I never thought I'd hear the names $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ again. Everyone thought they vanished along with their kingdom.
I suspect this specter is allied with the forces of darkness. There's a plot brewing. And how does the $npcName:11003062[gender:0]$ fit into all of this...?
I have no idea what became of him.
He's certainly a match for either of us in a fight. It seems you're especially worried about him...
<font color="#909090">(He knew something about the specter...)</font>

Anyway, all sorts of powerful beings are coming out from the woodwork. It's as if the enemy is moving their pieces into position. Meanwhile, we don't even know what game we're supposed to be playing...
Ah, one last thing. We've been recalled to $map:02000001$. My troops and I will be departing soon.
Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.
I've been buried in mission briefings and paperwork this entire time. I wish I could have been out there in the field, with you...
(Fill him in on everything that happened.)
I never thought I'd hear the names $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ again. Everyone thought they vanished along with their kingdom.
I suspect this specter is allied with the forces of darkness. There's a plot brewing. And how does the $npcName:11003062[gender:0]$ fit into all of this...?
I have no idea what became of him.
He's certainly a match for either of us in a fight. It seems you're especially worried about him...
<font color="#909090">(Something about his swordsmanship... It was somehow familiar...)</font>
All sorts of powerful beings are coming out from the woodwork. It's as if the enemy is moving their pieces into position. Meanwhile, we don't even know what game we're supposed to be playing...
Ah, one last thing. We've been recalled to $map:02000001$. My troops and I will be departing soon.
Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.
Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.
$MyPCName$!
How are you holding up?
I'm fine now. $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ took care of me.
The queen was real quiet for a while. When she finally spoke up, she thanked me for all the help. She's grateful to you, too. Honestly, I was dumbstruck at being thanked by the queen herself!
I don't know what happened to the king. I don't even know if that guy was really $npc:11003075[gender:0]$... I can't imagine how the queen feels about this. It's enough to break a yeti's heart.
You should be proud. You did good work.
Thanks... But I couldn't've done it without you. I'll be doing my best to cheer my queen up from now on.
$npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003066[gender:1]$ will want to help.
You're right! I don't got to do this alone. There's no point feeling bad about the kingdom we lost. Now we got to appreciate those of us who stuck around.
I'm rooting for you.
And I'm rooting for you, too! Don't be a stranger. Come visit me at my stall in $map:02000001$ sometime, okay?
You're going back to $map:02000001$ after all this?
Hey, a yeti's got to make a living! And adventurers like you count on me for my fine craftsmanship. I'll be able to find plenty of time to visit here.
<font color="#909090">(You should return to $map:02000001$ and check in with the empress.)</font>
Well, I'd better get my stuff together. See you back in $map:02000001$!
Well, I'd better get my stuff together. See you back in $map:02000001$!
$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ tells me that your performance on this latest mission has been exemplary.
(Give a brief report.)
We may not have learned more about $npc:11001851[gender:1]$, but I'd call this mission a success. The forces of darkness are expanding their operations all over Maple World.
$npc:11003075[gender:0]$ was once a benevolent king. To hear what's become of him, I can't help but think that the forces of darkness were behind the collapse of his kingdom.
We need to keep our ears to the ground. If any new disasters crop up, I'll let you know as well.
I will remember the service you've rendered. Thank you, $MyPCName$.
$map:02000076$ needs our help.
Not so fast, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s knights are already... indisposed, and your guards are needed to protect $map:02000001$.
$map:02000076$'s militia is strong. They wouldn't ask for our help if the situation wasn't dire, minister. We can't turn our backs on them!
Let us say we do send our forces to help $map:02000076$. Would that not make $map:02000001$ a tempting target? Would you leave the empress exposed to these fiends?
(There has to be a way to help...!)
You're right, minister. Still, we must do something. What if we sent a small, elite team to aid $map:02000076$ while the bulk of our forces stayed here?
Absolutely not. The last thing we need is you taking your best men and gallavanting off into the woods. Your place is here, by Her Imperial Majesty's side!
<font color="#909090">(Court politics! This isn't what you signed up for. It's time to take matters into your own hands. Speak with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Court politics! This isn't what you signed up for. It's time to take matters into your own hands. Speak with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$.)</font>
Hmm... Both the minister and the captain bring up good points.
I will go to $map:02000076$ myself.
Alone? That sounds dangerous.
$npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ wants to send an elite team. Let me be that team.
If it were anyone else, I'd call it bravado. But you... You just might be up to the task.
$MyPCName$, we are in your debt. Go now to $map:02000076$ and do what you can to help those people.
The scout's portal is still open. Are you ready to go?
I'm ready now.
Portals give me motion sickness.
Tell $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ that we will send reinforcements as soon as we have the soldiers to spare. Good luck.
I'm sure you'll be fine. Imperial portals are famous for being a smooth ride. No portal sickness or your next teleportation is free!
I was jok—Ah, never mind. I'm ready.
Tell $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ that we will send reinforcements as soon as we have the soldiers to spare. Good luck.
I haven't seen a fight like that in a long time. You have our thanks.
I believe $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ would like to speak with you.
I was concerned when you were the only reinforcements we received from $map:02000001$, but it seems the empress knows what she's doing. We're lucky to have you.
It's too early for us to let our guard down, though. We need to be ready for another attack, and we have to make sure we have enough food and supplies.
I'm sure $map:02000001$ will send supplies.
Probably. In the meantime, I'm going to survey the town. See where we were hit hardest.
Thorough as always, Captain. I leave this in your hands.
The militia will take things from here. $npc:11000001[gender:0]$, you need to get some rest.
The militia will take things from here. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$, you need to get some rest.
$MyPCName$, if you wouldn't mind, I have a request for you.
This is something of a personal request. I would like you to bring back a certain young man...
And who might that be?
His name is $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$, and he's... my son. He was hurt in the fighting, so he should still be at $map:02000027$.
He may not be eager to see me. I was... hard on him earlier.
And why's that?

He spotted the enemy while patrolling $map:02000054$, but he decided to try fighting them himself rather than coming back and reporting their position. Maybe I was being unreasonable, but we can't allow such sloppiness in the militia!
It's because of his actions that many of our friends were hurt. He was too busy chasing glory to bother doing the right thing. Still, I wonder if I wasn't too harsh...
All I want is a nice, quiet conversation with my boy. Will you bring $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ to me?
All I want is a nice, quiet conversation with my boy. Will you bring $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ to me? He should be in $map:02000027$.
Welcome to my hospital.
You don't look like you're here as a patient. So, what can I do for you?
I'm looking for someone in particular.
As you can see, the hospital is empty today. Pretty amazing, considering that we were just under attack. It's all thanks to my patented first aid kits, you know.
Has $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ been in at all?
I haven't seen that troublemaker all day, and thank goodness for that. I'm always patching up some scrape or bruise on that scamp.
Do you know where I might find $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?
$npcName:11000961[gender:1]$ is his friend, though I can't say I understand why. She should be on patrol near the hills.
I'll check with $npcName:11000961[gender:1]$, then.
While you're at it, would you mind delivering some first aid supplies? The militia could probably use it after that last scrape-up. It's inside the cabinet just over there.
While you're at it, would you mind delivering some first aid supplies? The militia could probably use it after that last scrape-up. It's inside the cabinet just over there.
Identify yourself!
(Hand over $item:30000767$.)
Ah, I'm sorry! I didn't realize you were one of the good guys.
We were starting to run low on supplies. Is there any way I can repay you?
I'm looking for $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$.
Oh no. He hasn't gotten into trouble again, has he? He's a good kid, really! He just gets moody whenever his dad scolds him...
$npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is the one who sent me.
Well, that's good. He's a bit reckless, but there's a reason for it. He wants to live up to his father's legacy as a great hero.

$npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ was too hard on him today. Said it would be better if he stayed in the hospital forever rather than risk any more lives with his bravado. I... haven't seen him since, actually.
He can't have gotten far. I bet you could see him from the top of the hill.
$npcName:11000502[gender:0]$'s injuries weren't too bad, but still, he couldn't have left town. Try asking if the kid hanging out on the top of the hill saw him.
Mom told me not to talk to strangers...
Do you know $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?
Yeah, I know him. Mom says he's a slob.
Why're you looking for him, anyway? He's usually moping around behind the $map:02000072$...
I'm trying to find out if $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is still in town.
That's easy. Just use some binoculars. There's a pair across the waterfall over there.
Tell me more about these... binoc-ulars.

Just walk on up to binoculars and use them to see all over the area. If you still can't find him, I think he liked to visit $npcName:11000189[gender:1]$'s cornfield an awful lot, so you can check there, too.

Just walk on up to binoculars and use them to see all over the area. If you still can't find him, I think he liked to visit $npcName:11000189[gender:1]$'s cornfield an awful lot, so you can check there, too.
What an interesting person...
Yes, I am pretty interesting.
Not you! That $male:handsome guy,female:beautiful girl$ over there. Heheh...
Hey, I'm plenty $male:hand,female:beau$—ahem. Have you seen $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?
Well, sure, but he's not here now. He wandered off about... 30 minutes ago, I want to say?
I'm pretty sure I know where he went. So... shall I tell you?
Yes, I must know!
Tell me. Don't tell me. It's all the same.
That's what I thought! But there's no such thing as a free lunch, you know. You need to do something for me first...
Of course there are strings attached.
There's no use playing coy with me. I see right through you. And I'll even tell you what you want to know... if you do me a favor first.
Of course there are strings attached.
My poor, darling corn plants are in a terrible mood since those monsters invaded town...
No, no, they look very fresh. The freshest!
But they're not! Can't you see them drooping because they're so scared? I need a friendly person like you to cheer them up!
You need me to... cheer up... your corn...
That's right! All you have to do is walk up to them and use the greet emote. Do that three times, and then we'll talk.
You do know how to greet, don't you? Just type /greet in the chat window.
Wow, your greeting is so cool. My corn will grow up big and strong for sure, thanks to you!

As promised, I will now tell you where to find $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$. Your search is over! Soon, all of the answers you seek will be yours! Without delay! You don't need to wait another moment!
Just tell me!
Right, right. What did he say again? Something something... Dark Wind... reinforcements... something something. And then he just ran off.
(Isn't Dark Wind still busy rebuilding $map:02000100$?)

You may think $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is a big, stupid, ugly dummy, but he's got friends in $map:02000100$. It's actually where we met, before I moved here. He's probably hitting up one of them for a connection to Dark Wind.
And who would he go to for that kind of help?
I don't know his name, but he's got an unforgettable style. He got kicked out of town for disturbing the peace, so now he lives in $map:02000083$. You'll recognize him by his flashy hat.
I don't know his name, but he's got an unforgettable style. He got kicked out of town for disturbing the peace, so now he lives in $map:02000083$. You'll recognize him by his flashy hat.
Hey $male:guy,female:gal$. I'm hun-to-the-gry. You got some mesos for me? Or you just here to gronk up my style?
Are you $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$'s friend?
Don't be talking that mushroom noise at me, man. I hate mushrooms. So me and my boy, we hate $map:02000076$, too.
You deaf, $male:man,female:lady$? 'Shrooms make me sick! I don't want nothing to do with $map:02000076$ or that shroomy elder's son!
You sure know an awful lot about $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$.
...Y-yeah, well... Your face is... Hmph. Fine, you got me.
Where is $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?

That chump was asking around $map:02000100$ for people to come help his hotshot dad. Caught the attention of the shady goons holed up in $map:02000243$. You don't wanna mess with those guys, $male:bro,female:lady$.
So $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is in $map:02000243$?
I'm sure of it. $npc:24000010[gender:0]$ nabbed him right off the street. $npc:11000502[gender:0]$ is in deep doo doo...
I'd better start at $map:02000241$ and head down.
I'd better start at $map:02000241$ and head down.
Close one. That pushover almost got me... And to think, I let the son of $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ slip through my fingers...
Well, if it isn't my good friend $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$.
Scram, weirdo. I'm not in the mood for—Uh oh. Good to see you, $MyPCName$!
A-as you can see, I've renounced my life of crime! Wh-what brings you here, old buddy?
I'm here about a pushover.

I didn't mean anything mean by it. Honest! The kid said he was $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s son. I offered to, erm, to take him home. That's right! I was gonna take him home, but the kid scampered off somewhere!
And how much of what you just told me is true?
All of it. Most of it, at least! One of my boys told me he got on a taxi for $map:02000134$.

Word on the street is that they're making this new miracle medicine over there. We were thinking of getting our hands on the stuff and selling it for a profit. The brat must've overheard us... Guess he didn't hear us talk about the monsters.
I'm going. If you get in my way...
I'm not that dumb. If you're involved in this mess at $map:02000134$, I want nothing more to do with it.
I'm not that dumb. If you're involved in this mess at $map:02000134$, I want nothing more to do with it.
Ugh... This was supposed to be easy...
$npcName:11000502[gender:0]$!
Huh?
Y-you were tailing me. Is that it?
(Explain everything.)
Those goons left out the part about the monsters... But that just means this is my chance!
It's your chance to go home before you get stomped.
No! I'm not coming back empty-handed. Not again. It's my fault so many were hurt... I've gotta make up for it.
...I'm listening.
Please... beat up the monsters here and get the $itemPlural:20000050$ they stole. We can use it to help all the injured folk back home.
Please... beat up the monsters here and get the $itemPlural:20000050$ they stole. We can use it to help all the injured folk back home.
This should be enough. Thanks, $MyPCName$!
$npcName:11000502[gender:0]$, you need to go home. Now.
Okay, but let's make one thing clear. We got these $itemPlural:20000050$ together, okay? I'm the one who tracked them down in the first place, so if anyone gets credit for this, it's me.
Fine, fine. Can we just go now?
Since we see eye to eye, yes. Let's get going.
Since we see eye to eye, yes. Let's get going.
Ugh... $npcName:11000672[gender:1]$...
<font color="#909090">(She's seriously hurt.)</font> Help... Help them...!
We need to get you to safety.
Forget about me... Get to the $map:52000121$... $npcName:11000001$ and $npcName:11000015$... in trouble...! Wraith in rags... returned...
He's too strong... And $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ can't...
He was just... covering for his son...
$map:52000121$... just ahead...
This... can't be...
$npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s health was already in decline. I'm not sure when we can expect him to wake up...
It's my fault. If reinforcements had come earlier...
$npcName:11000001[gender:0]$...
Aw jeez, something bad happened, didn't it?
What are you doing here?
I'm doing my part as a guard! Today, I'm helping the captain here in $map:02000076$.
I hear you kicked all the monsters out of town single-handedly! Every time I meet you, you're a little bit cooler. You're my role model.
Shucks. I'm going to blush.
I mean it! Someday, I'm going to be a great hero like you! But, uh... That guy who just left. Wasn't that $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$'s son? He looked hurt... and upset...
Your concern is touching, $npcName:11001838[gender:0]$, but I think you'd better focus on looking out for yourself. Now, that's enough small talk.
Yes, Sir! All done with small talk, Sir! Sniff... $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is scary...
<font size='20'>Sniff... $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is scary...</font>
$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is right. All these attacks happening at once... They aren't a coincidence. Someone is moving against the empire.

You can feel it in the air. People are gossiping, wondering where the shadows are going to strike next. And the attacks aren't random, either. They're stirring up memories of a time that most of us would rather forget...

We cannot simply protect $map:02000001$ while the rest of the empire burns. That is why we have turned our attention to the $map:02000146$. Strange things have happened there. In the present and in the past...

$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ is in command of the elite force garrisoned there. It seems he's too busy to file a report with us. I'd like you to go there and find out if it's somehow connected to these recent attacks.
I'll head to the $map:02000146$, then.
That's what I wanted to hear. When you get there, meet with $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$. I leave this to you.
Are you really going to the $map:02000146$? Aren't you scared?
Somebody has to fight the darkness.
You're so cool!
Yeah. I am pretty cool.
I've just been given my very first solo mission. I'm just like you, now!
And what mission is that?
I'm going to take care of some trouble at $map:02000087$. It's nothing dangerous or important like your work, but I've got to start somewhere.
I'm sure you'll do just fine.
$npcName:11001838[gender:0]$! Don't you think $MyPCName$ has more important things to worry about right now?
Yes, Sir! Of course, Sir! Whatever you say, Sir! Aw jeez...
There, there.
I'll be a real guard next time we meet. Be careful at the $map:02000146$!
I'll be a real guard next time we meet. Be careful at the $map:02000146$!
Ah, $MyPCName$. I've heard much of your latest exploits.
As you can see, things are bad here. We've been gathering samples from the undead monsters for study, but it turns out that they don't take kindly to being harvested.
Even with the reinforcements from $map:02000100$ and $map:02000076$, it's been difficult to collect all of the $itemPlural:20000047$ our scientists need.
I suggest you speak with $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000026$. He's the resident expert on darkness and what have you.
He's not exactly in a friendly mood lately. You might bring him some $itemPlural:20000047$ as an... offering, let's say. You can get these samples from the undead monsters around here.
Meet with $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000026$. He can bring you up to speed on his research. Ah, and collect some $itemPlural:20000047$ for him on the way, if you'd be so kind.
Ahem! Thanks, but no thanks. I haven't got time to entertain the likes of you.
(Show him the $itemPlural:20000047$.)
This is a welcome surprise. You're actually competent!
I just happened to need this right now. And you brought a lot of it. Impressive.
It wasn't that hard to get.
That's interesting. The others told me that it was too hard to get any more samples. So, were they lying to me? Or...
Perhaps it is you who is lying in order to impress me.
It really wasn't that hard!
(Say nothing.)
Ah, I love people who are easy to rile up. You're the complete opposite of you-know-who.
Who?
Hmph. I thought we could have a little fun, but it seems you aren't much for teasing. We already have one too many dour faces here...
And who might that be?
The sole representative of the lofty academy of $map:02000023$. A man who loves to meddle in my many experiments. A man with a handsome face and an ice-cold personality...
I think he likes you. Maybe you can keep him from mixing his hocus pocus in with my experiments.
And you've brought a fresh batch of $itemPlural:20000047$. Excellent. We could make great use of your talents right about now.
This place used to be the $map:52000115$, a great monument to the Seven Heroes. After the passage to the Land of Darkness opened, however, people have taken to calling it the $map:02000146$.
This gate is the source of the shadow magic that is spreading across Victoria Island. And now we're even finding $item:20000047$ on the monsters here...
The way to the Land of Darkness was sealed years ago. For it to reappear like this...
The fairfolk of $map:02000023$—and many other groups throughout Maple World—fought so hard to close the passage, and now it is all for naught. This represents a threat to everyone everywhere.
That is why we are trying to understand the nature of this darkness. Simply fighting without understanding will lead us nowhere.
Let's shed some light on this darkness, then.
Very clever. Now, if you're done with your wordplay, I need to borrow $MyPCName$. My analysis is complete.
$MyPCName$, over here. We need to talk.
It would have taken months for anyone else to analyze these samples. Luckily for you, I am a genius at the fine arts of alchemy and engineering.
Yes, yes, you're so great. And?
I'm just making sure we're on the same page about my greatness.
I've gone through enough of these samples to confirm that a blue glowing substance appears whenever I break down $item:20000047$. It's the weirdest thing...
What's so weird about that?
This substance has never been catalogued anywhere. Not in Maple World, and not in the Land of Shadows. And believe me, I've checked everywhere.
One fool even went into the Land of Darkness himself to see if he could find more of the stuff. He had to check into the hospital after meddling with some crystals there.
That's rough.

<font color="#909090">(He glances at $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.)</font> Look here, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. I've hit a dead end. So, if you're going to swoop in and give us a solution with your magic mumbo-jumbo, now's the time!
Magic doesn't provide easy answers, but I do have something to show you. Have you prepared the $itemPlural:20000016$ I asked for?
Who do you think I am? Of course I... <font size='20'>Uh-oh.</font>
<font size='20'>Oops.</font>
No, no. Surely it didn't slip my mind...
What's wrong?
Hey, I need your help. You'll come through for your old friend, won't you?

The $itemPlural:20000016$ he's talking about are made from the $itemPlural:20000045$ that grow here. Most everything is killed by the dark magic in this place, but those fungi thrive. I've often thought they could be used to make an antidote for shadow poisoning...

It was a moot point until recently, since the mushrooms don't take to farming. But one day, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ trotted in with an armful of $itemPlural:20000045$. It seems he used his magic to create a garden of the things. Of course magic was the answer...
Problem is, it turns out the shrooms attract monsters. I was going to complain to $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ about it, but he was already off researching something else.

It's easy for $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ to blast the beasties with his magic, but most of the schmucks here can't fight to save their lives. So I figured, if he didn't care enough to help out, I might as well get on with my own research...
But since he needs his pills right now, I need the $itemPlural:20000045$ right now. Go fetch them for me and I'll whip up some $itemPlural:20000016$ in a jiffy!
The garden's just out front. Pick some $itemPlural:20000045$ so I can make my wonder cure.
You work fast. Good. I expect nothing less.
Now to make the $itemPlural:20000016$. I designed the formula to be so easy that an idiot could do it if $male:he,female:she$ had the right materials!
I do believe the idiot in this analogy is you. Do you feel up to an attempt?
Sounds like fun!
Find some other idiot to do it.
That's the spirit! Simply place the $itemPlural:20000045$ into an open mixer. Child's play.
That's simple enough.
If you don't get more hands-on in the lab, you'll never make a proper scholar.
Fine! I'll try it.
Great. Throw your $itemPlural:20000045$ into an open mixer and go wild. If you lost them somehow, you can pick more from the garden.
Just throw your $itemPlural:20000045$ into an open mixer and go wild. If you lost them somehow, you can pick more from the garden.
That looks about right. You did fine, $MyPCName$.
Satisfactory. $npcName:11003143[gender:0]$ has his... quirks, but his work is reliable. I was relieved to find such a competent researcher here.
I'm preeetty sure he hates you.
That's hardly unexpected. Scientists and magicians often don't get along. Most scientists I've met can't stand the thought of a mage such as myself dabbling in their precious research.

$npcName:11003143[gender:0]$ is no exception to this rule. He was shocked when I gave him the blueprints for the mixer... But $npcName:11003143[gender:0]$ and I are scholars, and in that, I consider him a worthy companion.
Now, I need to file my report. $MyPCName$, won't you join me?
Where are we going?
To $map:52000133$, of course. $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will be eager to learn what we've found. And the people here will be relieved to know that one of the Seven Heroes is keeping an eye on things.
All right. Let's go.
I don't feel like going.
I'll open a portal, then. Please close your eyes.
Are you sure? $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will be eager to see you...
Fine, I'll go.
I'll open a portal, then. Please close your eyes.
It seems $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has brought me a welcomed guest. I'm glad you're here, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has kept me informed of your many adventures. It is good to see you.

You may not be aware of this, but as one of the Seven Heroes, $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ holds quite a lot of influence beyond these walls. His power rivaled even the Mage of Light, $npcName:11001812[gender:0]$, at his peak.
Oh, I'm just an old mage trying to make himself useful in his final years. However, I've still got the curiosity of an academy freshman. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, your report?
Of course, Headmaster. Let me begin.
I'm just an old mage trying to make himself useful in his final years. However, I've still got the curiosity of an academy freshman. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, your report?
I'm glad you decided to join me. I'm sure you'll find my report fascinating.

I've focused my research on the $item:20000047$ of the monsters inhabiting the $map:02000146$. This DNA exudes a blue, glowing substance. In all of my cross-referencing, I can't find mention of such a substance anywhere.

The $itemPlural:20000045$ near the $map:02000146$ give off a similar blue light. I originally believed this light was the mushrooms' life force acting to shield it from the poison of the area, but now I have a different hypothesis.
The $itemPlural:20000045$ are organisms of darkness. Their glow actually spreads dark magic, allowing it to take root in other creatures. I've prepared an experiment to demonstrate.
Please come with me to my lab.
I'm ready now.
Give me a minute.
It's not far, but let's teleport to save time.
All right. Let me know when you're ready.
Please come with me to my lab.
I'm ready now.
Give me a minute.
It's not far, but let's teleport to save time.
All right. Let me know when you're ready.
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ believes that the power of darkness is spreading. The fall of the $map:52000115$ and the opening of the $map:02000146$ may be the beginning of something terrible...
(But why did the crystal react to you like that?)
$MyPCName$, are you all right? You seem flustered.
Don't fret. Such incidents are common in this kind of research. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ will get to the bottom of this mystery.
Now, I have some distressing news: $map:02000023$ is under attack by our dark enemy. Fortunately, we've managed to hold them off for now.
How did you manage that?

I've raised a simple magical barrier to protect $map:02000023$. Well, I say simple, but I'm pouring a lifetime of magic into it to keep the thing up. I'm afraid I'm quite stuck here as long as I have to maintain the shield.

The students and faculty of $map:52000101$ should be more than enough to keep $map:02000023$ relatively safe. But we can't rely on this barrier forever. We need to strengthen our position and prepare a counterattack.
$MyPCName$, you've faced these invaders in $map:02000100$ and $map:02000076$. This may be your chance to gather vital information on who they are and how they work.
I'll do what I can.
I expected nothing less. One of our more promising students is heading up our research efforts. I believe she'll be most happy to get your help.
Thank you for agreeing to help. One of our more promising students is heading up our research efforts. I believe she'll be most happy to get your help.
You're late! Some of us have things to do, you know.
Hold it right there. What is that smell?! Zombie drool... Bat musk... And shadow poison! You were with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in this state?!
Well, I don't think I smell.
Don't question my sense of smell! Ugh. We need to do something about this, and fast.
The springs here are enchanted to wash away dark magic. Go dunk yourself in it until all the curses wash out.
(Glare at her.)
What's the hold up? Go! Now! I am not spending another second in your presence until you're squeaky clean!
What's the hold up? Go! Now! I am not spending another second in your presence until you're squeaky clean!
I suppose that will do. You don't want dirty hands contaminating your spells and experiments, after all!
Unless you have Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s naturally perfect hygiene, the least you can do is splash water on that filthy face of yours from time to time!
The headmaster gave me an absurdly simple job. Honestly, I have more important work to do. That's why I'm sending you to do it, instead.
...I'll try not to mess it up.

The headmaster built his barrier using the academy's standing stones and totems as a foundation. Even for one of the Seven Heroes, it's hard to keep up that kind of magic for long. That's why we need to make sure the totems are in good shape.
Most of the students of the academy have been sent to make sure the totems are still standing. Some of them never came back. That's the problem.
And you want me to go find them.

You're getting it now. $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ was the first to lose contact, so I want you to find her first. She has a tendency to lose things, so hopefully that's all it is. Honestly, that girl...
Where was $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ last spotted?

Excuse me, but why do you think it's my job to keep track of my idiot peers? $npcName:11000029[gender:1]$ is always trailing behind her like a sad little puppy. She was sent to $map:02000023$ to distribute supplies, so why don't you try asking her?
Mind warping me to $map:02000023$?
I'm not your personal teleport scroll. Do it yourself.
Do you want my help or not?
Fine! Close your eyes and I'll send you straight there... if I feel like it.
Why are you still here? Hurry to $map:02000023$.
Send me now.
Ugh! You're so annoying! Fine!
What can I get you?
I'm looking for $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$.
I'm sorry, but I don't have any $npcNamePlural:11000284[gender:1]$ for sale.
I don't want to buy her!
Oh, you mean that $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$! S-sorry. I'm new to this 'shopkeeping' thing...
But why are you looking for $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$?
(Explain everything.)
That makes sense. I'm sure she's still working on the job she was given in $map:02000006$.
She's a little slow, but it's because she wants to do her best. I'm sure she's being really, really thorough! Since you're going there anyway, can you give her this?
What's this?
It's a packed lunch with all her favorite foods. Sometimes she gets so focused on her work, she forgets to eat.
I'll get this to her.
Thanks a lot! $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ is definitely still in $map:02000006$. Please let her know I'm rooting for her!
What's wrong?
I lost the $item:30000768$...
Where is $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$, exactly?
I had a feeling this might happen, so I packed an extra. Please be more careful this time. I put my heart into making this lunch!
Look inside your bag. It's there. You aren't trying to get extra lunches, are you?
Um... I think you need to make some space in your bag. It's already full!
She's in $map:02000006$. When she's stumped on a problem, she likes to stand by the water and think. I'd look for her there.
I'd love to chat, but I'm on academy business.
(Hand her the $item:30000768$ that $npcName:11000029[gender:1]$ made.)
This is $npcName:11000029[gender:1]$'s cooking! Thank you for delivering it.
Well, you're still here. You're no ordinary delivery $male:boy,female:girl$, are you?
I was sent to check up on you.
Oh no, really? This is bad. I volunteered to help the headmaster, and now I'm just causing more trouble for everyone else. I'm too much of a dummy to solve this problem...
What problem?
The totem was already destroyed when I got here. And the forest was crawling with dark monsters! I thought that witch, $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$, might help me, since she's lived here so long...
But instead of telling me what to do, she gave me a riddle. I tried to solve it on my own...
I'll speak with this $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ myself.
$npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ runs the $map:02000073$, but she doesn't open her door for just anyone. You need to prove that you've got the forest's best interests at heart.
And how can I do that?

Drive the $npcPlural:33000006$ away. They don't belong to this forest. If you show up at her shop covered in the dark magic of her defeated enemies, $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ will have to listen to you!

Drive the $npcPlural:33000006$ away. They don't belong to this forest. If you show up at her shop covered in the dark magic of her defeated enemies, $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ will have to listen to you!
Oh, yes, you're coated in it. The icky sticky aura of the shadows. What business brings you to my door, child?
That fairfolk fool sent you to me, didn't she? Did my riddle unwind her puny mind? Heheh...
We need to reinforce the magic barrier!
And I have given her the answer. All she needs to do is solve the riddle.
I'll solve it. How does it go?
Listen carefully, for I shan't repeat myself! "Two divine creatures lost their hearts when darkness fell. End their pain and redeem the forsaken soul."
That is the same expression the fairfolk child made. Heheheh...
Can I have a clue?
Certainly, my dear. Here is the clue: Begone from this place before I use your eyes in my stew! Eheheheh!
If you're still puzzling over my riddle, why not get help from the fairfolk girl? Between the two of you, you've got one whole wit!
How did it go?
(Tell her the witch's riddle.)
That's the same thing she told me. Eccentric old bat!
To be honest, I thought this would be a piece of cake. But none of my solutions worked, and when I went to $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ for help, she mocked me for only getting it half right.
Why did I volunteer to do this? I was happy before. I had decent grades... But now I feel like a total idiot...
What was your solution?

There's a place called $map:02000089$ near here. It's the home of $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$, a great turtle who was separated from his love. The forsaken soul was... Well, I thought it was something in the $map:02000074$.
So I did a favor for $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ and I searched everywhere for anything with a hint of magic in the $map:02000074$. And since then... nothing. No clues, no ideas, just nothing.
We should search some more.
No! I did my best, and look where it got me? I just want to give up.
There, there...
You stay here and sort out your thoughts. I'm going to take a look around the $map:02000074$.
You stay here and sort out your thoughts. I'm going to take a look around the $map:02000074$.
And you're here... why?
I was about to ask you the same.
I come here when I need to focus. It's a reprieve from all the idiots who stomp around the campus. They're afraid of the ghosts, you see...
Th-there are ghosts in here?!
Ha! I wouldn't be much of a mage if I were afraid of a little haunting or two.
I answered your question. So what are you doing here?
(Tell her about $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ and the riddle.)
$npcName:11000304[gender:1]$ was quite right to call you fools. I can't believe you couldn't solve such an obvious riddle on your own...
You know the answer?
Yes. And you should feel ashamed that you don't!
If you tell me, I'll let $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ know you're doing a great job.

<font color="#909090">(Her cheeks take on a deep blush.)</font> W-well! Not that I care, but I might as well tell you. <font size='20'>Just don't forget to tell Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$...</font>

One of the lost hearts is $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$, but everything else was wrong. The other heart is the $npcName:22000038$ that lives near $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$. When the darkness first arrived, it drove the girant mad.

To end their pain... You must defeat the $npcName:22000038$ to put it out of its misery. $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ can still be reasoned with, so you should find some peaceful way to ease his suffering.
And the heart of the forsaken one... There's something here. Take care of the $npcName:22000038$ and $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ first. Then come back here and see if anything has changed.
I admit, you know your stuff.
As if I care what you think. Hurry to $map:02000089$, defeat the $npcName:22000038$, and figure out what $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ wants.
As if I care what you think. Hurry to $map:02000089$, defeat the $npcName:22000038$, and figure out what $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ wants.
You have endured a difficult battle. Please, rest your body and spirit in my spring.
Why have you come to see me? Are you friends with the fairfolk child?
I want to ease your pain.
There is only one thing in the whole world that could do such a thing. I wish to return to the old days, when my love was still by my side and her flowers bloomed...
But that is a wish that can never come true. I will ask of you the same thing that I asked of $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$.
Can you tell me the short version?
Tell me everything.

My love passed away not long ago, but she returned to me as the flower blossoming on my shell. I planted the seeds of the flower with care, since her spirit lives on with them. But then the monsters came, trampling everything in sight...
Can you save my dying flowers?
$MyPCName$... Have you ever been in love?
Yes.
No.
Then you understand. I had someone I loved who was dearer to me than life itself. But...
The day the Shadow Gate opened, the lake where we slept boiled like the sea in a raging storm, and she breathed her last breath.
I carried her as far as I could, not knowing where I was going or why. When I returned to my senses, my tears had become this spring, and a flower had blossomed in my love's place.

With every blossoming, I planted another flower seed. These seeds soon grew into flowers themselves. A final beauty, left behind by my love that I might remember her. But now, these monsters trample her flowers...
Can you save my dying flowers?
Perhaps you will not understand, then. I had someone I loved more than life itself. But...
The day the Shadow Gate opened, the lake where we slept boiled like the sea in a raging storm, and she breathed her last breath.
I carried her as far as I could, not knowing where I was going or why. When I returned to my senses, my tears had become this spring, and a flower had blossomed in my love's place.

With every blossoming, I planted another flower seed. These seeds soon grew into flowers themselves. A final beauty, left behind by my love that I might remember her. But now, these monsters trample her flowers...
Can you save my dying flowers?
Can you save my dying flowers?
I am touched by the kindness of your acts. Thank you.
$npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ came to me for a reason. But what about you? What are you looking for?
(Explain everything.)
A forsaken heart... That reminds me of a mage from days long past. He dabbled in forbidden magic so that he could be with the one he loved. This led to his banishment...

He lived out his days as a hermit, but he felt no resentment towards the people who banished him. He didn't want his sacrifices to go to waste. Even in the end, he wished for his power to someday be used for good.
When he passed away, he bound a fragment of his soul to that place. When someone with a good heart seeks his help, this fragment will open and reveal his power.
I need to get back to the $map:02000074$!
You have a good spirit and you wield righteous power. I am certain the forsaken heart will open for you...
You have a good spirit and you wield righteous power. I am certain the forsaken heart will open for you...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003255[gender:1]$ is gone, but she left a note.)</font>
