"$MyPCName$—It seems like you've solved the riddle. Congratulations. You're not a complete idiot. There's some sort of magic coming from the box under this note. When you're done sorting this mess out, let $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$ know."
"P.S., I solved the riddle easily because I'm great. Not because that other student is incompetent."

<font color="#909090">(Is she trying to show off, or is that her twisted way of defending $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$? You can puzzle out Kate's twisted motives after you've checked out the magic box.)</font>

<font color="#909090">(Is she trying to show off, or is that her twisted way of defending $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$? You can puzzle out Kate's twisted motives after you've checked out the magic box.)</font>
Did you see it? There was a strange light in the sky!
After the flash of gold in the sky, I started feeling some pretty strong magical vibrations. They felt like the headmaster's barrier! Did you figure out the riddle?
(Fill her in on everything that's happened.)
A wooden box is the new totem... Well, I guess I can't complain if it works.
Thanks for all your help. I would have been sunk if it weren't for you.
Do you need to report back to the others?
Um... If it's all the same to you, I want to study this new totem for a bit. Do you mind reporting in for me?
Who should I report to?

Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$. He's the magical texts teacher. He should be waiting near the $map:02000035$ in $map:02000023$. While you're there, maybe tell him that my homework is going to be a tiiiiiny bit late...

Please report to Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ in my place. He should be waiting near the $map:02000035$ in $map:02000023$. While you're there, maybe tell him that my homework is going to be a tiiiiiny bit late...
Do you have business with me?
(Deliver $npcName:11000284[gender:1]$'s report.)
I'm glad she was able to complete her task... even if she had help. It's unfortunate about her homework, though.

You're helping $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ maintain the barrier, are you not? If that's the case, there's something I need taken care of quickly. You seem like the $male:man,female:woman$ for the job.
What is it?

The barrier is busy defending against attacks from the outside, of course. However, it seems to be taking attacks from the inside, as well. We need to find the source of these attacks and snuff it out.
While reviewing my histories of magic, I came upon references to an old temple called $map:02000312$. The dark fairies worked to create something called a "shadow seed" in that place.
When the shadow seed is planted in a living creature, the subject loses its identity and becomes a monster filled with bloodlust. Eventually, the subject becomes a shadow itself...
Yikes.

That kind of magic tends to cling to a place. If a mage had the power and inclination, they could harness that power and do some real harm to $map:02000023$ without ever leaving the barrier. According to my research, the temple should be somewhere in $map:02000024$.
I have a shipment from the $map:52000103$ that I must attend to. $MyPCName$, will you go to $map:02000024$ and see if you can find this $map:02000312$?
One of my students, $npcName:11000876[gender:0]$, is already there. Between the two of you, I'm sure you'll puzzle out some way to uncover $map:02000312$.
One of my students, $npcName:11000876[gender:0]$, is already there. Between the two of you, I'm sure you'll puzzle out some way to uncover $map:02000312$.
Help has finally come! I knew the professor wouldn't forget me.
Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ said he'd send someone along to help me, but he didn't say it would be you! Wow!
When I first got here, I tried asking $npcName:11000293$, the old tree sprite, about $map:02000312$, but he just smiled and said he doesn't remember. I think I know how to jog his memory, though...
What do you have in mind?

We've gotta feed him something sweet! Whenever I can't remember what I'm doing, that's what I do. The boxes around here should have $itemPlural:20000052$ for $npcName:11000293$, but the monsters won't let him at them.
What a good plan. I will get those leaves.

I'll leave it to you! Once you have the $itemPlural:20000052$, take them straight to $npcName:11000293$. And don't forget to defeat the noisy monsters. We want our tree sprite friend to be distraction-free!

I'll leave it to you! Once you have the $itemPlural:20000052$, take them straight to $npcName:11000293$. And don't forget to defeat the noisy monsters. We want our tree sprite friend to be distraction-free!
And who are you?
I am $MyPCName$, and I have your $itemPlural:20000052$.
Oh... My $itemPlural:20000052$... I was just thinking of these. I couldn't get to them because of all the monsters...
You can thank me by telling me about $map:02000312$.
You must be a friend of that other. $npcName:11000876[gender:0]$. Fine. I will try to remember.
So sweet. I love to eat the leaves. And swim. Swim, swim, swim in the cold water with a belly full of sweets.
The water here is so fun. Fun to jump from the high waterfall. The high... waterfall...
I remember! There is a cave. Behind the waterfall. Tiny dark fairies go in and out!
I remember! There is a cave. Behind the waterfall. Tiny dark fairies go in and out!
I assume your search for $map:02000312$ was a success.
Yes, and $npcName:23000039[gender:1]$ was waiting when I got there.
That is unexpected. I was certain the temple would be empty...
(Tell him about the battle and the shadow seeds.)
Incredible. This $npcName:23000039[gender:1]$ is mentioned in many of $map:02000001$'s records.
My worst fears have been confirmed. Someone is using the dark magic of that place against us.
The headmaster needs to learn of this immediately.

Harnessing the power of a forgotten evil to attack the barrier from within... This is far more insidious than any of the attacks coming from the outside. It would be best if you deliver your report in person.
Okay. Beam me back to the academy!
Hm? No, no, you should make your own way back there. You... do know how to get back to $map:52000101$, don't you?
Would you believe me if I said no?
That is inconvenient. I'd tell you how to proceed, but the mage in charge of the express is quite firm that such details should not be given out freely. All I can give you is a hint...
Sure. This seems like a great time for another riddle.
Seek out the littlest mage in $map:02000023$. She will open the way to $map:52000101$.
It should be no difficulty for someone of your caliber to find the littlest mage in $map:02000023$. I wish you luck.
<font color="#909090">(There's a mischievous twinkle in the cat's eye.)</font>
Ahem. Pardon me, Madame Kitty, but do you know where I can board the Ellinel Express?
Ah, my dear $MyPCName$. I was wondering how long it would take for you to figure it out.
Those foolish fairfolk! Do I look like a conductor to you? Do you see any trains here? And yet they insist on calling my service the "Ellinel Express..."
You have a lot of opinions for a cat.
As if we would deal in something so antiquated as a train. We use tidy dimensional portals to get around. We are mages, after all.
Anyway, are you sure you want to use my portal? It's perfectly safe! Unless you're a trespasser, in which case you'll get dumped into a purgatory dimension for all eternity.
I-I'm sure I'll be fine.
Well, it was nice knowing you. Just jump into the portal next to me. You'll wind up... somewhere.
Well, it was nice knowing you. Just jump into the portal next to me. You'll wind up... somewhere.
You're no help at all. Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is getting... irritable.
You started it!
Focus, you two! What happened to the children?
I'll tell you right away, Professor! As for you, $MyPCName$... We'll talk later.
One of Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s potions is... missing. Someone left this note in their place.
"I'm taking this to save $map:02000023$. Signed, Team $MyPCName$"
Team $MyPCName$...?
I recognize that childish handwriting. It's $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$. It seems he's started a fanclub for you, $MyPCName$.
$npcName:11001165[gender:0]$? That sounds familiar...
We showed the note to his adopted brother, $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$, and then he ran off, too. He's going to need help.
$npcName:11003146[gender:1]$... Do you know exactly which potion the child took?
He left the store room a mess, Professor. I'd need to go through the whole inventory checklist to see...
This is troubling. I had a sample of shadow reagents in that room. If the children took that, mistaking it for a potion...
I'll find them before it comes to that.
Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ and I will go through our inventory. $MyPCName$, find those kids and bring them home. $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ should still be in $map:02000101$.
Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ and I will go through our inventory. $MyPCName$, find those kids and bring them home. $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ should still be in $map:02000101$.
I can't believe him... That troublemaker...
$npcName:11001167[gender:0]$, I presume? I'm here to help.
Y-you're $MyPCName$! I can't believe it. Please, I'm counting on you!

Ever since you got here, $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ has been obsessed with being as great as you. It was all fun and games at first, but then he started talking about taking the fight to the forces of darkness...
Then he said he saw a suspicious shadow while playing hide and seek. I warned him to be careful, since $map:02000101$ really is in danger, but that just made him more excited...
I'm worried he and his friends went into the forest where they were playing. $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$ will be okay, since she can use some healing magic, but the others...
I'll search to the north. $MyPCName$, could you search to the south? And if you find them, give them a good talking to!
I'll search to the north. $MyPCName$, could you search to the south? And if you find them, give them a good talking to!
What... what do we do?
$npcName:11001165[gender:0]$!
$MyPCName$! P-please! Help!
I-I was gonna be a hero... B-but my f-f-friends showed up a-a-and...
Take a deep breath and start from the beginning.
I didn't mean for them to get hurt. When they wouldn't go away, I told them we'd play hide and seek. But as soon as they hid, there was this... this big boom. I got scared and ran away...
If there really are bad guys in the forest... what about my friends? I wanted to save everyone, but they're in danger b-because of me...
I'll take it from here.
W-wow! You can save them for sure! Okay. Let's go into the forest. I know all their hiding spots.
W-wow! You can save them for sure! Okay. Let's go into the forest. I know all their hiding spots.
Thank you very much for saving us, $MyPCName$. <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001172[gender:1]$ glares at $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ and clears her throat.)</font>
Y-yeah, thanks! I'll never do something so stupid again. And I promise I won't, um, borrow anything from the academy again, and... Uh...

<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ hesitates for a long time, until $npcName:11001172[gender:1]$ finally whispers in his ear.)</font> <font size='20'>I'll never play hero again.</font>
...I'll never play—Hey! I'm not playing. I will be a hero someday!
Mm-hmm. Sure.
$MyPCName$, I'm gonna train hard and become a great hero like you! Just watch!
You remind me of a cadet I know.
I'll be a hero way before he is. Anyway, thank you very much for helping all of us.
Oh, about the potion $npcName:11001165[gender:0]$ brought. He thought it was some sort of defense tonic, but it was a simple mana potion. Sorry, but I drank it so I could heal my friends...
That's fine.
Phew! I thought Mr. $npc:11000032[gender:0]$ might get mad if he found out...
You're lucky it wasn't something bad.
Hey, are you going back to Ellinel? Then you're gonna talk to the kitty mage, right?
(Nod.)
I'm so jealous. Kitty won't even talk to me! $MyPCName$, ask her what snacks she likes, okay? If I give her something she likes, she'll have to be my friend.
You're gonna talk to the kitty mage, right? Please ask her what snacks she likes. If I give her something she likes, she'll have to be my friend.
Hm. You're late.
What kind of snacks do you like?
I don't have time to worry about snacks right now. The portal to $map:52000101$ isn't working.
It's not unusual for the portal to shut down from time to time, but this is different. It's as if Ellinel is hidden behind a dark cloud. I can't see anything there.
I need to get there!
Are you crazy? I just told you I can't see what's happening in there! You'd be going in blind!
That means they need my help.
You're serious about this, aren't you? Fine. The portal is down, but I should be able to teleport you directly to one of the other mages.
Send me to $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.
Good idea. All right. <font color="#909090">($npcName:11003257$ wiggles her nose and twitches her ears, but nothing happens.)</font>
Something's wrong. I can't sense $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ at all. Did... did something happen to him?
Try $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$.
All right... Yes, I can get a lock on $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. Hurry along, now!
I'll send you to $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. Hurry!
I never thought I'd be happy to see you...
Professor $npc:11000032[gender:0]$ and the headmaster are in there. When the darkness came, the professor, he... It's as if he lost his mind...
The headmaster ordered everyone to evacuate, and then just charged in...
I have to go in.
It's no use. The headmaster sealed himself in. Even I can't break it...
I still have to try.
Aren't you listening to me? It's on your own head if you get hurt!
The headmaster sealed himself in there. But if you insist on going in... It's on your own head if you get hurt!
I... I don't understand... Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$...
There was nothing in our records about the creature that took $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. As for the professor's sudden change, however...
Right, right! I've brought every book we have on the subject of shadow seeds, which slowly drain away a victim's life force until they transform into a terrible monster.
It's similar to the evil work of the dark fairies from so long ago. It may be related to what you saw in $map:02000312$...
What are you two talking about? I know about shadow seeds, too. They get their power from the goddess of darkness. But she was destroyed in the war, so there's no way there are any shadow seeds left!
Basing your theories on something that doesn't even exist is deficient. Besides, even if they did exist, there is no way Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ would succumb to such a thing.

I understand your perspective, $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. But $npcName:11003282[gender:0]$'s captor clearly called him the "Black Moon Key." We can't rule anything out until we know what that means.
$npcName:11003146[gender:1]$...
She is bright, but she's still a little young for all this. The best we can do is give her some space.

I doubt these changes happened overnight. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ surely would have noticed something was wrong... His research notes might hold a clue. $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$, do you have any ideas where we would find them?
The cave that passes through $map:02000023$?

Quite right. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ rarely left Ellinel, but that place was his sanctuary when he needed to think. He liked to go to the very bottom of $map:02000109$, where no one else ever went.
$MyPCName$, could you go to $map:02000109$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ left any record of his experiments there? $npc:11000033[gender:0]$ and I will work on restoring the Ellinel Express.
$MyPCName$, could you go to $map:02000109$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ left any record of his experiments there? $npc:11000033[gender:0]$ and I will work on restoring the Ellinel Express.
<font color="#909090">(There's a long, narrow gap in the wall next to the waterfall. You can feel a breeze coming through it.)</font>
(Press your face up to it.)
<font color="#909090">(It's hard to make out any sound over the water, but there's something ringing on the other side.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You press your hand against the gap, and the wall falls away to reveal a hidden compartment.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You press your hand against the gap, and the wall falls away to reveal a hidden compartment.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You're pretty sure you know whose notebook this is.)</font>

"Log 357. This spectrum of blue light only appears near the $map:02000146$. Measurements of light on $item:20000047$: Central monsters - strong / Outskirt - weak $item:20000045$ spore. <u>Spreads</u> over wide areas. Thrives well."
(The word "spreads" is heavily underlined.)

"Log 358. Observing darkness expansion. Blue light = delivery method? Spore acts as spreading agent for light, expanding affected regions. The $map:02000146$ is the epicenter. Shadow poison spreads from there."
(Turn the page.)

<font color="#909090">(There's a rough map of the Shadow Gate on this page. A small note is attached above, with many colorful arrows pointing to it.)</font> "Supplying resources to the infection vector! $map:02000213$"
"Conclusion... Substances with blue glow ($item:20000045$, $item:20000047$) are infection vectors spreading the reach of the darkness. Spreading from the $map:02000146$ to the outskirts."

"The $map:02000213$. I'm certain that this is a major source of energy for the blue light. Shadow magic is syphoned from the Land of Darkness and focused here, then funneled into the rest of Maple World."
"It reminds me of old writings on the shadow seeds. Could it be the same? A new thought: What about the soldiers stationed at the $map:02000146$?"
(Take a closer look at the map.)
<font color="#909090">(This altar is in the cave below the cliff, not far from the center of the area. You have to cut off the source of darkness before it's too late!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You notice a slight impression in the page–as if someone traced the writing. There's also several warped spots... Teardrops? And what's this?)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A polished blue gem catches your eye. You've seen this somewhere before...)</font>
It looks like $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ already came by...

<font color="#909090">(You take the $item:30000769$. You can return it to her the next time you see $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. For now, hurry back to the $map:02000146$ and warn $npc:11000076[gender:0]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You need to hurry back to the $map:02000146$ and warn $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ about the danger he and his men are in.)</font>
$MyPCName$! What's the big rush?
I need to see $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$.
He's out on a mission.

$npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ went to check out a disturbance with $npcName:11000266[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000007[gender:1]$. Seems there has been some strange shadow magic in the cave beneath the cliff...
Then I'm already too late. I've got to hurry to the $map:02000213$!
Then I'm already too late. I've got to hurry to the $map:02000213$!
Now that that's taken care of... How did you know where to find us?
You were reckless. You're lucky to be alive!
$npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ told me that you'd gone to $map:02000023$ with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. Did the forces of darkness attack there, as well?
Yes. The first assault was stopped, but...
It seems nowhere is safe, then. After you left, the monsters here grew more aggressive, and some of my soldiers started suffering from a mysterious illness. Some are even showing signs of undeath...
It seemed obvious that the disease was being spread by the monsters, so we started tracking their movements to see if we could find a source. That's what led us to the cave.
We still need to treat the infected. $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ is leading our efforts on that front. I suggest you talk to him.
We still need to treat the infected. $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ is leading our efforts on that front. I suggest you talk to him.

I'd love to take credit for saving all these lives—really, I would—but it's $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s $itemPlural:20000016$ that made all the difference. There'd be many, many more infected if it weren't for him.

But the research took its toll on him. Even I could see it. He developed dark rings under his eyes, and his voice started to grow hoarse. At first, I just thought he didn't have the stomach for field research...
Yeah, about that...
How is our Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$? Happy to be back at his school of hocus pocus nonsense?
(Explain what happened in $map:02000023$.)
Cute joke. Really, where is he?
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ mentioned something about this. He said that the darkness can expand on its own. If left unchecked, its destructive power would be immense.
I thought it was magic mumbo-jumbo at the time, but it looks like he was on to something. If only I'd listened to him...
You can feel sorry for yourself after you figure out a treatment for this illness. How's that coming along, anyway?
$itemPlural:20000016$ can only take us so far. They're less effective the more you take, and they don't actually cure anything—they just stop the disease from spreading or getting worse.
The situation is even worse than I thought. We need to keep an eye on the entire empire to make sure this doesn't spread.
We'll continue our research for now. $MyPCName$, you make sure that no more lives are lost. Please.
Got it. I'll do my best. <font color="#909090">(Go back to $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$.)</font>
We'll continue our research for now. $MyPCName$, you make sure that no more lives are lost. Please.
What exactly happened in $map:02000023$?
(Bring the captain up to speed.)
How are we supposed to fight back when we don't even know who they are or what they want?
Give $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ my regards. Until we meet again... Fight with honor!
Give $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ my regards. Until we meet again... Fight with honor!
You were gone for a long time. Is $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ well? How's the situation in $map:02000051$?
Well...
(Tell him what happened in $map:02000051$.)
It's just as we feared. While I was searching for the ragged wraith in the capital, he was causing trouble to the east...
I'm sorry. I should have sent you to $map:02000051$ with reinforcements. Maybe this whole sad state of affairs could have been avoided.
How could you have known? Right now, we need to stop any more lives from being lost.
Is $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ safe, at least?
I believe so, but we may need your help once again.

$npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ is safe for now. At my recommendation, $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ has tightened security around Tria. Even if the forces of darkness were to attack, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ would defend her with his life.
With his life, eh?
Don't read anything into it! Anyway, in his latest report, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ asked for you by name.
What does he need?
I'm not sure, but it sounded urgent. I've never known $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to be so... agitated.
I'm not sure what he needs, but it sounded urgent. I've never known $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to be so... agitated.
Don't tell me our enemy is going after $map:02000001$ next...
I wouldn't keep him waiting if I were you. Head to $map:02000001$ as quickly as you can.
I wouldn't keep him waiting if I were you. Head to $map:02000001$ as quickly as you can.
$MyPCName$! I've been waiting for you.
Thanks to your help in the outlying cities, I've been able to keep $map:02000001$ safe and sound. Until last night, that is. $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ has been kidnapped.
It happened without warning. But, with the minister as a hostage, we can't exactly charge in. We need to be subtle.
And you wanted my help with this? Why me?
The leader of the kidnappers calls herself $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$. Have you ever heard that name before?
It sounds familiar somehow...
Is that a common name?
I'm certain that was the name of one of the ambushers at the $map:63000041$. I think she had a... red cape, was it?
Is it her?
Does the name not ring any bells? Think very carefully.
$npcName:11000057[gender:1]$... $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$... Hold on...
That sounds like her, yes. I hope I can count on your help resolving this incident.
Of course.

The red cape and her minions kidnapped $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ and disappeared into the $map:02000252$. I'm gathering my best men for the extraction, but I'd like you to scout out the situation first.

The red cape and her minions kidnapped $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ and disappeared into the $map:02000252$. I'm gathering my best men for the extraction, but I'd like you to scout out the situation first.
I'm happy to report that $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ is safe and sound. But what became of the red cape?
(Report what happened.)
Hm... I suspected as much. Great work.
$npc:11000074[gender:0]$ is waiting for you in the $map:02000065$. Will you meet with him?
Sure, but first I want to know what this attack was all about.
That... isn't something I can really discuss in detail. Even $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ is hesitant to speak freely about it. The only person who can answer your questions is $npc:11000074[gender:0]$.
I'm sure he'd also like the opportunity to thank you. The $map:02000065$ is just at the bottom of these stairs.
$npc:11000074[gender:0]$ is eager to see you. The $map:02000065$ is just at the bottom of these stairs.
$MyPCName$, I'm not sure how I can thank you for your help.
I'm sure you have many questions. Especially after everything you saw and heard...
(Nod.)
$npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ is my daughter. She's always had a rebellious streak, but I've done my best to protect her. It's clear that I can no longer do so.
Above all else, I am dedicated to the service of $npc:11000075[gender:1]$. It saddens me, but if I must choose Her Imperial Majesty over my family, then I will.
Are you sure about that?
No matter the personal cost... I am prepared to do what I must. It will not be easy to handle the chaos that she leaves in her wake, but the child cannot be allowed to carry on like this.
$MyPCName$... Would you mind giving me some time? For now, please do not let anyone know that $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ was here...
$MyPCName$... Would you mind giving me some time? For now, please do not let anyone know that $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ was here...
What a surprise, seeing you here of all places! A pleasant one, of course.

I hate to intrude, but $npcName:11000074[gender:0]$... Would you mind lending me the Scroll of $map:02000001$? I need to reference the writings of the royal mages. I promise I'll return it straight away.
If you came here in person, I'm sure you have a good reason to borrow it. I'm afraid I don't have it at hand, however. I've had it hidden to keep it from... prying eyes.
I'm afraid this can't wait. I also have something I must discuss with you... Fortunately, we have a very helpful person who will no doubt be happy to lend us a hand.
Gee, I wonder who that could be.
I hate to impose, $MyPCName$, but could you fetch the Scroll of $map:02000001$ for me? I'm sure I'll find a way to repay you someday.
Sure. Where is it?
It's being kept at $map:02000218$ near the center of $map:02000001$. Go to $npc:11000530[gender:0]$ and tell him that... Ahem... you're "here for the cutie." He will know what you mean.

The Scroll of $map:02000001$ is being kept at $map:02000218$ near the center of $map:02000001$. Go to $npc:11000530[gender:0]$ and tell him that you're... ahem... "here for the cutie." He will know what you mean.
Is there something you need? A portrait, perhaps?
I'm, uh, I'm here for the cutie...?
Uh... You're... What?
I... Uh... I mean...
You look as confused as I feel. Who sent you?
Ah, yes, good old $npc:11000074[gender:0]$. He may look like a stickler, but that man has a sense of humor.
Anyway, I think I know just the cutie you're looking for. Give me a minute. It wasn't exactly easy to find a good hiding place for it...
Take your time.
Okay, here it is. And give $npc:11000074[gender:0]$ my regards, while you're at it.
What's wrong?
I lost the $item:30000870$...
What sort of pictures do you paint?
Yes, I saw you drop it. You're lucky I was keeping an eye on it. This is an irreplaceable treasure of the empire!
I think you'll find that it's still in your bag. Did you want two copies? You know that's a one-of-a-kind artifact, right?
How can you walk around with your bag stuffed like that? Make some room and then I'll give you the scroll.
There's nothing in the world I can't paint. But if I had to pick a favorite subject, then I'd say I'm happiest when I'm painting a portrait.
You were quick. Thank you.
Would you mind coming with me? I have a visitor who I'm certain you'll want to see.
And who might that be?
It's $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. He's back! And he's in $map:52000101$ right now!
We can go over the details when we get there, but the gist is that we managed to re-open the portal to Ellinel. When we got to $map:52000135$, we found him inside... unconscious.
How is he now?
You should come with me and see for yourself. Are you ready to go?
I'm ready.
Give me some time to get my things.
Certainly. I can wait. Here I am, waiting... Waiting... Are you ready now?
Uh... Sure. Let's go.
Great. Off we go!
You really should see $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ for yourself. Are you ready to go?
I'm ready.
Give me some time to get my things.
Certainly. I can wait. Here I am, waiting... Waiting... Are you ready now?
Uh... Sure. Let's go.
Great. Off we go!
I see $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ hasn't returned empty-handed. I was hoping you'd be along soon. We could use your help.
I thought so, too. I just happened to run into $MyPCName$ in $map:02000001$. Fortunate for all of us, I'd say.
Fortunate indeed. It's good to see you again, $MyPCName$.
So, where is $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ now?
After we found him, we moved him to the $map:52000149$ so that he could recover. I fear he still hasn't regained consciousness...
The $map:52000149$ is just beyond the door behind me. I think it would be good if you checked on $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in person.
The $map:52000149$ is just beyond the door behind me. I think it would be good if you checked on $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in person.

What I'm about to tell you, I've learned from decades of research and the study of obscure tomes. Outside of our world, there are countless other planes of existence. Between these different worlds, binding it all together is a great divine being, who has sent an emissary to each of these worlds.
These emissaries are born with hearts full of both good and evil. When the time comes, they choose one of the two paths. These emissaries are called the Innocent.
And you think Maple World's Innocent is...

I'm not certain, but I think you're on the right track. A man whose magical abilities are endless... Who has vast knowledge of lost civilizations... Who has earned the complete confidence of $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ himself. All signs point to $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.
If $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ were simply a talented mage, then I think things would have happened quite a bit differently during the incident...
Normally, a mage as skilled as $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ should have been able to ward himself against the power of darkness. But that isn't what happened, is it?

According to my records, the Innocents walk a fine line between good and evil. Eventually, each Innocent must choose between the light and the dark, but choosing one doesn't mean that the other simply goes away. I think that the shadow poison caused $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s evil side to temporarily awaken.
If our enemy tried to turn $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s nature against us, then it is clear that they know more about the Innocents than we do.
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is beloved and respected in $map:02000023$. For now, I'd appreciate it if you kept what happened between him and $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ a secret.

If anyone asks, we'll simply say that $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ was hurt while trying to defend $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ from the forces of darkness. And... as you can see... he still hasn't regained consciousness.
Sigh... I'm very worried.
We're all worried... including Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$, who seems to think we haven't noticed her.
He's still alive, at least. There has to be something in $map:02000023$ that can help him.

Many of the creatures of $map:02000023$ possess mysterious powers. The $npcName:22090107$, for instance, drops a jelly with a rather... potent scent. It does have marvelous healing properties, however.

I must stay here and examine the book $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ brought me. Would you mind going to the $map:02000112$ and retrieving the $item:30000179$ on my behalf? I'll open a portal back to $map:02000023$ for you.

I need to stay here and examine the book $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ borrowed. Would you mind going to $map:02000112$ and retrieving the $item:30000179$ on my behalf? I'll open a portal back to $map:02000023$ for you.
Good work.
I managed to find a lead on an herbal remedy while you were away. Would you mind helping me once more?
Of course I will.
Can't you take care of it yourself?
There's a hollow section in the trunk of the $map:02000128$. A certain mushroom grows there in the $map:02000012$. I need that mushroom to make a reagent.
Gather mushrooms from the $map:02000012$ of the $map:02000128$. Be sure to gather plenty, as I'm not sure exactly how much I need.
If you want to do the research while I go out to get the mushrooms, fine. Be my guest. I'm sure the monsters there will find me quite delicious...
Fine, I'll go! Just tell me what to do.
Gather mushrooms from the $map:02000012$ of the $map:02000128$. Be sure to gather plenty, as I'm not sure exactly how much I need.
Good work.
Thanks to the $item:30000179$ and mushrooms you've brought me, the ritual to reawaken $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is going well. I'm afraid this last ingredient may be a tad... challenging.
What do you need?
There's a certain root that only grows in the $map:02000206$. It thrives on chaos, and it actually has the power to purify dark magic. But there's a problem...
A powerful monster of the forest, $npcName:23000025[gender:0]$, absorbed the $itemPlural:30000190$. The only way to retrieve the root is to defeat him.
Can I rely on you to defeat $npcName:23000025[gender:1]$ of the $map:02000206$?
You aren't surprised to see me, are you? Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ thought you might need my help.
The $map:02000206$ is a dangerous place. I have to admit, I'm surprised you survived.
Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ went on ahead to the $map:02000179$. He's going to start the ritual to heal Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$... I'm here to fetch you.
The $map:02000179$ is a focal point for life magic. Not just anyone is allowed there, so I hope you realize how much of an honor this is. Are you ready to go?
I'm ready.
Okay, let's—Huh? Something's not right.
Something wrong with your teleportation spell?
My spell is just fine! There's just something... Some sort of interference...
Ha! As if a little interference could slow me down. We'll just take the scenic route. Are you ready?
I'm ready.
Give me a minute.
All right, let's go.
Just trust me, okay? Are you ready?
I'm ready.
As if a little interference could slow me down. We'll just take the scenic route. Are you ready?
I'm ready.
Give me a minute.
All right, let's go.
Why are you always wasting my time? Hurry and get ready!
Professor $npc:11000033[gender:0]$? $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?! You aren't supposed to be here!
Things have not exactly gone according to plan.

$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s condition is bad. I must create a magical quarantine to prevent the spread of dark magic in his body, but I'd hoped to move him somewhere safe first. Unfortunately, our teleportation spell was blocked...
It seems you've been paying attention in class, Miss $npcName:11003442[gender:1]$. Most students would not have thought to take a detour through this place.
I bet Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ will be so impressed!
We'll need to walk to reach the $map:02000066$ for a ways. Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$, can you find the entrance to the $map:02000179$?
Yes, but it's dangerous to move $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ in his condition. Let me place some additional wards on him to be safe...
Argh!
Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$? What's wrong?
Professor $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$? What's wrong?
I'm ashamed that I've allowed this to happen. But I've no time for self-pity... We have a problem to solve, and I will need all of your help.
Where... Where am I? $npcName:11003442[gender:1]$... $MyPCName$... $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$?
Professor! It's okay now. We'll protect you.
...Argh!
Ugh... Ahh!
Professor?!
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?! What's going on?
Something... inside me... Ahhhh!
The fight to defend the $map:02000066$ will not be an easy one. We'll need reinforcements. $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$, please get in touch with the empire.
I'll see to it.
$MyPCName$, Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. Come with me to the $map:02000066$. He cannot be allowed to set foot in the $map:02000179$.
Wait a moment, Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$! Don't you think you should tell us what's going on?
Are you really one of these... these Innocents? If you chose good, then what was that corrupted... $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ creature?
Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$, there is no time for explanations right now. If we survive this, I'll answer all of your... scholarly questions.
That is, if you're still interested in helping me defend the $map:02000179$...
O-of course I am! But I need to know... Are you really my Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$? Why did you hurt Headmaster $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$?

All that matters right now is resolving the crisis facing $map:02000023$. I take it that you will be staying behind, Miss $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$. That leaves you and I to clean up this mess, $MyPCName$. Let's go.
We cannot allow $npc:11000068[gender:0]$ to reach the heart of the $map:02000066$. I will cast a magic shield, but I need you to repel $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$'s attacks.
We cannot allow $npc:11000068[gender:0]$ to reach the heart of the $map:02000066$. I will cast a magic shield, but I need you to repel $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$'s attacks.
$MyPCName$, thank you. You've been a great help.
But this fight isn't over. $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ is still out there, and he won't rest until he's got what he's after.
The thing $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ is after...
...is me. The other half of his self. The Innocent who chose the path of life.
Only $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ knew what I truly was. Or so I thought... It seems like someone else knew about the Innocents.
Ever since my work at the $map:02000146$, I've been plagued by nightmares. Sometimes I'd realize that there were gaps in my memory. The frequency and duration of these gaps began to increase...
My last memory before waking up was $npcName:11003146[gender:1]$ reporting that one of our elementary students had gone missing. I recall that you were there... but I remember nothing after.
Then, those things $npc:11003146[gender:1]$ asked you about... You don't remember any of it. Or what happened to Headmaster $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$...
We have a lot to tell you...
There's nothing to be done about that. We just have to pick ourselves up and begin again.

My primary concern right now is your condition, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. I'm still not certain how $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ split off from you... or what side effects you may experience as a result.
I should remain here. $npcName:11000068[gender:0]$ is my responsibility, and he's got his sights set on this place. I'll send word if I need anything.
Of course. I'll make sure you have everything you could possibly want. Oh, and $MyPCName$, I fear I must call upon your abilities of... persuasion.
Who do you need me to "persuade?"

$npcName:11000282[gender:0]$, the owner of the $map:02000019$ in $map:02000215$. He has a particular book I need—the Dimensional Dictionary. Without it, I can't hope to understand some of the writings I've found on the Innocents...
He's infamous for refusing to actually loan out his books. Perhaps you could win him over.
Why can't you do it?
I'll give it my best.
I've already tried! He said something about the "mischievous glint in my elven eyes" and sent me on my way. I fear he is quite determined to have nothing to do with me.
I'll give it my best.
He's known for judging someone solely based on first impressions, so make sure yours is a good one. I'm sure you'll do fine. The $map:02000019$ is in the center of $map:02000215$.
He's known for judging someone solely based on first impressions, so make sure yours is a good one. I'm sure you'll do fine. The $map:02000019$ is in the center of $map:02000215$.
I haven't seen you around here before. No, I would have remembered a weaselly face like yours...
I'd like to borrow the Dimensional Dictionary.
Ha! That's a laugh.

Perhaps you are new to libraries. When you are seeking a book, you begin by asking, "Do you have this book?" To brazenly walk up to me and demand a book without making sure I actually have it... The nerve!
You don't understand! If I don't get that book—

Tut! You'll not take that tone of voice with me in this library! I find it suspicious that you even knew I had the book in stock. Have you been, ahem, casing the joint, you hoodlum? Well, I doubt you'll ever find the book. So there!
If I find it, will you let me borrow it?
A game, is it? Ha! If you find it... then we can talk.
Come to beg me for clues? You are on your own, scoundrel. You're lucky I'm giving you this much of a chance.
<font color="#909090">(You sense a magical aura around this bookcase. You should take a closer look.)</font>
Hey! Hey you!
(Look for the source of the voice.)
Over here, ya goon! In the bookcase right in front of ya!
Ah... A talking book.

Some moron read me and put me back on the wrong shelf! I'm a high class book, ya know? If the other books from my shelf see me with these pulp novels and penny dreadfuls, I'll be the laughin' stock of the whole dang library!
What do you want me to do about it?
Be a good reader and put me back in my own case, will ya? It's, er, kinda locked, so you'll need to get a key from one of them $npc:21000216$ goons.
What's the big idea?
You're heavy! I needed to rest my arms.
I'm just passing through.
Likely story, pal! Ya tossed me on the floor and left, like all the other bozos who visit this library!
How'd you get back here, anyway?
Some dumb monster brought me back. Please, ya gotta take me with ya!
Stop wastin' time. I gotta get back to my own bookcase!
Some dumb monster brought me back. More important, how do ya expect me to fit in your bag when it's full of junk?
Hurry. The sooner I'm away from this bookcase, the better!
My friends, my friends! I'm back, ya mugs!
You happy now?
Get a load of this joker! Am I happy now? Ha! Of course!
Anyways, you did me a real solid back there, and I always do good by those what did good to me. So, what do ya need?
I'm looking for the Dimensional Dictionary.
That old thing? It got enchanted so what's nobody can read it no more. Not even old $npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ knows what it says. A real shame, being a book what nobody can read.
It got tucked away in the $map:02000219$, where nobody can so much as look at it. Ya really think the boss'll let ya borrow it? Hmm... Maybe if ya got rid of the enchantment...
That's what I said, innit? Just look around for a weird bookshelf. There's a secret door behind it. That'll take ya where ya need to go.
That's what I said, innit? Just look around for a weird bookshelf around here. There's a secret door behind it. That'll take ya where ya need to go.
There's a glint of pride in your eyes. I don't like it.
I found the Dimensional Dictionary.
W-what?
I know you can't read the book. Lend it to me, and I'll find a way to get rid of the enchantment. Does that work for you?
So presumptuous! The only one who can remove the enchantment is $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$, and that puffed-up snail already told me that she wouldn't.
So, all I have to do is get $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$ to disenchant the book?
She's lucky I don't give her shell a good cracking. She's the slowest creature in the $map:02000129$, and that's saying quite a lot!
I'll head to the $map:02000129$, then.

You think you can get $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$'s help when she wasn't even impressed by my winning personality? Well, I won't stop you from making a fool of yourself. She's probably perched high up in the $map:02000129$.

You think you can get $npcName:11000705[gender:1]$'s help when she wasn't even impressed by my winning personality? Well, I won't stop you from making a fool of yourself. She's probably perched high up in the $map:02000129$.
I do so hope you have not come to argue. I have not got time for arguing.
I'd like your help with the Dimensional Dictionary.
Please. I do not have time for such things. I have more important things to worry about.
I'm something of a fixer. If I fix your problem, will you help me with mine?
Let us see how useful you are in that case. I have been robbed. My darling, precious, lovely ladle... has been stolen.
Do you know who stole it?

Some monster or another. You know how it is. They steal this and that and the other thing. They think it is all in good fun. But it is us honest and hardworking snails who suffer for their shenanigans.
A decade ago I would have given those whippersnappers a run for their money. But now I am an old lady and it takes me a day just to cross my front yard.
I will retrieve your ladle, fair snail.
Then follow the water down to the pond. Search in the grass near the stream. That is where they usually drop it.
I know it is a very very far way away. But surely you can go faster than that.
You have already found it. Thank you so very much.
You helped me in my time of greatest need. The least I can do is to hear you out.
(Give her the short version of the story.)
One greedy fool can ruin things for everyone at times like this. I feel sorry that you have been through so much trouble. I will help but you must follow my instructions to a tee.
To a tee! Got it!
Go to the $map:02000180$ and defeat $npc:22000007$. Once you have done that he should drop his $item:30000186$. With that in hand you will be able to read the Dimensional Dictionary.
That sounds awfully simple...

The Dimension Dictionary will only reveal its secrets to one with the power and inclination to defeat the darkness. It does not concern itself with fancy rituals or inane subtlety. In other words it is too good for that greedy librarian.
Return to $npc:11000282[gender:0]$ when you have the $item:30000186$. Most importantly, you must make sure that you are the one to first open the book. Good luck.
Return to $npc:11000282[gender:0]$ when you have the $item:30000186$. Most importantly, you must make sure that you are the one to first open the book. Good luck.
Either you've succeeded and I finally get to read the book, or you've failed and I get to gloat. Either way, I win.
We have business in the $map:02000219$.
That pompous slug agreed to help you? I can't believe it...
So, how is it done? How can we finally read that accursed book?
I can show you. In the $map:02000219$.
How untrusting you are. Do you really think I wouldn't honor my end of the bargain, after all we've been through?
Yes. Yes, absolutely. That is exactly what I think.
Fine, fine! Let us go to the $map:02000219$. Then you will see that I am a piece of my word.
Fine, fine! Let us go to the $map:02000219$. Then you will see that I am a piece of my word.
Are you certain the enchantment has been removed? The pages are still blank. Is this some sort of trick?
(That's odd. You definitely see writing in the book...)
Wait... This can't be... <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ snatches up the book and examines it frantically)</font>
The enchantment... It only lets one person read it! Did you know this would happen? Is this why you were so insistent on opening the book yourself?
Maaaaybe.
That shriveled old snail...! $MyPCName$, what's written inside? Tell me every word!
This isn't exactly light reading material!
If I ever get my hands on that snail...!
Does this mean that there's no way to read this book... ever...?
I could take it with me to $map:02000023$ and work on it there...
This was your plan from the start! I knew it. I can always tell a thief when I see one...
Do you have any better ideas?
Fine! I shall let you abscond to $map:02000023$ with my precious book!
You are too kind.
But when you're done with it, you must return it in pristine condition! And with a transcribed copy! You have no idea how much I paid to add it to my collection...
When you're done with it, you must return it in pristine condition! And with a transcribed copy! You have no idea how much I paid to add it to my collection...
How did your meeting with $npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ go?
He gave me the book. No big deal.
My faith in you was well placed. Thank you!
But why are the pages blank? Oh! It's enchanted...
(Explain everything.)
If that's true, then I will need you to read the book aloud to me while I interpret its meaning... Impossible! This is a reference book, not an adventure novel. What are we going to do?
Maybe $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ can read it.
That's a good point. For all we know, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ could be immune to this sort of magic. Could you go to the $map:02000179$ and see if he has better luck?
Will do.
Very well. I leave this in your capable hands.
$MyPCName$, could you go to the $map:02000179$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has better luck with the Dimensional Dictionary?
Will do.
Very well. I leave this in your capable hands.
So, what brings you to my remote abode?
(Hand him the Dimensional Dictionary.)
Interesting. I don't sense any sort of enchantment on this book at all. It should be simple enough for me to read and interpret.
Leave this with me. I'll have a transcription for you soon.
Even here, I've been keeping a close watch on the shadows that threaten Maple World. I understand that you've read my notes on the spreading darkness.

It all began with the $itemPlural:20000045$. That led me to research the shadow seeds. And then I received a report that dark magic has been found on the divine creatures that call this world their home.
I need to know how far the darkness has spread, and you're the only person I trust to find out for me.
I'll do whatever I can.
I had a feeling you'd say that. Please deliver this letter to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$. He'll help you come up with a plan of action.
I'll teleport you to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$.
Shall I send you to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ now?
Please do.
I'd rather go on foot.
Very well.
All right. Until next time.
How is $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?
(Give him $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s letter.)
Hmm... Nothing is ever simple, is it?

While there are many divine beasts who have walked Maple World since ancient times, there are two in particular about whom I've received troubling reports. Let's start by looking into $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$, guardian of the lava fields.
It's believed that he's somehow related to $npcName:23100039[gender:0]$ of $map:02000312$... though I'll admit that it's mere speculation based on their similar names.
For now, go to $map:02000079$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$'s condition. I can only hope that he is not corrupted...
Go to $map:02000079$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$'s condition. I can only hope that he is not corrupted...
How did the investigation go?
(Report what you saw in $map:02000079$.)
It's as I feared. Thank you for your trouble...
The next beast to check on is $npcName:23100021$, the great griffin of the $map:02000009$. It's recently started attacking anyone who goes near its domain.
Travel to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100021$'s recent behavior. I look forward to your report.
Travel to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100021$'s recent behavior. I look forward to your report.
What did you learn?
(Tell him about $npcName:23100021$.)
That... isn't quite what I expected to hear. Thank you for the information.
While you were away, I received a message from $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. It seems he needs to see you in the $map:02000179$.
I can send you there now, if you'd like.
Yes, please.
I need to make myself presentable first.
Very good. Off you go!
Is that so? Well, tell me when you're ready...
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ wishes to see you in the $map:02000179$. It sounded urgent.
Yes, please.
I need to make myself presentable first.
Very good. Off you go!
Is that so? Well, tell me when you're ready...
The Dimensional Dictionary has taught me so much! I thought it would be useful as a mere reference, but there is so much information in here. Things that even I did not know...

I've learned that when an Innocent chooses his path, the other half of his power doesn't simply become dormant. It becomes its own being. $npc:11003441[gender:0]$, then, is the version of myself that I did not choose.
Furthermore, it's possible to change an Innocent's path. I thought that my decision had been final, but in a short time I've learned that I can be split in two... and be replaced by my darker self.
It's all a bit grim for my taste. Luckily, I've also got something interesting to tell you.

Among the many fascinating sections of the Dictionary is an appendix of magical minerals and how they interact with each other. With a little bit of experimentation, I've created a rather interesting object.
Interesting in a good way, I hope.

According to the known rules of magic, long-range scrying requires a specific target or location. But with some black onyx and a dose of emutal powder, I've managed to create a device that can show you a... hint, let's say. A clue to whatever mystery it is that you're pondering!
There's one mystery in particular that I'd like to use it to solve, but I need your help.
And what's this mystery?
I want to learn who is behind the darkness spreading from the $map:02000146$. The mastermind who has attacked our cities. I'm convinced that these events are all linked.
You have stood against our shadowy enemy every step of the way. If you touch the crystal, I believe that it will point us in the right direction.
You have stood against our shadowy enemy every step of the way. If you touch the crystal, I believe that it will point us in the right direction.
It's $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... And he's looking for someone. Someone named $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. But how is $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ connected to all this?
That's what we need to find out. He's our best chance at tracking down the source of this evil.
$MyPCName$, you've worked with Dark Wind recently. Do you have any ideas about this?
That name, $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. I'm sure I've heard it somewhere...
$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$... The $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$... The Barrota Trading Company!
Yes, that's right! $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ is the head of the Barrota Trading Company. But I heard that he'd gone missing...
His name came up when I was investigating $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$'s death. But it was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ who got me to focus on hunting down $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$, instead.
Some of the things I heard and saw didn't quite add up. $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is the leader of Dark Wind... But can we trust him? I'm not convinced.
Maybe it's not just $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ alone, but Dark Wind as a whole that's hiding something. Their old captain, $npc:11001816[gender:0]$, was one of the Seven Heroes.

Is there anyone who knows $map:02000100$ and Dark Wind well enough to give us an objective opinion? Someone who isn't part of the organization, but in a good position to observe their comings and goings.
I can try $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.
That's a good idea. The mayor will certainly know more than we do. Please go to $map:02000157$ and see what you can find out.
That's a good idea. The mayor will certainly know more than we do. Please go to $map:02000157$ and see what you can find out.
Excuse me! May I help you?
I'm here to see the mayor.
I'm so sorry, but I don't seem to see your name on the schedule. Did you make an appointment?
I do so wish I could help you, but the mayor isn't seeing anyone without an appointment. You really should have made one.
When's his next opening?
I can pencil you in for... How does the week after next work for you?
In the meantime, I'd be happy to take a message for you.
I don't have time to wait two weeks!

Oh, I'm so so sorry, but the mayor is very strict about his schedule. I'd have to beg him heart and soul to get him to see you without an appointment. And, no offense, but why should I go through all that trouble for you?
What if I told you it's really, really important?
If it's so important, then maybe you should do me a favor. I'm really worried about my little sister. If you help me out, I could try to convince the mayor to see you.
Sure.
Wonderful! $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ got a new job a few weeks ago, and nobody's heard from her since. My parents are worried sick. Mind giving her a visit at the $map:02000008$?
Wonderful! $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ got a new job a few weeks ago, and nobody's heard from her since. My parents are worried sick. Mind giving her a visit at the $map:02000008$?
This isn't the life I dreamed of. Not at all...
Ahem! Are you $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?
Uh, yeah? And who are you?
I can't believe my sister sent you to spy on me! That dweeb.
I thought I'd get to wear a prettier uniform than my sister and work in a nice cushy lab, but look at me. They're making me do fieldwork. And there are so many monsters!
I'm good at theoretical models and crunching numbers, but I'm not cut out for fighting! And now my boss expects me to gather samples myself. I'm doomed...
Hold on. You look pretty strong. Can you help me? Defeat the monsters around here and get some $itemPlural:30000872$. The sooner I have those, the sooner I can finish my report and head home!
Hold on. You look pretty strong. Can you help me? Defeat the monsters around here and get some $itemPlural:30000872$. The sooner I have those, the sooner I can finish my report and head home!
That was quick. Thanks so much!
Perfect! Give me a minute, and I'll write up my report.
Take your time.
Take my time? I'm already done! Mind taking this to my boss?
You want me to do it?
His name is $npcName:11000869[gender:0]$ and he's looking into something at $map:02000142$. They say he's hard to impress, but he'll have to be amazed if you tell him how great I am.
By the way, would you please tell him how great I am? If he keeps treating me like the most junior member of the team, I'll never get back to the safety of the lab!
Sure.
You're an angel! Thank you. Remember, you're looking for $npcName:11000869[gender:0]$ in $map:02000142$!
What's wrong?
I lost the $item:30000873$...
Why do you want to work in the lab?
Please take this more seriously! Anyway, I made a copy, so here. Don't drop it this time!
Um, I'm pretty sure it's in your bag. You're an odd one, you know that?
If I give it to you now, you'll just drop it again. Make some room in your bag please.
Isn't it obvious? All this sun exposure is terrible for my skin!
Huh? You aren't one of my people...
(Hand over the report.) From $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$.
Ah, yes, the new hire. They really are helpless in their first few years...

Many researchers think fieldwork is a waste of time—especially the young ones. I could send $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ back to the lab, but then she'd miss this opportunity to see this abnormal temporal phenomenon in person!
Have you ever heard of a temporal stop? Most laypersons think such things are science fiction, but it's happening right here. The closer you are to the clock tower, the slower time moves.
We arrived here three days ago, but I suspect that much more time has passed in the outside world.
$npcName:11000868[gender:1]$'s sister told me she'd been gone for weeks!
Whatever is causing this anomaly must be in the tower. We occasionally hear explosions from within, too. I sent some researchers to look into it, but none of them returned.
But is this temporal stop dangerous?
If the temporal stop spreads, then it would wreak havoc on the whole world. But how can I do anything with a handful of scientists?
I can look into it.

Truly? What a courageous young $male:man,female:woman$ you are! Please go inside the $map:02000357$ and discover the source of this phenomenon. As much as I'd love to study it, I fear you will have to destroy it... for the good of the whole world.
Please go inside the $map:02000357$ and discover the source of this phenomenon. As much as I'd love to study it, I fear you will have to destroy it... for the good of the whole world.
Please tell me you took exhaustive notes!
(Tell him about $npcName:23000077$ and $npcName:22400062$.)
Ah-ha! I suspected such a being might exist in there.
I'll have to run a full analysis on the area! ...is what I would say if I could afford the equipment. Which is sadly a pipe dream on our current budget.
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ pledged his support for this project when he was running for reelection, but we haven't seen a single meso since. He won't return my calls, he won't accept my appointments...
You know his secretary is $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$'s sister, right?
Really? That unhelpful young lady is related to our $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?
Well, my work here is done. I need to head back.
When you get there, tell $npc:11000361[gender:1]$ about how much her sister is suffering thanks to our budget problem. She may be our best hope at getting the mayor back on our side.
When you get to $map:02000157$, tell $npc:11000361[gender:1]$ about how much her sister is suffering thanks to our budget problem. She may be our best hope at getting the mayor back on our side.
I honestly didn't think you were coming back. Did you see $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?
Yes. Her research is... something else.
I'm sure it is. I just hope she learns from all this.
Anyway, you owe me a favor.
Do I?
I want to see $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.
Of course. You do have an appointment, after all. It's been two weeks since you were last here...
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is in the $map:02000154$. Please use the door to my right.
He is a very busy man, so don't waste his time. And do avoid asking any uncomfortable questions.
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is in the $map:02000154$. Please use the door on this side. He is a very busy man, so don't waste his time. And do avoid asking any uncomfortable questions.
Please, make yourself comfortable. How can I help you today?
I had some questions about Dark Wind.
You've worked with them in the past. Why don't you go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person?
I'd like an outsider's perspective.
I want to hear about it from a great man like you.
I... see. I'll answer what I can. What's your question?
What do you know about $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s death?
You're laying it on a little thick there. I don't have a lot of time to waste, so cut to the chase.
What do you know about $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s death?
Who put you up to this?
I don't know what you're trying to dig up, but I have nothing to tell you about Dark Wind. Even if I did, $map:02000100$ can't take any action against them.
My hands are full trying to deal with constant threats of riot—stirred up by $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and his foul group, according to reports. Dark Wind is vital to keeping them at bay.
But perhaps I should tell you one thing. Something for you to keep in mind. Not everything about a hero is great, and not everyone under a leader believes in the same values.
I'll... keep that in mind?
It's a shame that I couldn't be more help. If you want to know more about Dark Wind, go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person. That's all I have to say.
Thanks for your time, I guess.
Looks like I'm talking to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, after all.
It's a shame that I couldn't be more help. If you want to know more about Dark Wind, go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person. That's all I have to say.
It's been too long, friend. I hope you've been well.
We've been busy restoring $map:02000100$, but it's time we got back to the hunt for $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. Interested?
Actually, I wanted to ask about $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11000526[gender:0]$... $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$... The old Barrota boss? He's on the run for insider trading and embezzling. I'm not interested in going after small fry like him.
(That's not what $npcName:11003445$'s crystal said...)
No, we need to track down $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and make him pay for what he did to $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$. That's our only priority right now.
(He keeps going back to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.)
<font color="#909090">(If $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ really is hiding something, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ might know what it is. You should try to get to him before Dark Wind does.)</font>
You're right. Let's get $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
I knew you'd come around. Thanks.
Oh, man... He's gonna lose it again...
The boss is usually calm, but when he loses his cool, man... I'm afraid to even go near him.
Any mention of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ just sets him off. He doesn't get mad about other things...

All the other agents are out looking for $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ 'cause they don't want to get yelled at. Of course we're all worried for her safety, but we're more worried about what he'll do if we don't find her...
Hey! Report! If anything happens to $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, I'm taking it out of your hide!
I-I don't really know the details. $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$ might have seen something. H-he was standing guard at $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$.
$MyPCName$, let's talk.
D-don't let me keep you!
D-don't let me keep you!
I apologize for losing my cool.
All of my resources are tied up in the search for $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, but it's not enough. Her life may be in danger. Can I count on your support?
Sure.
Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$. As the guard posted in front of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house, he may have seen something.
Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$. As the guard posted in front of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house, he may have seen something.
Hey, I know you. What brings you here?
Tell me about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s disappearance.
Look, it's like I told the others: I don't understand what happened. It was a day like any other. She went to $map:02000221$ to return some books she'd borrowed, and she never came out.
I got a bad feeling about the situation and ran inside, but $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ was already gone.
Was anyone else there?
$npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ was behind the counter... dozing off. He didn't see a thing. Funny coincidence, right?
I mean... We need some kind of lead to track $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ down. If we don't, it'll be us agents who suffer.

Every one of us is in the field, and we've found nothing. $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ doesn't know you. He won't give me the time of day, but there's a chance he'll open up if you're the one asking the questions.

Every one of us in the field, and we've found nothing. $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ doesn't know you. He won't give me the time of day, but there's a chance he'll open up if you're the one asking the questions.
Any particular book you're after? I'm sure I've got something to tickle your fancy.
I want to know about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s disappearance.

Sure, sure. I've got time to answer the same questions a million times. Not as if I have a shop to run... Anyway, like I told the others, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ traded in her old books and picked out a new one.
It was just like any other day. She went to look for her book behind that shelf over there. I dozed off while she made her pick, and when I awoke, she was gone.
That's all I know. Good heavens, I'm sick and tired of telling this story.
I've said all I've got to say. If you aren't here for books, please leave.
Did anyone else come here the day $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ disappeared?

Not anyone who matters! The only other customer I had all day was $npcName:11000532[gender:0]$, son of the family that runs the bed-and-breakfast on $map:02000111$. But he was gone long before $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ came in.
Do you know what books $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ came for?
Let's see... $item:39000012$ and $item:39000013$, if I recall correctly. Why do you care?
Where can I find those books?
Check the shelves in back, over by the owl clock. If you ask me, you're just wasting your time...
Check the shelves in back, over by the owl clock. If you ask me, you're just wasting your time...
Welcome, welcome! Here to rent a room?
(Show him the books.)
Uh...? These are the books I borrowed from $map:02000221$... Why did you bring them back here?
Do you know a woman named $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$?
I—uh... I'm not sure...?
You both checked out the exact same books.
Uh, l-look, I don't know what this is all about. The money was good, and all I had to do was borrow and return the books. I didn't even read them...
Wh-why are you snooping around about this? Did I do something illegal? Is this some kinda spy thing?
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is missing.
And what do those books have to do with... Wait, I remember! There was also the thing with the bag.
The thing with what bag?
As part of the job, I also had to leave a bag under the table at $map:02000221$. It was locked, so I don't have a clue what was in it. I guess it was gone by the time you got there...
Who hired you?
Uh, the thing is... I never actually met them. They gave me instructions through notes, with the books and money left in a box hidden by the street leading from $map:02000039$ to the $map:02000045$.
I always figured it was some nut living in the $map:02000045$, but... Honestly, I was just in it for a little extra spending cash. That's all I know.
I always figured it was some nut living in the $map:02000045$, but... Honestly, I was just in it for a little extra spending cash. That's all I know.
Can I help you with something?
Have you seen anyone come through here with books?
Nope, can't say I have. And nothing gets past here without my noticing.
(Describe $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ for him.)
Now, why would a delicate lady like that come to a place like this? Never seen her around here. Unless she's coming through in the dead of night...
(Explain everything.)
I reckon you're up to some important work, then. I haven't seen anyone like you described, but there's one place where they might slip by unnoticed...
A little ways from here you'll see the moving bridge—some of our finest work, if I do say so myself. We haven't gotten to the ravine the bridge crosses, though.
If someone was itching to hide, the ravine would be the place to go. Why not look there?
If you're so sure that someone's been skulking about, why not look in the ravine under the bridge?
<font color="#909090">(This mud wall looks man-made. There's something written under the muck...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You wipe away the mud and read the letters.)</font>
$map:02000051$ ——— valley ——— Yamarcha ——— w —— fin———
<font color="#909090">(It seems like a record of $map:02000051$.)</font>
$map:02000051$ ——— valley ——— Yamarcha ——— w —— fin———
<font color="#909090">(It seems like a record related to $map:02000051$. Go to $map:02000031$ and seek out $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$'s advice.)</font>
So, what brings you to me today?
Have you ever heard the name "Yamarcha?"
Yamarcha... That's an ancient $map:02000051$ tribe.
The Yamarcha were said to have sold their souls to the darkness. They gained great power, but they lost their free will in the bargain. Why do you ask?
(Tell her about the words on the wall.)
That is intriguing... Valley... Yamarcha...
I need to think about this for a moment. In the meantime, why don't you look around and fetch any books on $map:02000051$ that you find?
I need to think about this for a moment. In the meantime, why don't you look around and fetch any books on $map:02000051$ that you find?
Well, I'm not sure how your search went, but I think I know what place the writing referred to.
It's the site of the War of the Wolves. I'm sure of it. You'll find the $map:02000229$ there.

The wolves of Vayar Mountain protect whoever worships their pack's god. The Yamarcha found their guardians in the red wolves. When they went mad with dark power and attacked $map:02000051$, the Murpagoth and their white wolves fought back.

Even after the Yamarcha fell, the War of the Wolves raged on. They're still fighting at $map:02000170$ to this day. Based on my research, I believe that the king of the red wolves, $npcName:21900090$, is trapped by dark magic in the $map:02000229$.

But why would $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ be interested in this place? To tell you the truth, I was going to search for the $map:02000229$ myself before all this terrible business with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.
Why's that?
The temple was built by the Yamarcha for their dark rituals. Even though they are no longer in this world, their power still remains within the temple.
I don't know what $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is after, but if you're going after them, this is our chance to right some wrongs. I'd like you to take this $item:30000076$ with you.
What is it?
This is the key that can free a soul from unholy chains. Since you're going into the temple anyway, please rescue $npcName:21900090$ from the darkness that keeps him trapped.
Why do I have to do that?

There are others who have sought the resting place of the Yamarcha, and they have all met terrible fates at the claws of $npcName:21900090$, who is a puppet for the darkness in his current state. We can't let anyone else fall to him.
I believe that $npcName:21900090$ doesn't want to hurt anyone. If we can release his soul, then no more blood needs to be shed.
The entrance to the $map:02000229$ should be at $map:02000170$. Good luck on your search. I hope you put the $item:30000076$ to good use...
Back already?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000076$.
I forgot what I'm supposed to do.
Really? All right. Well, here's a replacement...
I'm sure I saw you put it in your bag. Could you look again?
Um... Your bag looks terribly heavy. Maybe you should empty it out first.
Inside the $map:02000229$, burn away the undead body of $npcName:21900090$ with the $item:30000076$, then release his soul from its torment.
<font color="#909090">(In the light of the ember, you notice something behind the altar that wasn't visible before.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A bag has been left on the floor behind the altar. Did $npcName:11000522[gender:0]$ leave this behind? Look inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($item:39000034$ is inside. There's a map with a location marked inside...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's near the $map:02000133$. You should continue your search there.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The $map:02000133$ is marked in $item:39000034$. Continue your search there.)</font>
And you must be $MyPCName$. You just missed $npc:11000064[gender:0]$.
How do you know me?
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ warned me you might come here.
But how did he know?
Humblis has kept a close eye on Dark Wind in recent days. In the process, our agents have had a few run-ins with you.
I'm pretty sure I never met your agents.
If you knew they were our agents, they wouldn't be doing their job. But we've been keeping tabs on your activities... including your recent meeting with $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.
After that, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ said you'd probably turn up on our doorstep sooner or later.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ has been in contact with $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ this entire time. He finally convinced her to meet with us in person. They were supposed to meet here, but...

$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ was gone by the time we got here. It looked like there had been a struggle. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ chased after her himself, leaving me to take care of things here...
Where did he go?
He didn't exactly say. The attacker dropped something, but he was tight-lipped about what it was.
What did you guys find?
I didn't get a good look, but it looked like some sort of green jewel. It had a crest on it.
A crest, you say?
<font color="#909090">(Such an item had to belong to a noble family. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ must have recognized the crest...)</font>
Did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ say anything before he left?
He wanted me to give this letter to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$. Beyond that... nothing.
I can deliver the letter if you want.
Sure. I think it's time the others met you for real. $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ should be at the $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$.
How may I help you?
I, uhh... misplaced $item:30000340$.
Where is $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$, again?
A letter from the boss can't just be replaced! Anyway, here's your replacement.
You sure it isn't still in your bag?
You need to clear up some inventory space first.
$npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ should be at the $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$.
Welcome to our humble abode, $MyPCName$.
(Give him $item:30000340$.)

<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ takes the letter and quickly reads it.)</font> He went into the Land of Darkness to retrieve $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. The fool... He'll help nobody by rushing off to his death.
Did he say where in the Land of Darkness he was headed?
Katramus... the Cruel Tower. It isn't a place anyone can hope to survive if they don't have a plan going in.
He's already gone, so there's no time left to plan. I wonder how the kidnapper knew where $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would be?
Do you know who it is?
Come now. You've proven helpful so far, but I can't trust you with that information yet. Even if you doubt $npc:11000044[gender:0]$'s intentions, that doesn't mean we're allies.
Speaking of which... Shouldn't you be reporting to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ right about now?
Why do you ask?
I want you to think about what you're going to tell him. It's clear that you're suspicious of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but we have no idea what he thinks of you.
Personally... I'd keep your distance from him if I were you. At least until you've had a chance to talk to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
So, what will you do? Do you want to help $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
Yep!
Nope!
Then meet me in Katramus. The entrance is in a place called $map:03000057$ in the Land of Darkness.
Then I have nothing else to say.
Where have you been? Did you find $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$?
(Tell him about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, but leave $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ out of it.)
(Tell him everything.)
What have you been doing, then! $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$... Where are you...?
