$item:30000504$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 말한다.
아무 일도 아니라고 말한다.
중요한 비약이니 두번 다시 잃어버리 마세요. 자, 받으세요.
$item:30000504$$pp:는,은$ 이미 제가 드렸을텐데요? 다시 확인해보세요.

정말요?! 역시 언니가 약속을 어기지 않았군요! 난 그런줄도 모르고…언니를 <font color="#ffd200">의심</font>했는데…
이게 $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ 언니가 준…약인가요? 이걸 마시면 옛날처럼 기운이 나는 건가요?
분명 병에 걸리기 전처럼 뛰어놀 수 있을 거라고 말한다.
고마워요. 지금 마셔 볼 게요.
꿀꺽…꿀꺽….
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$$pp:가,이$ 약을 다 마실때까지 기다린다.
…하아! 다 마셨어요! 약을 마시기만 했을 뿐인데 금방이라도 병이 나을 것 같아요!
상태를 지켜볼 시간이 필요할 것이라고 말한다.

… … <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001392[gender:1]$$pp:가,이$ 뭔가 다급하게 말하려는 표정을 짓고 있지만 아무런 소리도 들리지 않는다)</font>

$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$에게서 받은 약을 줬다고 말한다.

친구가… 없… 어? 흐흑… 너무 슬픈 얘기야… 잠시만… 흑흑흑… <font color="#909090">(고개를 푹 숙이고 우는 것 같다)</font>
<font color="#909090">(흐느끼던 얼굴을 번쩍 들고 눈을 반짝이며)</font> 그치만! 음악이 친구들을 만들어 줄 거야! 주변에 악기를 들고 있는 친구들에게 다가가서 슬쩍 같이 연주해보지 않겠냐고 말을 걸어봐.
아마 아무도 거절하지 않을 걸? 함께 연주를 하다보면 우정도 싹트고 사랑도 싹트고… 외로움은 멀리 달아난다구!
원한다면 우리 무대도 빌려줄 테니까 다른 사람들과 함께 연주하면서 친구를 만들어봐.
다른 사람들과 함께 모여서 연주해봐. 훨씬 더 즐거울 거야.
멋져, 멋져! $MyPCName$, 너랑 친구들 모두 다 정말 멋져!
Just go into the $map:52000116$ behind me to sign up as a caravan guard. It's a great way to do some good, maybe get your name out there.
To tell you the truth, this is my first mission as a member of the guard. I'm lucky I got to see a pretty town like this on my first trip out of the capital.
Let me just add your name to the list... and there we go. You're all signed up for the caravan escort.
We're just waiting for one last guard.
This last guard is apparently still a cadet. What was his name again? $npcName:11003164[gender:0]$, I believe.
A cadet...?
Indeed. Even though he's inexperienced, he comes highly recommended by $npc:11003165[gender:0]$. He must be a great talent, indeed.
When will I get to meet him?
Oh, it shouldn't be long now.
From what I hear, $npc:11003165[gender:0]$ promised to make him an official member of the guard if $npcName:11003164[gender:0]$ successfully completes this mission.
Ahem! Sorry for being late. $npc:11003164[gender:0]$, reporting for duty!
It looks like you and me are going to be guarding this caravan. A real pleasure!
All we gotta do is guard the caravan through the $map:63000041$. Simple, right?
Do you know the way to the $map:63000041$?
Sure! Just head to the northwest side of $map:02000062$. You can't miss it.
Out of everyone in my class, I'm the only cadet left. That sure doesn't seem fair to me...
Finally awake, are we? Your injuries weren't too severe, but you were out for a long time.
When you're done sleeping in, I need you to come with me to the $map:52000033$. The empress is waiting for you.
You will mind your manners in front of Her Imperial Majesty.
The security of the empire depends on the success of your investigation.
Then I'd better do a good job.
We understand each other. Excellent.

Begin by speaking with $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ at the $map:52000117$. Hardly a thing happens in the kingdom without his knowing of it. At least, when it comes to caravan routes and trade schedules.
A friend will be waiting for you at the $map:52000117$. I'm sure you'll find his help indispensable.
Did you get lost? I understand. The city can be overwhelming for a newcomer. To get to the $map:52000117$, head southwest from the palace.
I think $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is off getting lunch. It must be nice to have a personal janitor come and clean for you...
Personal janitor?
Yeah. A masked fella dressed in all black. Had blades on his hands and everything.
That $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ is obviously up to no good!
What? Really?!
If he isn't here, and he isn't at his office, then that means $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is missing...
Let's go after this $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$.
Gosh, that's a great idea! Maybe we'll find $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ if we follow him. But, uh... Where'd he go? <font color="#909090">(Start by searching north of $map:02000001$.)</font>
This isn't adding up. Sure, the masked guy looked shady, but he was just so nice!
How may I help you?
Did you see a $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ pass through here?
Of course I saw him! You don't meet a creepy $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ every day, you know.
I didn't let that guy out of my sight. He headed towards the $map:02000083$.
The $map:02000083$ is just that way. You know, that way.
Did you see a creep in a mask go by here?
I didn't see a $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$. I saw a whole bunch! They're swarming all over the $map:02000121$!
There's more than one masked man?
Yes, and they're all jerks! I'm just trying to make a living here, and them tearing up the $map:02000121$ every week isn't making my life any easier. You've got to help me!
You look like you know how to fight! Please, you've got to make them go away. For good, if you can!
While you were in the shop, a bunch of masked hoodlums took your friend!
I don't have any—Wait, you mean $npcName:11003344[gender:0]$?
Yes! That dopey guard!
While you were off fighting masked figures, your guard friend was asking the masked figures about you.
Where did they go?
They were headed for $map:52000119$. I'm sure of it!
They didn't feel like answering questions, so they dragged him off to their lair. We may never see him again...
N-not so fast, friend! It was all a big joke. I-in fact, the real reason I brought your friend here was... was to help your investigation!
How do you know about that?
Nothing happens in the $map:02000083$ without me knowing about it. Nothing. So, let's all keep our cool.
You're after a $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$, right?
Now, I don't know where he is, but I know how we can find him. All you gotta do is trust me.
I'd rather just hand you over to the guard.
(Clench your fists.)
Let's not be so hasty! With my network, we'll track down your mystery man in no time. But if you turn me in, you get nothing.
Okay. We'll try it your way.
H-hey now... I don't know what you're planning, but can't we talk this through, all civilized-like? I'll get you this mystery man on a silver platter. Promise.
(Unclench your fists.)
Phew. You had me going there for a minute. Now, you head on down to the $map:2000084$. My man $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$ will do good by you.
<font size='20'>Little twerp. Next time, I'll...</font> H-hey, you're still here? Haha! I was just gonna say, next time I'll... welcome you with a friendly handshake!
$npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ sends his regards.
$npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ sent ya? Get outta here! I don't got time for the likes of you!
I'll, um, I'll give you some space. <font color="#909090">(You should ask around and see what $npc:11000396[gender:0]$'s deal is.)</font>
What is it?
Do you know someone named $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$?
Sure. He used to do odd jobs for me. But ever since he crossed $npcName:11003241[gender:0]$, he hasn't been much good for anything.
Poor guy's been starving in the streets ever since...
I think $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ and I need to have a little chat.
Wait up! I know how we can help $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$.
Tell me about it, O Great Raccoon.
It's really simple. It just requires some muscle...
All you have to do is pick up $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$'s old job.
And that will help him?
Sure it will! Let's get started. Head up from here and you'll find some tires. Bring me some.
You aren't quitting already, are you?
You're pretty quick. Have you ever thought about moving tires for a living?
Now, for your second task! There are $itemPlural:30000120$ all over the place. Gather them up. <font size='20'>And one more thing. Come closer, please...</font>
(Lean in closer.)
<font size='20'>Drive $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$'s men away from here. Those guys are giving $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$ a hard time.</font>
Keep that second request between us, will you?
You're pretty good! While you were taking care of business, I put in a few good words on your behalf with $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$.
I got a feeling $npcName:11000396[gender:0]$ will be happy to talk to you now.
Do you happen to have any brothers or sisters? I could use a few more workers like you.
$npcName:11000171[gender:0]$ says you did a lot to help me...
I'm real sorry about before. I thought you were another one of his thugs.
How can I make it up to you?
I'm looking for a masked figure.
Sorry. Only masks I've seen are the thugs around here. <font color="#909090">(It seems that $npcName:11000173[gender:0]$ has been wasting your time...)</font>
I guess there's no way I can repay you. So I'll do the only thing I can—I'll live my life to the fullest!
M-mercy! Show mercy, or you'll never find $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$!
You know where $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is?!
Yes! Yes, so you can't hurt me. Understand?
My men spotted $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000043$. Said he was headed towards $map:52000037$.
That sounds bad. I better hurry!
That's right! Get a move on!
I thought you were in a hurry. Why are you still here?
<font color="#909090">(You were too late. He hasn't been here long...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Whoever did this should still be in the cave. Search the area for clues.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Whoever did this should still be in the cave. Search the area for clues.)</font>
Whaddaya mean, you were too late?!
<font color="#909090">(You show him the notebook.)</font> Even if I knew what that was, why do I gotta answer to you?
In that case, I'm sure the guard will love to hear about you.
(Clench your fists threateningly.)
Sorry, $male:buddy,female:lady$. You ain't leaving here alive!
Not this again...
Take your best shot! Whatever you do to me, you'll get ten times over!
Not this again...
It'll be different this time. We'll crush you flat! Flat as a pancake! Or I'll step down as boss!
If we don't beat you this time, I'll quit my job as the boss!
Fine. I give up. You're the boss now.
About this notepad...
Yeah, yeah. I'm getting to that.
See this symbol on the cover? That's the crest of the Barrota Trading Company. We don't do business with them. If you wanna learn more, you better head over to $map:02000139$.
Good luck and good riddance.
I can tell that you're eager to do business.
Do you recognize this notebook?
That's not just any company crest. That's the president's personal crest!
Why don't you speak to President $npcName:11000526$ yourself? He's in the $map:2000226$. Just take the elevator in the $map:2000225$ behind me.
The elevator in the $map:2000225$ will take you right to the $map:2000226$.
The president's office was ransacked...?
I suppose that explains why no one's seen him in a while.
Did you manage to find any clues, at least?
I found $item:30000773$. Does that count?
What on earth was $npcName:11001262[gender:0]$'s business card doing there...? He operates the $map:52000020$, just south of here.
I have no idea what could have happened to the chief...
That was a close call. Thanks for the help...
Not! Thanks to you, those thugs are going to hit me twice as hard next time.
What was your business card doing in the president's office?
What's it to you? I'm not going to start flapping my gums just because some rowdy roustabout thinks $male:he's,female:she's$ a detective.
That was just the first wave, friend-o. Blackstar will be back, and when they are, it's curtains for me!
Stay behind me. I'll take care of the mob.
Hmm... All right. You keep me breathing, and I'll tell you what you want to know. Deal?
H-help me!
You held up your end of the bargain, all right. After the cost of cleaning up the mess you made here, your reward is... one piece of grade A intel!
How is the masked figure connected to Barrota?
Ooh, tough luck, Scout. The answer to that question is grade S, easy. It's a shame, but I just can't give that kind of intel away for free.
Well, what can you tell me?
Look, it just isn't possible. Information doesn't grow on trees. If you want the real primo intel, you've got to cough up the mesos!
I can point you in the right direction. That's worth something, right?
Go to the $map:02000153$ in $map:02000100$. There's information brokers, and then there's those guys. Maybe you can convince them to cough up some secrets.
Consider this a little taste. Next time you're here, don't forget to bring your wallet.
Look, uh, the boss is out right now. Is this important?
Yes. Yes, it is.
I really shouldn't tell you this, but if it's that important... Go to Eve's house. The boss spends most of his time there these days.
Eve's place is the second house on $map:02000147$. Just head southwest from here.
Those two better not be fighting again...
You there! You make it a habit of barging into people's homes?
(Tell him about Nelph and the caravan attack.)
I'm impressed. Even my spies only knew some of that. Interesting...
All right. Let's discuss this back at headquarters.
Come with me to $map:52000073$. We can go over the details there.
Who told you I was here? Does one of my men have a loose tongue?
Allow me to properly introduce myself. I am $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, captain of Dark Wind. What brings you to my city?
I thought $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$ was the captain of Dark Wind.
Brash and knowledgeable. A dangerous combination.
The leader of Dark Wind was $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$, as you say. But... he is no longer with us.
$npcName:11003219[gender:0]$ was murdered by his right-hand man, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. It came as a shock to all of us.
We can't let $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ get away. He's a disgrace to the Dark Wind name... and a danger to $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$'s daughter, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ must pay for his crimes. No matter what!
I completely believe your plausible and well-told story.
Now that I think of it... $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ may well be this $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ you're after.
It seems our goals have aligned. Let us work together.
It seems you have a guest. Go ahead and speak with him. I will wait.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and the $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ have both shown that they are remorseless killers. It only makes sense that they would be one and the same.
Bad news, $MyPCName$. $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s body... It's gone!
You've gotta come back to $map:52000037$ with me!
I can't go back there alone. $map:52000037$ is... It's just not a nice place, okay?
$npc:11000751[gender:1]$ is in danger!
Evil monsters attacked our home on $map:02000290$! If we don't do something, they'll ravage the kingdom and destroy the princess!
Leave this to me.
Please! You must hurry!
If you're as strong as that $male:other $guy... Please, you're our only hope! <font color="#909090">(That $male:other $guy? Who could he mean?)</font>
Thank goodness we met you! The princess and the whole kingdom are safe. You are just like that guy!
Yeah, that guy is my personal hero. Who are we talking about?
The blond-haired human! He helped me when I got in trouble on the $map:02000017$.
I asked him who he was, but he wouldn't say. I guess he has to clear his name first. That's why he was going back to... back to wherever his name wasn't cleared!
<font color="#909090">(Surely he isn't foolish enough to return to $map:02000100$... is he?)</font>
What are you two talking about? Blond guy?
He might be the $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$.
Yikes, that sounds serious! You go back to $map:02000153$. I'll stay here and... and look for the missing body...
P-please, go before I lose my nerve!
I gotta be honest with you, $MyPCName$. Your timing isn't super great. The boss is out. Again.
He didn't tell us where he was headed, but smart money says he's back at $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house.
I don't get it. What's so great about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house?
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ hasn't been by today. Sorry to disappoint you.
I wouldn't put my faith in $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ if I were you. The $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ I know would never hurt my father.
This has to be a misunderstanding. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ would never send lackeys to do his dirty work.
I knew this would happen! $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s set his sights on $npcName:21900089[gender:1]$!
Until we put that traitor in the ground, none of us are safe! For now, let's head back to $map:52000073$.
I... lost my temper. Let's return to $map:52000073$ so we can sort this out.
So, what did you learn in $map:52000037$?
(Tell him what happened.)
It all adds up. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ murdered $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$, and now he's returned to finish the job. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ isn't safe.
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is like a sister to me. If anything happened to her...

Sorry to butt in, but I just got a report about a $npc:11000064[gender:0]$ sighting in $map:02000167$. Seems a lady by the name of $npc:11001116[gender:1]$ spotted him. You should see what she has to say.
Did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ really kill $npcName:11003219[gender:0]$? That question's way above my pay grade, but something doesn't add up...
Hmmm... You don't look like a Dark Wind agent...
Well, I guess it doesn't matter to me what uniform you guys decide to wear. You're here about my report?
The Masked Man went into the $map:2000328$. It wasn't always like this, you know. I bet he's the one who messed up the garden's biz!
It used to be such a pretty garden. Curse that masked villain!
That wasn't your man, was it? Who would've thought a creeper in a mask would turn out to be one of the good guys... But will the garden be okay?
The garden will be just fine.
Really? That's great to hear! Thanks a lot, $male:Mister,female:Miss$ Dark Wind person.
I feel really bad I made you come all the way out here for nothing. Well, bye!
I guess I'll head back to $map:52000055$.
Wait! Before you go, I heard a weird rumor. There was someone creeping around the $map:02000148$ like a real creeper!
Where did you hear this?
$npcName:11000543[gender:0]$ told me. You should go check it out!
I wonder what he looks like under the mask... What if he's a famous pop star in disguise? What if he's really $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$?!
Hmph. You aren't dressed for hard labor. So what are you doing here?
I didn't actually see the guy you're looking for. I heard about it from $npcName:11000533[gender:0]$. Go hassle him instead, why don't you?
This heat is killing me...
Yeah, I saw the blond guy everyone's looking for.
Where did he go?
That depends. What's it worth to you?
Now, don't get the wrong idea. It's not that I mind working hard for a living. But these conditions... There are some things I just can't do on my own.
And you want me to do something about it.
Get rid of all the wild monsters roaming around here. And while you're at it, knock the rust off the old oil pipes.
You do this for me, and I'll tell you where to find the guy you're after.
This's gotta be the worst job I ever took. I should've known, with a name like $map:02000148$...
You take care of those problems for me?
Sure did. It can't be easy, working out here.
Don't I know it! The suits'll never understand what they put us through. But thanks to you, it's a little more bearable now.
I saw the blond guy head for $map:02000139$. If you're lucky, he could still be there.
Even if he isn't, I bet somebody else saw him. He kind of stands out.
Thanks for the help.
Well? Spit it out.
Did a blond guy come through here?
Oh, yeah. Yeah. I saw a guy, all right. Did you say blond? Yeah, a blond guy.
He's in the $map:2000193$ up above us. You better hurry! Or he'll get away!
Quick now! You don't want that blond guy to get away, do you?
I'm $npcName:11003206[gender:0]$, by the way.
Those guys ought to leave me alone, now that they know a $male:guy,female:gal$ like you is prowling around.
I don't suppose you saw any other blond guys here...?
You mean, you were here looking for someone else? Why'd you think there'd be someone like that in this old warehouse?
So my brother sent you, after all...
I figured it was a long shot, but you did it. You saved my brother.
I thought my brother was done for. Thanks a lot!
You used me.
I had no choice! I'm no match for those thugs. But you looked strong enough, and I was right!
And now I've lost the trail. Great.
Maybe not. I really did see a blond guy, just like you said. Real tall, kinda handsome.
Talk to $npcName:11000867[gender:0]$ in the center of $map:02000138$. If anyone saw where your blond buddy went, he did.
I'll find a way to pay you back for this. Thanks again!
Hmm. Something tells me you aren't here to buy fruit.
Did a blond man pass through here?
Yes, I saw someone like that. He left one heck of an impression, too.
Can't say I remember where he went, though...
I really wish I could help you, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, but I just can't seem to remember anything with all these hoodlums roaming about...
I'll take care of the hoodlums if it'll jog your memory.
Well, now that you mention it, that just might do the trick. You take care of my little problem, and I'm sure the memories will pop right back up.
How's a man supposed to concentrated with all this racket?
Dang this rickety memory of mine... Heh heh...
I took care of your problem.
What a coincidence! My memory is just now returning to me. Now, about this blond fella you're after...
I saw him duck into $map:52000126$. Seems to me he's going through rough times. The man looked half-starved...
You sure I can't interest you in some fresh fruit for the road? Guaranteed 70% bug-free!
I don't know a danged thing!
Please, just leave me alone!
Relax. I'm looking for a blond man. Tall, handsome...
I have no idea who you're talking about. Now leave me be!
Why won't you leave me alone...?
Have you always lived out on the streets?
N-none of your business! Get outta here. Leave me alone!
$npcName:11003206[gender:0]$ and I found the blond guy you're after. I figured that was the best way to pay you back for saving my brother.
He's staying in an $map:52000046$. It's not far from here. You better hurry before he gives you the slip again!
It's been nice knowing you.
So, you think I killed the captain...
I can't turn myself in to Dark Wind until I can clear my name. I didn't kill Winn Stilton.
Maybe not, but you still have to come with me.
So... You don't believe me...
Sorry, but I'm not going anywhere with you.
That was too close, $MyPCName$. If it weren't for $npcName:11003210[gender:0]$, I never would have found you.
What happened? Where's $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$?
You were the only one there when I found you. I guess $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$ is long gone...
I guess we'd better let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ know what happened...
When I thought we lost you, I... I never felt like that before, $MyPCName$. You've got to be more careful. I don't know what I'd do if I couldn't see you again!
You're my hero! And the truth is, I l...look up to you!
So, $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$ got away. It can't be helped, I suppose...
This isn't over yet. Let's head downstairs and figure out our next steps.
I should've sent more men out to join in the search. Every second we waste is another second that $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s life is in danger...
Now, shall we begin?
First we have to... Hold on. What's all this racket?
Quickly! To the city's defense!
Without you, $map:02000100$ may well have fallen today. Thank you.
Just doing my duty, Sir.
Spare me the humility. You did good work out there. Unfortunately, I'm going to be too busy cleaning up $map:02000100$ to help track down $npcName:11003215[gender:0]$ for a while...
You and your friend should return to $map:02000001$. Let them know what happened here... and what happened to Winn Stilton.
I'm sorry that I can't do more to help.
It'll be good to sleep in my own bunk again. Ready to go back to $map:02000001$?
Let's go.
Yay! To Tria we go!
I don't know if I'm cut out for field work! I thought being a guard had more standing around and... you know... guarding...
First Winn Stilton, and then $map:02000100$... Shock after shock.
This is a dire matter, indeed. The empress should hear it from your lips.
I understand that you have quite the tale for me.
Winn Stilton... dead...?
We just got word from $map:02000076$. They're being attacked by dark creatures. This is $map:02000100$ all over again!
마침내 때가 되었군.
(무슨 일이냐고 물어본다.)
$MyPCName$, 귀관이 우리와 게오르크를 도와 임무를 수행하는 동안 우리는 남은 인력을 모두 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 이동시켰다. 그리고 탐사대원들의 노력 끝에 드디어 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font> 너머를 탐사할 수 있게 되었지.
귀관도 저 미지의 장소가 궁금할 것 같은데, 맞나?
(매우 궁금하다고 말한다.)
좋다. 자세한 이야기는 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 이동 후 하도록 하지. 그럼, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>에서 보자.
음? 왜 아직 이곳에 있는 거지? <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 이동한 것이 아니었나?
무사히 도착했군.
$MyPCName$! 당신도 왔군요.
(모두 함께 모여있는 줄은 몰랐다고 말한다.)
점령지 너머를 효율적으로 탐사하기 위해 임시 캠프를 만들기로 했다. 이미 1차 탐사도 마친 상태이지.
물론, 탐사의 성과는 있었다. 그건 바로 이 너머에 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>$pp:가,이$ 있다는 사실을 알아낸 것이지.
…<font color="#ffd200">난민 피난처</font>?
타이렌 왕국에게서 쫓겨난 난민들이 모여 살고 있는 곳이에요. 아직 자세한 상황은 몰라요. 가까이 접근하고 싶었으나, 케르베스들이 너무 많아 후퇴할 수밖에 없었거든요.
상황이 좋은 편은 아니다. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004430[gender:0]$</font>$pp:는,은$ 어디에서 무엇을 하는지, 이곳에 주둔한 검은군단의 세력은 어느 정도인지, 그 외 세력은 없는지 확인할 것이 산더미인데 걱정이군. 아무래도 최적의 탐사대원이 필요할 것 같다.
(그게 누구냐고 묻는다.)
누구긴 누구야, 우리 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004578[gender:0]$ 특공대</font>지!
…설마?!
그래, 너 말이야. 와하핫!
<font size='40'>?!?!?!</font>
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004578[gender:0]$</font> 부장만의 의견은 아니다. 나도, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004582[gender:1]$</font>님도 귀관이 적임자라고 판단했다.
귀관만큼 실력이 좋으면서 크리티아스 전역을 돌아다닌 탐사대원은 없다. 꼭 해주었으면 좋겠는데, 무리인가?
<font color="#909090">(모두의 기대를 배신할 순 없어.)</font>
제가 가보겠습니다!
역시~ 그래야 우리 아기 고양이지!
$MyPCName$님이 가시면 안심이네요.
아, $MyPCName$. 한가지 부탁드릴 것이 있어요.
(부탁이 무엇이냐고 묻는다.)
점령지 너머에 <font color="#ffd200">난민 피난처</font>가 있는 것은 확인하였으나, 케르베스 병력 수가 너무 많아 그 안에 진입하는 것은 실패한 상태에요. 타이렌에서 쫓겨난 난민들이 잘 지내고 있는지 알고 싶은데, 이걸 먼저 확인해 줄 수 있나요?
그리고…가능하면 난민들에게 당신들을 돕고자 하는 게오르크가 있다는 것을 알려주었으면 좋겠어요.
(알겠다고 말하며 케르베스 세력도 줄여 두겠다고 말한다.)
정말 고마워요. 당신만 믿겠습니다.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 진입하는 것을 방해하는 케르베스를 해치우고, 난민들이 잘 지내는지 확인하도록.
누구시오? 여긴 어떻게 온 것이오?
(점령지를 넘어 케르베스를 해치우고 왔다고 말한다.)
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>$pp:를,을$ 넘어왔다고?
(그렇다고 말한다.)
케르베스를 해치우며?
(그렇다고 말하며, 여기는 어디인지 묻는다.)
굉장한 솜씨구먼! 아, 내 정신 좀 봐. 여기가 어디냐고 물었지? 이곳은 타이렌 왕국에게 쫓겨난 사람들이 케르베스를 피해 정착한 곳이네.
보아하니 나와 같은 추방자는 아닌 것 같고, 대체 자네는 정체가 무엇인가?
(<font color="#ffd200">메이플 월드</font>에서 온 사람이며, 현재 게오르크를 돕고 있다고 말한다.)
메이플…월드? 그런 지역도 있었나?
(이곳에 대해 좀 더 자세히 알려달라고 말한다.)
이곳을 자세히 알고 싶다면 나 말고 우리 리더를 찾아가는 게 좋을 거야. 대신, 게오르크를 돕고 있다는 말은 절대 꺼내지 말게. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>님이 싫어하실 테니 말이네.
(왜 게오르크를 싫어하냐고 묻는다.)
우리도 사정이 있어서 말이야. 어쨌건 난 조심하라고 경고했네. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>님은 안에 있으니 들어가 보게.

아, 한가지 팁을 주지. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>님이 비협조적이시면 우리를 위한 자원을 가져오면 마음이 좀 풀리실걸세. 어디 보자, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>$pp:를,을$ 처치하면 나오는 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001348$</font> 정도라면 충분할걸세.
<font color="#909090">(일단 이들의 리더를 만나봐야겠어.)</font>
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>님이 어디있냐고? 이 안에 있으니 들어가 보게.
못보던 놈이군. 누구냐?
(<font color="#ffd200">메이플 월드</font>에서 온 사람이며, 게오르크의 부탁으로 이곳을 탐사하러 왔다고 말한다.)
…게오르크?
이곳에 대해 자세히 알고 싶…
게오르크의 하수인이라니! <font size='40'>당장 나가!!</font>
<font color="#909090">(갑자기 뭐지?)</font>
자신들이 버린 난민들에게 뻔뻔하게 도움을 요청하는군. 어리둥절한 표정 지어봤자 소용없어!
본래 타이렌 왕국에서 쫓겨난 난민들은 이 지역에 머물다 케르베스의 눈을 피해 게오르크가 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 이동한다는 것을, 계속 난민들을 받아온 니놈들이 모른다고 하진 않겠지?
하지만 니놈들은 우리가 검은 망토를 뒤집어쓴 놈들에게 발을 묶여 이곳에서 고통받고 있었을 때 아무것도 하지 않았어! 우리를 구출하려는 시도나 자원을 보내 도우려는 행동, 그 아무것도 하지 않았지.
모두를 위한 게오르크라고 이야기 하더니, 결국 필요 없는 사람들은 칼같이 잘라낸 것 아닌가? 그 아버지에 그 딸이군.
(게오르크도 갑작스런 검은군단의 등장에 검은군단과 타이렌 왕국 두 전선을 상대하느라 고군분투했다고 말한다.)
그리고 저는 엄밀히 말하면 게오르크 소속이 아니라 메이플 연합…
꼴도 보기 싫으니 <font size='40'>당장 꺼져!!</font>
<font color="#909090">(일, 일단 후퇴해야겠어. 게오르크에 대한 적개심이 강해 보이는데 난민들을 도우면 좀 마음이 풀리지 않을까?)</font>

<font color="#909090">(</font><font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font><font color="#909090">$pp:를,을$ 해치우고</font> <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001348$</font><font color="#909090">$pp:를,을$ 가져가보자.)</font>
꼴도 보기 싫으니 당장 꺼져버려!!
껄껄, 표정을 보아하니 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>님과 잘 안 풀린 모양이구먼? 물건은 구해왔는가?
(구해온 물건을 건넨다.)
고맙네. 자네가 물건을 구하는 동안 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>님에게, 자네가 케르베스들을 혼내 주었다고 이야기해 두었네. 우리를 위해 자원을 구해주었다고도 이야기하니 마음이 좀 풀리신 것 같더군.
자네를 다시 보고 싶다고 하셨으니 다시 한번 가보게.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004571[gender:0]$</font>에게 들었다. 우릴 도와주었다고 하더군.
정식으로 인사하지. 난민들의 리더, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>다. …원해서 하고 있는 건 아니지만.
<font color="#ffd200">메이플 월드</font>에서 온, $MyPCName$입니다.
단도직입적으로 묻지. 게오르크는 우리를 지원하려고 너를 보낸 것인가?
(그들은 지금 점령지 밖에서 조사 보고를 기다리고 있으며, 난민들이 도움을 원한다는 사실을 알면 즉각적으로 지원할 것이라고 말한다.)
(자신이 여기에 온 이유도 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004582[gender:1]$</font>$pp:가,이$ 이곳을 자세히 살펴보는 것을 최우선으로 원했기 때문이라고 덧붙인다.)
게오르크도 빌어먹을 검은 망토 놈들 때문에 우리 사정을 몰랐다는 것인가? 흠…가능성 있군. 좋다, 일단 믿어보도록 하지.
아까 이곳에 대해 자세히 알고 싶다고 했었나? 정확히 알고 싶은 것이 뭐지?
(당신이 검은 망토라 부르는 녀석들을 지휘하고 있는 자를 찾고 있다고 말하며, 혹시 이 근방에서 수상한 일이 없었냐고 묻는다.)
수상한 일? 그런 것이라면 이 근방의 소문을 다 파악하고 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$npcTitle:11004576$</font>에게 물어보는 것이 낫겠군. 그는 우리가 이곳에 자리 잡기 이전부터 있었으니 말이야.
자, 이 추천장을 가지고 가라. 지붕에 초록색으로 빛나는 크리스탈이 있는 집이 <font color="#ffd200">$npcTitle:11004576$</font>의 집이다. 원하는 정보를 얻을 수 있으면 좋겠군.
정보 상인의 집을 다시 말해달라고? 지붕에 초록색으로 빛나는 크리스탈이 있는 집이 <font color="#ffd200">$npcTitle:11004576$</font>의 집이다. 한 채뿐이니 바로 알 수 있을 것이다.
반갑다모! 나는 모든 것을 사고 파는 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004576$</font>$pp:다,이다$모.
하지만 아무하고나 거래하진 않는다모. 너는 믿을만한 인간이냐모?
(<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>에게 받은 추천장을 내민다.)
아하~ <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>의 추천장이라, 오랜만이다모. 제법 믿을만한 인간인 것 같으니 일단 들어보겠다모.
그럼, 손님을 맞이하겠다모. 무엇이든 사고파는 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004576$</font>의 상점에 온 것을 환영한다모! 손님은 무엇을 원하냐모?
(최근 수상한 소문이나 검은 망토를 뒤집어쓴 존재에 대해 아는 것이 없냐고 물어본다.)
아항~ 손님은 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004430[gender:0]$</font>$pp:를,을$ 쫓고 있는 거냐모?
그걸 어떻게?!
무엇이든 아는 이 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004576$</font>님을 우습게 보면 곤란하다모. 그나저나 그 정보는 좀 비싼데, 손님 돈 많냐모?
(추천장을 가지고 왔는데 무슨 소리냐고 따진다.)
하! 세상 물정 모르는 손님이다모. 이 추천장은 손님이 믿을만한 손님이라는 것을 증명할 뿐이다모. 세상에 공짜가 어디 있느냐모?
(몸으로 때울 순 없겠냐고 물어본다.)
돈이 없구나모…. 알겠다모, 그럼 대신 내가 원하는 물건을 가져와라모. 정보료 대신 물건이라도 받아야겠다모.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>의 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잡고 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001349$</font>$pp:를,을$ 가져와라모.
원래 라플레시아들은 우리 모랑족들과 잘 어울려 지내고 있었다모. 그런데 최근 닥치는 대로 주변을 파괴하는 이상한 라플레시아들이 보이기 시작했다모! 라플레시아가 뭔가에 의해 오염된 것 같은데 이를 분석하고 싶다모.
근거지가 위험할 수도 있어서 확인이 필요하다모. 하지만 나는 <font color="#ffd200">$npcTitle:11004576$</font>, 싸움은 못 한다모. 그러니, 나 대신 가져와라모.
(근거지에 관해 묻는다.)
그것은 팔 수 있는 정보가 아니다모. 뭐, 운이 좋으면 스스로 알아낼 수도 있겠지만, 그건 나중 일이다모. 일단 내가 원하는 물건을 가져와라모.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>의 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022602$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잡고 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001349$</font>$pp:를,을$ 가져와라모.
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001349$</font>$pp:를,을$ 가져왔냐모?
(확보한 씨앗을 내민다.)
정말 희한하게 생겼다모! 이건 내가 따로 알아봐야겠다모. 손님, 고맙다모!
자~ 그럼 손님이 원했던 정보를 주겠다모. 잘 들어라모.
최근 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>에 많은 자재가 운반되고 있다고 한다모. 게다가 커다란 기계가 가동되는 것 같은 소리가 계속 들린다고 한다모. 수상해 보이지 않냐모?
그곳은 케르베스가 득실거리는 지역이라 타이렌 왕국의 병사들도 없는데 왜 기계 소리가 나는 걸까모?
(전혀 모르겠다고 말한다.)
내 촉이 말하고 있다모! <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>에서 <font color="#ffd200">무언가</font>가 만들어지고 있는 것 같다모.
(한번 확인해봐야겠다고 말한다.)
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 이동한 뒤 망원경으로 상황을 살펴볼 수 있을 거다모. 그럼 행운을 빈다모!
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>$pp:를,을$ 살펴보고 현재까지 알아낸 것을 보고해야겠어. 관찰 후 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가자.)</font>
여기 계속 있어도 더 알려줄 건 없다모. <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>$pp2:로,으로$ 이동한 뒤 수상한 것이 없는지 망원경으로 확인해보라모.
돌아왔군, $MyPCName$. 피곤하겠지만 바로 보고를 부탁해도 되겠나?

생김새는 약간 다르지만…이건 타이렌 왕국을 지키던 병기, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>이에요.

아마도 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>$pp:는,은$ <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004575[gender:1]$</font>에게 버려진 적개심으로 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004430[gender:0]$</font>$pp:와,과$ 손을 잡은 것 같아요.

모두가 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004575[gender:1]$</font>의 말을 100% 따르는 것은 아니에요. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>의 경우, 타이렌 왕국의 수문장이었기에 자신 스스로를 업그레이드할 수 있도록 '학습' 기능이 있어요. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>$pp:는,은$ 학습을 거듭하다, <font color="#ffd200">자아</font>를 가져버렸죠.

그 후 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004575[gender:1]$</font>의 지시를 무시하는 일이 종종 발생했고, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004575[gender:1]$</font>$pp:는,은$ 그런 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>$pp:가,이$ 마음에 들지 않아 신식 병기 개발에 집중했고 성공했죠. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>$pp:는,은$ 신식 병기 테스트가 끝나자마자 작동 종료를 명받았어요.

$MyPCName$!!

<font size='45'><font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004582[gender:1]$</font>님!!!</font>
직접 전투라뇨, 너무 위험합니다!

<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004582[gender:1]$</font>님은 저희 게오르크의 수장이십니다! 본인의 지위를 생각하셔야지요! <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004582[gender:1]$</font>님에게 무슨 일이 생긴다면 게오르크가 무너진다는 것을 왜 모르십니까!
미안해요, $MyPCName$.
(괜찮다고 말한다.)
이해해주셔서 감사합니다, $MyPCName$. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004582[gender:1]$</font>님이 함께할 수 없으니, 대신 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004684$</font>$pp:를,을$ 속이기 위한 장치를 만들어 보죠.

<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001350$</font>$pp:는,은$ 타이렌 왕국에서만 생성되거든요. 아주 작은 가루까지 에네르를 그대로 가질 수 있게 분해하는 기술은 왕실 직속 기관만이 가지고 있어요.

무엇보다 외부인이 어떻게 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001350$</font>의 존재를 알고 있지?

검은 망토들을 몰아내려는 너희에게 힘을 보태고 싶지만, 보다시피 이런 상황이라서 말이야. 재료도 없거니와 있어도 주지 못했을 거다.

혼란스러운 상황일수록 중요한 것에 집중하는 것이 좋겠습니다.

바로, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004430[gender:0]$</font>$pp:를,을$ 잡는 것이다. 적이 코앞에 있는 상황에서 흔들리는 것은 위험하다. 우린 최초의 목적대로 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004430[gender:0]$</font>$pp:를,을$ 친다.

더 좋은 작전이 있나?
더 좋은 작전이 있으면 제안 바란다.

모두 준비는 되었나?
아, 현재 <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>에서 새롭게 개발된 무기를 이곳으로 보내고 있다고 합니다. 최대한 빨리 이동하고 있으나, 검은군단과 케르베스들의 방해가 거세, 시간이 좀 걸릴 것 같다고 하더군요.
여기까지 온 이상 너무 성급할 필요는 없어 보여요. 완벽하게 준비될때 까지 대기하는 건 어떤가요?
동의합니다. 그럼 보급이 올 때까지 잠시 대기하도록 하죠.

우린 이번에 반드시 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004430[gender:0]$</font>$pp:를,을$ 해치운다.

게오르크도 준비가 다 되셨습니까?

나는 더러운 인간들과 함께할 생각이 없다. 내 손으로 <font color="#ffd200">메이플 월드</font>도, <font color="#ffd200">크리티아스</font>도 모두 지배하고 말 것이다.
내가 모든 것의 위에 서고 말리라.
$MyPCName$, 이제 출발 하는 건가?
(그렇다고 말한다.)
